effects.name: Thief
effects.text: When you play Ababila, choose one opponent's deck. Reveal the top card of the chosen deck and place it under Ababila. When Ababila is discarded, discard all cards under it.

effects.name: Stop!
effects.text: Ababila loses two less energy in attacks against Creatures of the same region as the card under Ababila.

flavor:
"Give me forty of these, and I could rule the Moonlands!"
-- Korremar
name: Ababila

flavor: It will haunt you. If you are weak, it will become you.
name: Abaquist

powers.name: Possess
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play with less energy than Abaquist. Discard Abaquist from play. Gain control of the chosen Creature. That Creature may not attack this turn.

effects.name: Barter
effects.text: Once per turn, when an opposing Magi plays a Relic, you may discard one energy from Abger to draw two cards.

effects.name: Shrewd
effects.text: Opposing Paradwyn Creatures cost one additional energy to play.

flavor: "Come get some! It's on sale!"
name: Abger

effects.name: Dreamburn
effects.text: All of your Powers and Spells that discard energy from a single Creature or Magi may instead discard energy from either a single Magi or Creature.

flavor: It is said that Abraxin could grab your dreams and twist them behind your back.
name: Abraxin's Crown
text: If an opponent's Power, Spell, or Effects discards one or more cards from your hand, you may discard Abraxin's Crown from play or from your hand instead. If you do, that opponent discards his or her hand and all energy from his or her Magi.

flavor:
"It's all about a little give and take. You give, and I take!"
-- Abwyn
name: Abwyn's Gift
text: If you have a Creature in play, choose any one Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Return any one of your Creatures in play to your hand, discarding all of that Creature's energy.

effects.name: Overwrite
effects.text: Whenever any player plays a Spell or uses a Power that specifies one or more regions, before any choices are made, you may discard two energy from your Magi. If you do, change one of the specified regions to a region of your choice.  You may only use Overwrite once per Spell or Power, with Overwrite lasting until the end of the current turn.

flavor:
"He picked up the altered scroll and said 'Burn, you fool!' -- then
shot a string of flowers at me. I was laughing so hard, I could hardly
hold on to the quill."
-- Abwyn's Journal
name: Abwyn's Quill

effects.name: Haunt
effects.text: If Adis is defeated, your opponents each choose and discard three cards from each of their hands.

flavor:
"She's gone, but I can still hear her screaming."
-- Zet, Core Warrior
name: Adis

effects.name: Bypass
effects.text: If Aegris is frozen, it can attack Magi directly.

effects.name: Shatter
effects.text: Whenever Aegris attacks a Magi, choose one of that Magi's Creatures. You may discard Aegris from play before energy is removed to discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor: It's jealous of other dream creatures, and willing to do something about it.
name: Aegris

effects.name: Charge
effects.text: Whenever Aerial Flist attacks, add one energy to it before energy is removed.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Aerial Flist, increase or decrease its starting energy o one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"They fly like a feather and land like a rock."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Aerial Flist

effects.name: Charge
effects.text: Whenever Aerial Flist attacks, add one energy to it before energy is removed.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Aerial Flist, increase or decrease its starting energy o one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"They fly like a feather and land like a rock."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Aerial Flist

flavor:
"Hey, it's getting lighter... good, I feel safer now."
-- Zet
name: Aglow
text: Your burrowed Creatures may attack this turn. When attacking this turn, your burrowed Creatures gain one energy before energy is removed.

flavor: "To protect its spores, the Great Mushroom of Knowledge gives them wings."
name: Agovo

powers.name: Lore
powers.text: Draw one card.

effects.name: Focus
effects.text: Before Agram energizes during your Energize Step, permanently add one to his energize rate.

effects.name: Opportunist
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if Agram's energize rate is 10 or more, and if you have another Magi in your Magi pile, place Agram at the bottom of your Magi pile face down. Discard all of your cards from play, and play your next Magi face up. If Agram energizes for 11 or more, and he is your last Magi, you lose the game.

flavor: His eyes were taken for seeing the secrets of darkness.
name: Agram

powers.name: Possess
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play and any one opposing Creature in play with less energy than your chosen Creature. Discard your chosen Creature. Gain control of the chosen opposing Creature. That Creature may not attack this turn.

effects.name: Shield
effects.text: At the beginning of each player's turn, choose any one of your Creatures in play. The chosen Creature loses two less enery from each attack this turn.

flavor: You rang?
name: Agram's Armor

flavor:
"I think about Une whenever I play with it."
-- Agram
name: Agram's Plaything

powers.name: Puppet Strings
powers.text: Until the end of your turn, Agram's Plaything changes to a Creature. Add one energy to Agram's Plaything whenever it becomes a Creature. If your Magi is Agram, add two additional energy to it. Whenever Agram's Plaything becomes a Relic, discard all energy from it.

effects.name: Mastery
effects.text: Your Shadow Magi may play cards from their original region, ignoring regional penalties and restrictions.

effects.name: Control
effects.text: If your Magi is Agram, you may play any cards that specifically say that they can be played by a Shadow Magi. Agram does not pay a regional penalty for non-Core cards.

flavor:
"It's sooooo good! .. what's it do again?"
-- Korg
name: Agram's Staff

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Agrilla loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"An Agrilla's deal."
-- Kybarite phrase meaning "no choice."
name: Agrilla

powers.name: Fear
powers.text: Choose any one of your other Creatures in play that can attack. The chosen Creature may attack twice this turn.

text: Kybar's Teeth Shadow Magi may play Agrilla.

effects.name: Spy
effects.text: Whenever an opponent uses a Spell or Power to draw cards, you may draw an equal number of cards.

flavor: "One for you, one for me."
name: Ahdar

effects.name: Dust Cloud
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures is attacked and defeated, you may discard two energy from Ahron. If you do, reduce the attacking Creature to one energy.

flavor: "Once you were as a dune. Now, you are but a grain."
name: Ahron

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Ainjer loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor:
"It's comin' down, and we're all going with it!"
-- Golthub, Royal Toady
name: Ainjer

powers.name: Grr
powers.text: Discard Ainjer from play. Choose any one Creature in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature for each of your Bograth Creatures in play. Opposing cards do not affect Grr when it is used and cannot alter the amount of energy discarded by Grr. Use this Power only before your Attack Step.

flavor:
"The creatures here are as persistent as the stench."
-- Boria, Elder
name: Ainjer Swarm
text: If you have at least four Bograth Creatures in play, all opposing Creatures in play lose one energy.

effects.name: Rolling Thunder
effects.text: If any opponent has more Creatures in play than you do, your Magi's Energize rate is increased by two.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Akkar loses two less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"No one understands the source of my power."
"Not even you?"
"Shaddap."
-- Korok and Jagt
name: Akkar

effects.name: Rolling Thunder
effects.text: If any opponent has more Creatures in play than you do, your Magi's Energize rate is increased by two.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Akkar loses two less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"No one understands the source of my power."
"Not even you?"
"Shaddap."
-- Korok and Jagt
name: Akkar

flavor: Some dreams don't go away when you wake up. That's what these things are for.
name: Alaban

powers.name: Undream
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Return the chosen creature to its owner's hand. Discard the chosen Creature's energy.

flavor:
"Imagine empty" -- Inscription on left-hand glove
"space here." -- Inscription of right-hand glove
name: Alaban Gloves

powers.name: Undream
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Return the chosen Creature to its owner's hand. Place that Creature's energy on its current Magi.

effects.name: Undream
effects.text: Whenever one of your other Arderial Creatures in play is attacked, you may discard Alaban Kit from play. If you do, at the end of the current turn, return the attacking Creature from play to its owner's hand, discarding that Creature's energy.

flavor: Some disassembly required.
name: Alaban Kit
text: Arderial Shadow Magi may play Alaban Kit.

effects.name: Super Clever
effects.text: Korg cannot play Relics.

effects.name: Super Brave
effects.text: Whenever Korg has no energy, he is defeated, even if he has Creatures in play.

flavor: "Um... yeah! I had a good idea of Zet's: I'm king!"
name: All-High King Korg
subtype: Celebrated Emperor of Great and Mighty Bograth
text: Korg can only play Core, Bograth, and Universal cards.

effects.name: Super Clever
effects.text: Korg cannot play Relics.

effects.name: Super Brave
effects.text: Whenever Korg has no energy, he is defeated, even if he has Creatures in play.

flavor: "Um... yeah! I had a good idea of Zet's: I'm king!"
name: All-High King Korg
subtype: Celebrated Emperor of Great and Mighty Bograth
text: Korg can only play Core, Bograth, and Universal cards.

effects.name: Douse
effects.text: Whenever Allio is attacked by a Cald Creature, add four energy to Allio before energy is removed.

flavor:
"Allio mints! The best way to remove that spicy food taste from your
mouth."
-- Orlon, Friend of Wellisks
name: Allio

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Whenever you play a Kybar's Teeth or Naroom Creature, add one energy to it.

flavor:
"I don't care what they say in the mountains, those things always herald
bad news in my book."
-- Zet
name: Alpine Xamf

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Whenever you play a Kybar's Teeth or Naroom Creature, add one energy to it.

flavor:
"I don't care what they say in the mountains, those things always herald
bad news in my book."
-- Zet
name: Alpine Xamf

effects.name: Pyromaniac
effects.text: Once per turn, when one of your Cald Spells or Powers discards energy from one or more opposing Creatures, you may add one energy to Amanax for each energy discarded.

flavor: I feel your pain.
name: Amanax

effects.name: Soothing Song
effects.text: After a Spell is played, choose a Creature and add one energy to it.

flavor:
"A true friend is the one who knows the song in your
heart and sings you the song when you're torn apart."
name: Amara
text: Amara may play Kybar's Teeth Spells, ignoring regional penalties.

flavor:
"There's so many plants... how can you tell which one is the am-bush?"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Botanical Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Ambush
text: Choose any one Creature in play. The chosen Creature loses energy equal to its starting energy.

flavor: Motash watched as the Grag bore down on her crippled hyren. She clasped the amulet with a silent prayer...
name: Amulet of Ombor

powers.name: Energy Boost
powers.text:
Roll one die.
1, 2, or 3 = Your opponents add one energy
to each of their Creatures in play.
4 or 5 = Choose any one Creature in play.
Add two energy to the chosen Creature.
6 = Choose any one Creature in play.
Add four energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Native Wisdom
effects.text: Once per turn, when you play a d'Resh Spell, discard one energy from each opposing Creature.

effects.name: Native Soil
effects.text: Your non-d'Resh cards cost one additional energy to play.

flavor:
"You mean there's not enough of it just lying around? You have to carry
some of it with you?"
-- Lanyx, to Korremar
name: Amulet of Sand

flavor: The Core is run with ruthless, efficient order -- but ruthless, efficient chaos suits them just as well.
name: Anarchy
text: Each player chooses one Creature controlled by the player to his or her right. All chosen Creatures are shuffled together face down and one is dealt to each player. Each Creature is restored to its starting energy. Anarchy may only be played if each player is able to choose a creature.

flavor:
"Play something else. That makes me homesick."
-- Tony, to Tryn
name: Ancestral Flute

powers.name: Song of the Family
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard Ancestral Flute from play. Search your deck for up to two copies of the chosen Creature. Show the cards to your opponents, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor:
"I figured it out once before! Why can't I do it again?!"
-- Zajan
name: Ancient's Puzzlebox

powers.name: Mind Games
powers.text: Discard Ancient's Puzzlebox from play. Reveal any number of cards in your hand and choose a Creature. Add one energy to it for each Ancient's Puzzlebox you reveal. Draw a card. You may not play another Ancient's Puzzlebox this turn.

text: Your deck may contain up to six copies of Ancient Puzzlebox.

flavor: "I fear nothing. Korg least of all."
name: Arawan

powers.name: Warp Driven
powers.text: Search your deck for any one Creature with the effect "Dreamwarp". Place the chosen Creature into your hand. Shuffle the deck afterwards.

flavor:
"The sun's fire makes a garden grow,
 And forge fires temper steel.
 Why then are you surprised to find
 A fire that can heal?"
 -- "The Arbolit", verse 3
name: Arbolit

powers.name: Healing Flame
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard Arbolit from play. Add two energy to the chosen creature.

flavor:
"Instant energy right there, brother. Individually wrapped for
convenience. Oh yeah."
-- Yaki, Naroom Tracker
name: Arboll

powers.name: Life Channel
powers.text: Choose any one Magi in play. Discard Arboll from play. Add four energy to the chosen Magi.

flavor:
"Hypnosis? That's the least of your worries."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Arboll Stalker

powers.name: Detonate
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard Arboll Stalker from play. Discard three energy from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Stunning
effects.text: Opposing Creatures cannot attack and use Powers on the same turn.

flavor: "Not my looks, my fists!"
name: Archid

flavor:
"Say it, Korg, and I'll have to hurt you."
-- Zet
name: Arderial Shadow Geyser
text: The energy cost for this Geyser is zero if played by an Arderial Shadow Magi. To play this Geyser, you must discard three Core Spells from your hand. Place this Geyser on the table. Arderial Spells cost two additional energy to play. Your Core Spells cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one. You may not play another Arderial Shadow Geyser while this one is in play. If your Magi leaves play, you may keep all but one of your Shadow Geysers in play. Agram does not discard any Shadow Geysers from play when he leaves play.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, choose any one Creature in play. Add one enery to the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"The wind and his children answer to the one wearing me."
-- Crown inscription
name: Arderial's Crown

effects.name: Undream
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if Shimmer has no energy, you may choose a Creature in play. Place the chosen Creature's energy on its Magi and return the chosen Creature to its owner's hand. This effect cannot add energy to Shimmer beyond the starting energy of the chosen Creature.

flavor: "Time to wake up!"
name: Arderian Adept

effects.name: Feathered Protection
effects.text: Whenever a Spell or Power discards energy from one or more of your Creatures in play, discard up to two less energy from each Creature.

flavor:
"Kid, when Kalius says he's taking you under his wing,
he really means it."
-- Aula, Arderial Diviner
name: Arderian-Guard Wings
text: Arderial Shadow Magi may play Arderian-Guard Wings.

effects.name: Relentless Hunt
effects.text: At the end of each of your turns, all opposing stalked Creatures in play lose one energy.

flavor: "I'll delay them as long as I can. But we need to send someone for help."
name: Ardonia

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Aritex attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Aritex and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: For you to receive, the Weave must give. It's the law of the Weave.
name: Aritex

powers.name: Heal
powers.text: Discard any one of your other Weave Creatures from play. Restore your Magi to his or her starting energy at the end of this turn.

effects.name: Shell Game
effects.text: At the end of your turn, you may choose one of your Creatures in play and an opposing Creature in play. The two chosen Creatures switch controllers. At the end of your opponent's next turn, return any of the chosen Creatures that are still in play to their owner's control.

flavor: "Got it Got it. Got it. Need it... got it!"
name: Arosa

effects.name: Healer's Aura
effects.text: At the end of your turn, choose any one Creature in play with less than its starting energy. Add two energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor: "Stop squealing. We can fix that little boo-boo."
name: Artyva

flavor:
"Don't hunt the mogas on the mountaintops."
-- Kybarite maxim
name: Ascend
text: Play Ascend only before your Attack Step. Your Kybar's Teeth Creatures cannot attack this turn. Until the beginning of your next turn, all of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures lose three less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"Everything goes from ashes to ashes... but in between there is life."
-- Magam, Cald Ringsmith
name: Ash Hyren

powers.name: Devitalize
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play with more than its starting energy. Restore the chosen Creature to its starting energy.

text: Cald Shadow Magi may play Ash Hyren.

effects.name: Nerve
effects.text: If a Creature attacks Ashgar directly, draw a card before energy is removed.

flavor: I'm addicted to stress. That's the way I get things done.
name: Ashgar

effects.name: Weave Twist
effects.text: All cards that specifically reference Core instead reference their own region. If a card is of multiple regions, you choose which of those regions to reference.

flavor: Everything is part of the whole...
name: Ashio

flavor:
"To mater he art of nonbeing is to achieve true victory."
-- Atekkia
name: Atekkia's Gift
text: If you have a Creature in play, choose any one Creature in play. Return the chosen Creature to its owner's hand, discard all of that Creature's energy. Return any one of your Creatures in play to your hand, discarding all of that Creature's energy.

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Core Spells and Powers do not affect Athik.

flavor: A rock to stand firm against evil.
name: Athik

powers.name: Smite
powers.text: Choose any one Core Magi in play. Discard all energy from the chosen Magi.

effects.name: Refresh
effects.text: If you have no cards in your hand, discard Aubra's Canteen. Draw five cards.

effects.name: Refill
effects.text: If Aubra's Canteen is discarded from your hand by an opposing card, play it instead, ignoring all costs.

flavor:
"Use sand to refresh, and you won't miss water."
-- Mohani
name: Aubra's Canteen

effects.name: Slipping Sands
effects.text: All cards played in the first Powers/Relics/Spells step cost two additional energy to play.

flavor:
"Let's do the time warp agaaaaaain!"
-- Nahara, Sandkeeper
name: Aubra's Hourglass
text: When you play Aubra's Hourglass, discard all copies of Aubra's Timepiece from play. Cards cannot prevent Aubra's Timepiece from being discarded.

effects.name: Time Slip
effects.text: All cards played during the second Powers/Spells/Relics step cost two extra energy to play.

flavor:
"Time is on your side."
-- Inscription on Aubra's Timepiece
name: Aubra's Timepiece
text: After you play Aubra's Timepiece, discard all copies of Aubra's Hourglass from play. Cards cannot prevent Aubra's Hourglass from being discarded.

flavor:
"Sometimes you have to give a little to get a lot."
-- Risha, Seventh Oracle
name: Aubra's Wisdom
text: If you have four or more cards in your hand, shuffle your hand into your deck. Until the end of your next turn, draw three extra cards during your Draw step.

flavor: The answer drifted by on a cloud, and she reached out and grabbed it.
name: Aula

powers.name: Windsight
powers.text: Discard your hand. Draw five cards. You may not use Windsight with less than two cards in your hand.

flavor:
"When she came to us, her eyes sparkled with youth. Now her eyes spark
with grim determination."
-- Mobis, Elder
name: Aula, Mindseeker

powers.name: Windsight
powers.text: Discard a Spell from your hand. Draw a number of cards equal to half of the Spell's energy cost, rounded down (X equals zero) and reveal them to your opponent. You cannot draw any more cards this turn.

flavor:
"All's fair in war. Nothing's fair in love."
-- Orlon, Friend of Wellisks
name: Aula, Mindseeker

powers.name: Windsight
powers.text: Discard a Spell from your hand. Draw a number of cards equal to half of the Spell's energy cost, rounded down (X equals zero) and reveal them to your opponent. You cannot draw any more cards this turn.

effects.name: Mistress of Frost
effects.text: If Aurorea is frozen, increase her energize by two.

flavor: "Brrrr, it's cold in here. Feels good, doesn't it?"
name: Aurorea
text: Aurorea can only play Nar cards.

effects.name: Subjective Reality
effects.text: Your Magi cannot be defeated while you have illusions in play.
When one of your illusions is defeated in an attack, discard a card from your hand.

flavor:
"Perception is reality."
-- The Avatar
name: Avatar's Staff

flavor:
"I will be the master of five..."
-- Agram
name: Awakening
text: Place Awakening on the table. At the beginning of your turn, if you have all five Shadow Geysers in play, defeat all opposing Magi stacks. Whenever one of your Shadow Geysers is discarded from play by an opposing card, play that Shadow Geyser at the end of your next turn, ignoring all costs, restrictions, and effects of the Shadow Geyser being played.

effects.name: Double Strike
effects.text: Ayebaw can attack twice during your Attack Step.

flavor: The great bird smashed into his shield, and then vanished into the clouds. But the battle was far from over.
name: Ayebaw

effects.name: Hordes
effects.text: Whenever you play a Bograth Creature, you may discard one energy from Baa to draw an additional card at the end of the turn.

flavor: "I look for things. Things to make us grow."
name: Baa

effects.name: Cuddly-Wuddly
effects.text: The first opposing Spell, Power, Effect, or attack that removes energy from Baby Furok during each opposing Player's turn removes no energy from it.

flavor:
"They're even more dangerous than adult furoks; at least the adults know
they're not supposed to jump on you."
-- Sperri, Friend of Furoks
name: Baby Furok

effects.name: Cuddly-Wuddly
effects.text: The first opposing Spell, Power, Effect, or attack that removes energy from Baby Furok during each opposing Player's turn removes no energy from it.

flavor:
"They're even more dangerous than adult furoks; at least the adults know
they're not supposed to jump on you."
-- Sperri, Friend of Furoks
name: Baby Furok

effects.name: Fledgling
effects.text: If Baby Hyren is attacked, you may choose one of your other Hyren in play. The chosen Creature replaces Baby Hyren in the attack. Baby Hyren cannot attack.

flavor:
"It's sooo cute! What was it we were here to do again?"
-- Korg, to Olabra
name: Baby Hyren

powers.name: Growth Spurt
powers.text: Discard Baby Hyren to play a Hyren from your hand, ignoring restrictions and reducing its cost by the energy on Baby Hyren. That Hyren cannot attack this turn. Use Growth Spurt only before your Attack step.

effects.name: Pack Charge
effects.text: Whenever Bagala attacks, before energy is removed, add one energy to it for each of your Bagala Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Strength AND numbers!"
-- Liriel, Bagala Trainer
name: Bagala

effects.name: Family Ties
effects.text: When Bagala Cub is discarded from play, search your deck for any one Bagala. Place it into your hand. Reshuffle your deck afterwards.

flavor:
"Are you sure you didn't hear its mother?"
-- Wiep, the Sniveler
name: Bagala Cub

flavor:
"The cycle of life has its ups and downs. This'll help you ride that
cycle."
-- Liriel, Bagala Trainer
name: Bagala Fangs

powers.name: Downs
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen Creature's starting energy is one.

powers.name: Ups
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen Creature's starting energy is ten.

text: If an opposing Spell, Power or Effect causes you to discard one or more cards from your hand, you may discard Bagala Fangs from your hand or from play instead. If you do, until your current Magi is defeated, no opposing cards can cause you to discard cards from your hand.

effects.name: Hunt
effects.text: Whenever Bagala Hunter attacks a stalked Creature, add one energy to Bagala Hunter before energy is removed.

flavor:
Hunting in the jungle ush,
Creeping through the underbrush
Until upon the prey you rush.
It's much more fun to pounce!
-- The Scarlet Song
name: Bagala Hunter

powers.name: Stalk
powers.text: Choose any opposing Creature in play. Until the end of your next turn, the chosen Creature is stalked; whenever a stalked Creature is attacked, discard one energy from the stalked Creature before energy is removed.

effects.name: Numbing Wit
effects.text: While Balachron has less than four energy, all Creatures and Relics in play are frozen; Powers on frozen cards cost one additional energy to use.

flavor: "Tact is for those not intelligent enough to use sarcasm."
name: Balachron

flavor: You can try to hide your trail.
name: Balamant

powers.name: Hunt
powers.text: Choose any one Magi in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Magi.

flavor: Balamants protect their young and vice versa.
name: Balamant Pup

powers.name: Support
powers.text: Choose any one other Creature in play. Add two energy to the chosen Creature. Add one additional energy if the chosen Creature is a Balamant.

effects.name: Smash
effects.text: Whenever Baldar attacks a Creature that starts the attack with less energy than Baldar, Baldar loses no energy in the attack.

flavor:
"They seem to like their work as much as I do."
-- Valkan, Pyromancer
name: Baldar

effects.name: Affinity
effects.text: Baldars cost you one less to play, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Hammer
effects.text: Once per turn, after one of your Baldars is discarded from play by an opposing Creature or Relic, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, discard the opposing card from play.

flavor:
"Hey, I thought you said it was a gate!"
-- Wessig
name: Baldar Amulet

effects.name: Fly Like a Rock
effects.text: At the end of your turn, discard five energy from Ballistic Baldar. If Ballistic Baldar is still in play, roll a die. Choose a number of Creatures in play equal to the die roll. You cannot choose a Creature more than once. Discard three energy from each of the chosen Creatures.

flavor:
"It'll never fly."
"That's... not the point."
-- Whall and Kazm
name: Ballistic Baldar

effects.name: Fly Like a Rock
effects.text: At the end of your turn, discard five energy from Ballistic Baldar. If Ballistic Baldar is still in play, roll a die. Choose a number of Creatures in play equal to the die roll. You cannot choose a Creature more than once. Discard three energy from each of the chosen Creatures.

flavor:
"It'll never fly."
"That's... not the point."
-- Whall and Kazm
name: Ballistic Baldar

flavor: IT'S GOOD FOR YOU!!!
name: Baloo Root

powers.name: Nourish
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard Baloo Root from play. Add one energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor: "Listen up, Core scum. You know what I see in your future? A big, hot, red-orange fireball."
name: Barak

powers.name: Prophecy
powers.text: Look at the top four cards of your deck. Replace them in any order wish.

flavor: Barak bravely faced down the great, shadowy beast. "Would you believe... a big, hot, red-orange fireball and an ash hyren?"
name: Barak the Red

powers.name: Command
powers.text: Search your deck for any one Cald Creature and place it into your hand. Discard a card from your hand. Reshuffle your deck afterwards.

effects.name: Purity
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if all Spells in your discard pile are Cald, discard all of your non-Cald cards from play and discard one energy from each opposing Creature in play.

flavor:
"The strength of a weapon lies in the arm that wields it."
-- Barak, to Tryn
name: Barak's Ring

effects.name: Cover
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Spell or Power affects one of your Creatures in play, as it does so you may shuffle Barqua's Bubble into your deck and discard one energy from your Magi. If you do, the Spell or Power does not affect that Creature.

flavor:
"It's a bubble, silly. Beautiful magical energy on the outside, nothing at
all one the inside."
-- Bria, Vault Curator
name: Barqua's Bubble

flavor:
A flight of vemments charged Togoth, pummeling his nightmare creatures
into animite dust.
name: Barreling Vemment

powers.name: One-Two
powers.text: Choose a Creature. Remove one energy from that Creature for each Vemment you control.

effects.name: Wild Blooming
effects.text: All of your Paradwyn Creatures in play can use each of their Powers one additional time each turn. At the end of your opponent's next turn, discard from play all of your Creatures that used any of their Powers an additional time during your turn.

flavor: "The beatdown goes on..."
name: Bazha

effects.name: Reply
effects.text: Once per turn, immediately after an opposing player plays a Spell or Relic or uses a Power on one of his or her cards in play, you may use a Power on one of your cards in play.

flavor:
"Persistence will win out in the end. They will tire and go home. I hope."
-- Bazha, Lifekeeper
name: Bazha's Pendant

flavor: For hitting everything.
name: Beam of Light
text: Choose up to two Relics, Spells, and/or Creatures in play with two or less energy. Discard the chosen cards from play. All ongoing Powers and Effects of those cards are canceled.

effects.name: Underfoot
effects.text: Whenever Beeb is in an attack with a Creature with more than twice Beeb's current energy, Beeb removes three additional energy from the opposing Creature.

flavor:
"Sand? Scorching. Rocks? Sharp. Beebs? Pointy. Got it. Ow!"
-- Chur
name: Beeb

effects.name: Tunneling Charge
effects.text: If Bhatar attacks an Underneath Creature, add three energy to Bhatar before energy is removed.

effects.name: Charge
effects.text: If Bhatar attacks a non-Underneath Creature, add one energy to Bhatar before energy is removed.

flavor: It tears through Undermonsters like tree roots tear through soil -- only much faster.
name: Bhatar

flavor: Eidon's like... far out man.
name: Bikneets

powers.name: Shield
powers.text: Choose any one Naroom Creature in play. Discard Bikneets from play. The chosen Creature loses no energy from opponents' attacks, Spells or Powers until the beginning of your next turn.

flavor: Blackmail, pacifist style.
name: Binding
text: Choose any one of your Creatures and any one opposing Creature. Neither of the chosen Creatures can attack or use its Powers or Effects while the other is in play. Weave Shadow Magi may play Binding.

effects.name: Tunneling Attack
effects.text: While burrowed, Bisiwog may still attack as normal.

flavor: Shh. Listen. Do you hear that scratching?
name: Bisiwog

flavor:
"Their victimsss would mind if they ssstill had mindsss."
-- Ogar
name: Black Agovo

powers.name: Disrupt
powers.text: Choose any one player. Discard Black Agovo from play. The chosen player discards three cards from his or her hand.

text: Underneath Magi may play Black Agovo.

effects.name: Regenerate
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if your Magi is Bograth, you may play one copy of Black Stuff from your discard pile, paying all costs.

flavor:
"Man, this black stuff never comes off..."
-- Wence the Wanderer
name: Black Stuff

effects.name: Great Weave
effects.text: Whenever Blade Hyren attacks, you may move one enery from each of your other Weave Creatures in play to Blade Hyren.

effects.name: Bequest
effects.text: If Blade Hyren is specifically discarded from play by an opposing Spell or Power, move all energy on Blade Hyren to any one of your Creatures in play.

flavor:
"If you strike down the blade hyren, something else will become more
powerful than you can possibly imagine."
-- Zaya, Elder
name: Blade Hyren
text: Weave Shadow Magi can play Blade Hyren.

effects.name: Flame Boost
effects.text: Whenever any player plays a Spell that discards energy from a single Creature, you may discard Blast Gloves from play. If you do, that Spell discards twice as much energy.

flavor: Where does he gets those wonderful toys?
name: Blast Gloves

effects.name: Bleph Fu
effects.text: Whenever Bleph attacks a Creature, before energy is removed, add one energy to Bleph for each of the defending player's Creatures.

flavor:
"It may only be able to reach to your kneecaps, but believe me, that's
enough."
-- Yricho
name: Bleph

flavor:
Spreading suffering, heartless, sickening,
Blackened offering, darkness thickening.
name: Blight
text: Discard two energy from each non-Core, non-Bograth Creature and Magi in play. Add one energy to each Core and Bograth Creature and Magi in play. Bograth Magi may play Blight.

flavor: "I've been waiting a long time for this."
name: Blizzard
text: Choose one of your Creatures in play and one opposing Creature. Discard both chosen Creatures. Play Blizzard only after the Attack step.

effects.name: Coriolis
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, choose a Magi. If that Magi has no Creatures in play and your Magi has more energy than the chosen Magi's starting energy, discard Blizzard Core and defeat the chosen Magi.

flavor: Even the untalented can still draw upon the blizzard's core.
name: Blizzard Core

flavor: They'll knock the wind into you.
name: Blizzard Hyren

powers.name: Storm
powers.text: Discard one energy from each opposing frozen Creature. Discard on energy from each opposing frozen Magi for each of that Magi's frozen Creatures.

powers.name: Fury
powers.text: Blizzard Hyren can attack twice this turn.

flavor:
"No no, Ashgar, around here, we pronounce the 'L': bLLLLoom!"
-- Liriel, Bagala Trainer
name: Bloom
text: You can only play Bloom during an opponent's turn immediately after that opponent plays a Spell or Relic or uses a Power. After playing this Spell, immediately use any one Power on one of your cards in play or play a Spell from your hand.

flavor:
"That flower looks just like a blooming unjin."
-- Marella, Savant
name: Blooming Bracelet
text: Once per opposing turn, as energy is removed from one of your Creatures, add an equal amount of energy to your Magi.

effects.name: Artifice
effects.text: When Blu plays a Relic, he may discard one energy. If he does, draw one card.

flavor:
"Tony, I been guardin' that vault since I was old enough ta hold a
trident. Me daddy was a guard afore I was, and his daddy afore him. Nobody
ever told any of us about the outside world."
name: Blu

effects.name: Timid
effects.text: Blua Yajo cannot attack.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Blue Yajo is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Blue Yajo and any one of your other Orothe or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Cald may be tough, but they are surrounded by seas of water and grass."
-- Gia, Seer
name: Blue Yajo

powers.name: Strengthen
powers.text: CHoose any one other Creature in play. Add six energy to the chosen Creature. That Creature cannot attack this turn. Use this Power only before your Attack Step.

effects.name: Timid
effects.text: Blua Yajo cannot attack.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Blue Yajo is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Blue Yajo and any one of your other Orothe or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Cald may be tough, but they are surrounded by seas of water and grass."
-- Gia, Seer
name: Blue Yajo

powers.name: Strengthen
powers.text: CHoose any one other Creature in play. Add six energy to the chosen Creature. That Creature cannot attack this turn. Use this Power only before your Attack Step.

flavor: "Of course I'm depressed. People keep crushing my dreams."
name: Blygt

powers.name: Waking Dreams
powers.text: Choose up to three different Bograth Creatures in your discard pile and play each of them with one energy instead of its normal starting energy. An opposing player immediately discards any one of those Creatures from play. Those Creatures cannot attack this turn.

effects.name: Purity
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if all Spells in your discard pile are Bograth, discard all of your non-Bograth cards from play and choose an opposing Creature. If that Creature has more energy than your Magi's energize, move three energy from that Creature to your Magi.

effects.name: Weave Tactics
effects.text: Once per turn, when one of your Weave Creatures is attacked, you may switch it with any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Her terms. Always her terms. I hate fighting on her terms."
-- Barak, Cald Warlord
name: Bo'Ahsa

effects.name: Weave Tactics
effects.text: Once per turn, when one of your Weave Creatures is attacked, you may discard one energy from your Magi. If you do, choose one of your Weave Creatures in play. Replace the defending Creature with the chosen Creature.

flavor: Bo'Ahsa's terms are clearly inscribed on the inside of the shield.
name: Bo'Ahsa's Shield

flavor:
"It's not just the smell that grosses me out, it's the sounds as I walk
through the swamp."
-- Yaki, Tracker
name: Bog Stench
text: Until the end of your next turn, you are considered to have two additional Bograth Creatures in play for all of your Spells, Powers, and Effects.

flavor: In Bograth, the cycle of life means the mud is made of churned-up nightmares, waiting to be pulled out again.
name: Bog Stone

powers.name: Rummage
powers.text: Place any one Bograth Creature from your discard pile into your hand.

effects.name: Dream Draft
effects.text: Whenever an opponent plays a Relic, if your Magi is Bograth or Orothe, you may immediately play Bog Wellisk from your hand, ignoring all costs. You may play one Bog Wellisk in this way per turn.

flavor:
"What you talk'n 'bout, wellisk?"
-- Bria, Vault Curator
name: Bog Wellisk

effects.name: Dream Draft
effects.text: Whenever an opponent plays a Relic, if your Magi is Bograth or Orothe, you may immediately play Bog Wellisk from your hand, ignoring all costs. You may play one Bog Wellisk in this way per turn.

flavor:
"What you talk'n 'bout, wellisk?"
-- Bria, Vault Curator
name: Bog Wellisk

flavor: Some Orothe Creatures are more than 98% water.
name: Boil
text: Choose any one Magi in play. Discard one energy from each of the chosen Magi's Creatures in play. Discard two additional energy from each of the chosen Magi's Orothe and Bograth Creatures in play. Cald Magi may play still Spell without a regional penalty.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Bolobog loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor:
"Say hello to my little friends."
-- Emlob, Obsessive Detailer
name: Bolobog

powers.name: Strengthen
powers.text: Discard Bolobog from play. Choose any one Creature in play. Add one energy to the chosen Creature for each of your Bograth Creatures in play. Use this Power only before your Attack Step.

flavor:
"The scorch marks are too random, and the d'Reshi always walk in single
file to hide their numbers. This was done by Cald Magi."
-- Groll, Watchkeeper
name: Bombard
text: Roll a die. Discard that much energy, divided any way you choose, from up to three opposing Creatures.

effects.name: Frenzy
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if Bone Cragnoc is the largest Creature, add two energy to it.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: This Creature loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"The creatures in the Teeth are beginning to take a
slightly more malevolent look. Perhaps we should
investigate."
-- Groll, Keeper
name: Bone Cragnoc
text: Kybar's Teeth Shadow Magi may play Bone Cragnoc.

effects.name: Reclaim
effects.text: Whenever one of your cards is discarded from play by an opposing card, add one energy to Bone Grag. If the discarded card was an Oracle, draw a card.

flavor:
"The lesson of the bone grag: remember not to forget. I'm not sure how
useful that lesson is."
-- Drajan, Elder
name: Bone Grag

powers.name: Advance
powers.text: Choose another Oracle Creature. Add two energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"The more knowledge you gain, the better prepared you are."
-- Evu, Naroom Loremaster
name: Book of Ages

powers.name: Lore
powers.text: Draw one card.

flavor:
"Everything you'll ever need to know is in there, but it
will take a lifetime to read."
-- Tryn, Daughter of Runes
name: Book of Life

powers.name: Relearn
powers.text: Choose any one Spell in your discard pile. Move the chosen card to the top of your deck.

flavor:
"This is my BOOMSTICK!"
-- Ashgar, Flamekeeper
name: Boomstick

powers.name: Boom
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard eight energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor: No quarter. Just halves.
name: Borgor

powers.name: Sever
powers.text: Choose any two Creatures in play. Discard half of the energy from each of the chosen Creatures, rounded up.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As an opposing player plays a Creature, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one until the end of the turn, to a minimum starting energy of one. This Effect cannot raise a Creature's starting energy above the amount of energy on that player's Magi.

flavor:
"When in Paradwyn, if you don't hear anything, worry."
-- Bograthian watchwords
name: Boria

flavor: "I can make an energy band out of a baloo root. But sometimes I get a rod of coals."
name: Borse

powers.name: Tinker
powers.text: Choose any one of your Relics in play. Discard the chosen Relic from play. Reveal the top five cards of your deck to all players. Put one of each Relic revealed into play, regardless of region. Place all other revealed cards into your discard pile.

effects.name: Release
effects.text: You may play the Creature on Bottled City as if it were in your hand. Reduce the card's cost by three and ignore regional restrictions. Discard Bottled City after playing a Creature in this manner.

flavor:
"It's the oldest city in d'Resh."
"No wonder the streets are so narrow."
-- Harresh and Shimmer
name: Bottled City

powers.name: Capture
powers.text: If there are no cards on Bottled City, choose a deck. Reveal cards from the top of the chosen deck until you reveal a Creature. Place that Creature on Bottled City. Shuffle the other revealed cards into their deck.

flavor: Aieeeeeee!
name: Bottomless Pit
text: Choose any one Creature in play with less than five energy. Discard the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Mirror Shield
effects.text: Braggle loses no energy in attacks involving opposing Creatures of the same region as Braggle.

flavor:
"You know, if you look at it from this angle it kind of looks like water."
-- Calderan citizen
name: Braggle

powers.name: Morph
powers.text: Choose any one region. Until the start of your next turn, Braggle is a Creature of the chosen region, instead of Cald.

effects.name: Charge
effects.text: Whenever Brannix attacks a non-Arderial Creature, add one energy to Brannix before energy is removed.

effects.name: Absorption
effects.text: Whenever Brannix attacks an Arderial Creature, add three energy to Brannix before energy is removed.

flavor: Storms feed on storms.
name: Brannix
text: Arderial Shadow Magi may play Brannix.

effects.name: Obsession
effects.text: When you reveal Bria, name one Region. Bria may play Relics from that Region regardless of regional restrictions.

flavor: "I gotta get 'em! I gotta get 'em! I gotta get 'em all!"
name: Bria
starting: [Two non-Universal Relics from any one region]

effects.name: Desire
effects.text: After an opponent plays a Relic, add three energy to Bria, Relic Hunter.

effects.name: Loss
effects.text: After a Relic you control is discarded from play, remove one energy from Bria, Relic Hunter.

flavor: "Qwade, it's perfect! How do I use it?"
name: Bria, Relic Hunter

flavor:
"They'd be so much more fun to play with if they weren't so... fragile."
-- Laranel
name: Brittlebreak
text: All Creatures lose energy equal to the number of their Magi's Relics.

effects.name: Fertilize
effects.text: Whenever a Creature is discarded from play in an attack, add one energy to Brog.

flavor: "I am Brog. Resistance is fertile."
name: Brog

flavor: "Olabra's in charge now! You answer to her or you find yourself in exile. Got it?"
name: Brog, Swamp Thug

powers.name: Intimidation
powers.text: Discard one of your Creatures from play. Choose an opposing Creature and move half of its energy, rounded up, to Brog, Swamp Thug.

effects.name: Conceal
effects.text: Underneath Creatures you control that have only one energy can only be attacked by Underneath Creatures.

flavor: "A legion of your best troops? My 'pitiful little band' is quite safe from them."
name: Bronk

effects.text: Each of your non-Nar, non-Universal cards costs one additional energy to play.

flavor: "You young'uns these day! I walked uphill, barefoot, through five feet of snow, both ways, and I never complained!"
name: Bronn

powers.name: Snowball
powers.text: Choose one of your Creatures. Double the chosen Creature's energy. That Creature cannot add energy to other cards and its energy cannot be moved to other cards. Discard that Creature at the end of the turn.

effects.name: Slapstick
effects.text: When an opposing Spell or Power chooses your Magi, you may discard one of your frozen cards from play. If you do, the Spell or Power does nothing.

flavor:
"A little humor never hurt anyone? Let's see if we can fix that."
-- Bronn
name: Bronn's Battle Staff

effects.name: And We're Not Happy
effects.text: During your Draw step, if you play a Relic this turn, draw an additional card.

flavor: "Arrr, we aren't half the men we used to be."
name: Brothers of Vengeance

powers.name: We're Back
powers.text: If you have more Relics in play than any other player, discard a Relic you own from play to add two energy to each of your Creatures.

text: Brothers of Vengeance counts as two Magi.

flavor:
"When I find out who put that Brub in my Korrit pen, I'll..."
-- Ulk, Underwarden
name: Brub

powers.name: Scrub
powers.text: Choose any one Korrit in play. If you control the chosen Korrit, move all its energy to Brub. If not, discard the chosen Korrit.

flavor: After Agram's defeat, a fire team of Cald Magi pursued the feeling Shadow Magi into the Weave. No one foresaw the destruction they would cause.
name: Brushfire
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard two energy from the chosen Creature. Once per turn, you may play any one Brushfire from your discard pile as if it were in your hand.

flavor: After Agram's defeat, a fire team of Cald Magi pursued the feeling Shadow Magi into the Weave. No one foresaw the destruction they would cause.
name: Brushfire
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard two energy from the chosen Creature. Once per turn, you may play any one Brushfire from your discard pile as if it were in your hand.

flavor: "Pop!"
name: Bubble Xyx

powers.name: Burst
powers.text: Discard two energy from your Magi to draw three cards.

flavor: "Pop!"
name: Bubble Xyx

powers.name: Burst
powers.text: Discard two energy from your Magi to draw three cards.

effects.name: Ambush
effects.text: When you play Bulabantu, choose a Creature. Discard three energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Not to self: do not pick berries that stick out of sand dunes."
-- Wence
name: Bulabantu

effects.name: Ambush
effects.text: When you play Bulabantu, choose a Creature. Discard three energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Spotted a Bulabantu."
-- Paradwyn maxim meaning "too late"
name: Bulabantu

effect.name: Shiftier
effect.text: Your Creatures lose no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor:
"Can't touch these."
-- Bulomp's motto
name: Bulomp

effects.name: Flee
effects.text: Whenever Bungaloo is defeated in an attack, choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Add two energy to the chosen Creature or Magi.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Bungaloo attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Bungaloo and one of your other Weave or Naroom Creatures in play.

flavor:
The bungaloo's a friendly thing.
They'll swarm around you if you sing.
But if an angry thought you think,
They'll disappear within a blink.
name: Bungaloo

effects.name: Flee
effects.text: Whenever Bungaloo is defeated in an attack, choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Add two energy to the chosen Creature or Magi.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Bungaloo attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Bungaloo and one of your other Weave or Naroom Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Yes, it's cute, but they shed like... like... ACHOO!
Get it out of here! ACHOO!"
-- Gia, Weave Seer
name: Bungaloo

flavor: There isn't much they can do to hurt you if they have to get through three meters of rock and soil first.
name: Burrow
text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. For X turns, the chosen Creatures cannot attack or lose more than two energy per turn from attacks or your opponents' Spells or Powers. The chosen creature is considered "burrowed." X includes your own turns.

effects.name: Karma
effects.text: If any Creature attacks and defeats Bwill, discard that Creature from play.

flavor:
"So, harpoon the blasted shrimplobsterfish! What's the worst that could
happen?"
-- Korg, to Zet
name: Bwill

flavor:
"The life energy of the forest courses through our veins."
-- Bythan
name: Bythan's Gift
text: If you have a Creature in play, choose any one Creature in play. Add seven energy to the chosen Creature. Return any one of your Creatures in play to your hand, discarding all of that Creature's energy.

effects.name: Thorn
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Magi draws a card outside of the Draw Step, discard one energy from that Magi.

effects.name: Deny
effects.text: Powers and Effects on Shadow Magi cannot be used while Cactus Dryte is in play.

flavor:
"Time for you to experience d'Reshi hospitality!"
-- Korremar
name: Cactus Dryte

flavor:
"Three! Three shadow geysers--"
"Okay! Stop it!"
-- Korg and Zet
name: Cald Shadow Geyser
text: The energy cost for this Geyser is zero if played by an Cald Shadow Magi. To play this Geyser, discard energy from each of your Creatures in play equal to the cost of their most expensive Power. If you discarded at least five energy, place this Geyser on the table. All Powers on Cald cards in play cost two additional energy to use. All Powers on your Core cards cost one less energy to use, to a minimum of one. You may not play another Cald Shadow Geyser while this one is in play. If your Magi leaves play, you may keep all but one of your Shadow Geysers in play. Agram does not discard any Shadow Geysers from play when he leaves play.

effects.name: Heartwarming
effects.text: After a Cald Power removes energy from one or more Creatures, you may discard Caldera Aq to draw a card.

flavor: The Cald Magi charged up the slopes of Kybar's Teeth, hurling fire as they went. Before them loomed the forces of the Dark Twins.
name: Caldera Aq

flavor: Becoming one with the treetops, the canopy hyren is unparalleled in the art of sneak attacks.
name: Canopy Hyren

powers.name: Fear
powers.text: Remove two energy from each Stalked Creature.

effects.name: Resilience
effects.text: If Carillion attacks a Creature that starts the attack with less than three energy, Carillion loses no energy in the attack.

flavor:
"Throwing Weebos in front of a charging Carillion is like
trying to cut down a tree with a pocket knife."
-- Pruitt, Naroom Ringsmith
name: Carillion

effects.name: Rampant Growth
effects.text: After another Creature you control defeats an opposing Creature in an attack, add three energy to Carillion Titan.

flavor: As Yaki's creatures charged the foul minions of the Core, the carillion titan continued to grow, moving slowly but surely toward the Great Library.
name: Carillion Titan

flavor:
"Looks like a good place to have lunch."
-- Korg, to Zet
name: Carnivorous Cave
text: Discard one energy from each Creature and Magi in play. Carnivorous Cave does not affect burrowed Creatures.

flavor: Sometimes it's not enough that they lose.
name: Cataclysm
text: Discard all non-Magi cards from play. Show your hand to all players and discard all non-Arderial, non-Core cards revealed. Opposing cards do not affect Cataclysm as it is played. Arderial Shadow Magi may play Cataclysm.

effects.name: Stir In
effects.text: Immediately after you play a Nar Spell, you may discard one energy from your Magi to place the Spell under Cauldron of Ice.

flavor:
"So what's so tough about teaching someone how it works?"
-- Bria, Vault Curator
name: Cauldron of Ice

powers.name: Dish Out
powers.text: Place any card under Cauldron of Ice into your hand. Discard a card from your hand.

flavor: Blu drew up some plans for making Hyren-plate armor. Then he remembered that, like all dream creatures, they disappeared when they were defeated.
name: Cave Hyren

powers.name: Energy Transfer
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Add X energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Stop rocking the cave... hey, come back here!"
-- Korg, to Zet
name: Cave In
text: Discard one energy from each non-Underneath Creature and Magi in play. Discard one additional energy from each Arderial Creature and Magi.

effects.name: Defense
effects.text: If Cave Rudwot is attacked, add two energy to it before energy is removed.

flavor: Don't take on a Rudwot in its home, unless you like getting hurt.
name: Cave Rudwot

effects.name: Fearsome
effects.text: Cawh loses three less energy in attacks. Other cards cannot prevent Cawh from losing energy.
If Cawh is discarded or returned to your hand by an opposing card while it has energy, discard six energy from Cawh instead. Opponents cannot gain control of Cawh.
Cawh can only be played during the Play Creatures step. You cannot play Creatures while Cawh is in play, and you cannot play Cawh if you have other Creatures in play.

flavor: On a scale of one to ten, there is no number large enough.
name: Cawh

flavor:
"I'm the king of spades! The Shovel'n man! The Spademaster! Mr.
Diggalicious! The Boss or Burrow!"
name: Celebrated Hero

powers.name: Pump You Up
powers.text: Choose a Burrowed Creature or a Creature with the Effect 'Invulnerability'. Restore the chosen Creature to its starting energy. Skip your Draw step this turn.

flavor:
"Why do you keep asking me that? Of course I can dig it!"
-- Gogor, to Yaki
name: Celebrated Hero

powers.name: Pump You Up
powers.text: Choose a Burrowed Creature or a Creature with the Effect 'Invulnerability'. Restore the chosen Creature to its starting energy. Skip your Draw step this turn.

flavor:
"To the Core with knowledge. I need power NOW!"
-- Fossik, Underkeeper
name: Channeler's Gloves

powers.name: Channeling
powers.text: Discard two cards from your hand. Add two energy to your Magi.

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Core and Weave Spells and Powers do not affect Chaos Flugg.

flavor:
"Curses! How does Gia always know where we are? This place is no longer
safe for us."
-- Ashio
name: Chaos Flugg

powers.name: Dark Demanding
powers.text: Discard Chaos Flugg from play. Discard all Core and all Weave Creatures from play.

text: Weave Magi can play Chaos Flugg.

effects.name: Weakness
effects.text: If Chaos Jile is attacked, discard three energy from it after energy is removed.

effects.name: Rebound
effects.text: If Chaos Jile attacks a Creature, add four energy to it after energy is removed.

flavor:
"More kittiesss to play with the child."
-- Ogar
name: Chaos Jile
text: Naroom Magi may play Chaos Jile.

effects.name: Guile
effects.text: Whenever Chaos Plith defeats a Creature in an attack, draw a card. If Evu is your Magi, draw an additional card.

flavor:
"C'mon, you can trust me," hissed the plith.
"Evu will vouch for my character."
name: Chaos Plith
text: Naroom Magi may play Chaos Plith.

effects.name: Impending
effects.text: Whenever your Magi energizes, roll a die. Add Chaos Counters equal to the die roll to Chaos Sphere.

flavor: Your time is running out.
name: Chaos Sphere

powers.name: Doom
powers.text: Choose any one Magi in play. Discard 15 Chaos Counters from Chaos Sphere, and discard Chaos Sphere from play. Discard from play all Creatures controlled by the chosen Magi.

effects.name: Scattershot
effects.text: Whenever Charg attacks a Creature, before energy is removed, discard one energy from each of the defending Magi's Creatures. Discard an additional energy from each of the defending Magi's Orothe Creatures.

flavor:
"Close counts for a lot with this thing."
-- Gar, Healer
name: Charg

effects.name: Dreamform
effects.text: Whenever Chasm Jile is attacked, you may discard it from play. If you do, play any one d'Resh or Weave Creature from your hand with its starting energy, ignoring all costs. The played Creature replaces Chasm Jile as the defender.

flavor:
"Off to catch a chasm jile."
-- d'Resh phrase meaning 'having some fun.'
name: Chasm Jile

effects.name: Dreamform
effects.text: Whenever Chasm Jile is attacked, you may discard it from play. If you do, play any one d'Resh or Weave Creature from your hand with its starting energy, ignoring all costs. The played Creature replaces Chasm Jile as the defender.

flavor:
"Off to catch a chasm jile."
-- d'Resh phrase meaning 'having some fun.'
name: Chasm Jile

effects.name: Companionship
effects.text: Once per turn, when you play an Eebit from your hand, draw a card.

effects.name: Swarm
effects.text: All of your Eebits in play gain 'ENERGIZE: 1'.

flavor:
"The more the merrier. And the furrier... and the noisier... and the..."
-- Poad, Naroom Innkeeper
name: Chayla

effects.name: Waste Not
effects.text: At the end of each turn, each players shuffles his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

effects.name: Want Not
effects.text: At the beginning of your Draw step, if you have no cards in your hand, draw two extra cards.

flavor:
"When I walk with this thing, it makes me look extra cool."
-- Odavast, Elder
name: Chill Cane

flavor:
"I thought you said the Sands were hot!"
-- Lanyx
name: Chill of Night
text: Choose a Creature with less energy than the number of cards in its Magi's hand. Discard the chosen Creature.

flavor: It was the first Chogus created by Kybar, and it turned to stone so it could watch over its resting place forever.
name: Chogulith

powers.name: Strengthen
powers.text: Choose any one Chogus in play. Roll one die. Add that much energy to the chosen Chogus.

effects.name: Exuberance
effects.text: All of your cards that check for the largest opposing Creature in play instead check for the smallest opposing Creature in play, and all of your cards that check for the smallest opposing Creature in play instead check for the largest opposing Creature in play.

flavor:
"You'd think twice the heads would mean twice the smarts."
-- Wessig
name: Chogus

effects.name: Panic
effects.text: Whenever you play a card, discard two energy from Chogus Little. Whenever an opponent plays a card, add two energy to Chogus Little.

flavor:
"Is the sky falling?"
-- Hok
name: Chogus Little

effects.name: Smash
effects.text: Whenever a player plays a Relic from his or her hand, discard it from play.

flavor: I've got more rocks than you have toys.
name: Chur

flavor:
"Anyone for leftovers?"
-- Magam, Ringsmith
name: Cinder Hyren

powers.name: Dream Pyre
powers.text: Shuffle up to five Cald Creatures from your discard pile into your deck and choose a Creature. Remove emergy from that Creature equal to the number of Creatures you shuffled into your deck.

flavor: As the collected forces of the Moonlands converged on the slopes of Kybar's Teeth, darboks began to circle, looking for weak creatures to take advantage of.
name: Circling Darbok

powers.name: Passing Shadow
powers.text: Choose an opposing Creature. If the chosen Creature is discarded from play this turn, draw a card.

flavor:
"There is good in her, I can sense it."
-- Ulk, to Grej
name: Cleansing
text: Name any one non-Magi Core cards. For the rest of this game, all cards of the name are Kybar's Teeth or Underneath, your choice, instead of Core.

flavor:
"There is good in her, I can sense it."
-- Ulk, to Grej
name: Cleansing
text: Name any one non-Magi Core cards. For the rest of this game, all cards of the name are Kybar's Teeth or Underneath, your choice, instead of Core.

effects.name: Shield
effects.text: All opposing Spells and Powers that affect one or more of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures in play instead affect only Cliff Hyren, if Cliff Hyren can be affected by the Spell or Power.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Cliff Hyren loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor: Prowling the peaks and scouting for prey, they are the creatures most commonly seen by outsiders... briefly.
name: Cliff Hyren

effects.name: Higher Ground
effects.text: Whenever you play a Kybar's Teeth Creature, add one energy to your Magi.
You may discard Climbing Staff from your hand or from play whenever an opposing Spell, Power, or Effect is affecting only your Magi or only your hand. The Spell, Power, or Effect does nothing.

flavor:
"Come on up and get me!"
-- Kazm
name: Climbing Staff

powers.name: Healing Rain
powers.text: Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Move Cloud Narth's energy to the chosen Creature or Magi.

powers.name: Healing Storm
powers.text: Choose any one Creature or Magi in play, and a Pharan you control. Move the chosen Pharan's energy to the chosen Creature or Magi. Move Cloud Narth's energy to the chosen Creature or Magi. Add three energy to the chosen Creature or Magi.

effects.name: Mystic Binding
effects.text: As you play Cloud Orshaa, discard up to four Arderial Spells from your hand. Add two energy to Cloud Orshaa for each Spell discarded.

flavor: An Orshaa can spell the difference between victory and defeat.
name: Cloud Orshaa

flavor:
Cool air will rush into places the heat leaves behind;
The is the law of the winds and the law of the mind.
name: Cloud Sceptre

powers.name: Mindwinds
powers.text: Discard X cards from your hand. Draw X cards.

flavor:
"Make like a tree and go away!"
-- Ven
name: Coal Ergar

powers.name: Enflame
powers.text: Discard one energy from each opposing Creature with more energy than Coal Erger, then discard one energy from each Orothe Creature. Discard two energy from Coal Erger. Opposing cards cannot alter the amount of energy discarded by Enflame.

effects.name: Strangle
effects.text: Reduce all energize rates in play by one.

flavor:
"Anyone can choke under this pressure."
-- Warrada, the Shadow
name: Collar of Despair

effects.name: Spare Parts
effects.text: Your Collosus and Construct cards cost one less to play, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"A collosit is more than just a handy mechanic, it does windows too!"
-- Tuku
name: Collosit
text: Collosit may not be chosen by an Effect, Power or Spell that could cause it to change controllers.

effects.name: Anti-Magic
effects.text: Colossus may not be affected by Spells, Powers or Effects that specifically discard Creatures from play. Your Spells, Powers and Effects may not alter the amount of energy on Colossus, or prevent Colossus from losing energy.

flavor:
"You can fight a war with cloaks and daggers.
But you don't have to."
-- Jaela, Arderial Regis
name: Colossus

effects.name: Bright Tail
effects.text: Whenever Comet Hyren attacks, it removes twice as much energy as it has from the defending Creature.

flavor: The star that burns twice as bright burns half as long.
name: Comet Hyren

effects.name: Spelltap
effects.text: Whenever you play an Orothe Spell, add one energy to Coral Hyren.

flavor: Because of its size, strength, and ability to feed off its Magi's spells, this hyren fears nothing short of a Cawh.
name: Coral Hyren

effects.name: Playful
effects.text: Whenever Coral Pyder attacks a Magi, it removes no energy in the attack. Instead, energize your Magi.

flavor:
"It couldn't make enemies from a kit."
-- Quilla
name: Coral Pyder

effects.name: Betrayal
effects.text: Whenever you gain control of an opposing card, choose any one Core or Orothe card in your discard pile and place it into your hand.

flavor:
"This is the deepest treachery of all!"
-- Mobis, Elder
name: Corathan
text: Orothe Magi can play Corathan.

flavor: Rain that chooses who it falls on.
name: Core Grag

powers.name: Firestorm
powers.text: Choose any one Magi in play. Discard Core Grag from play. Discard two energy from each of the chosen Magi's Creature in play. Discard three energy from the chosen Magi.

text: Cald Magi may play Core Grag.

effects.name: Dissect
effects.text: Each turn, during your Draw Step, draw one additional card for each Creature Core Hyren attacked and defeated that turn.

flavor:
"Your knowledge will not die with you."
-- Morag, the Executor
name: Core Hyren

flavor: Finish him.
name: Corf

powers.name: Final Blow
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play that was attacked this turn. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor: Unpredictable as the weather.
name: Corf Pearl

powers.name: Weathercall
powers.text:
Roll one die.
1, 2, or 3 = Remove three energy from your Magi.
4 or 5 = Choose any one Creature in play.
Discard two energy from the chosen Creature.
6 = Choose any one Creature in play. Add
three energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor: Give yourself to the darkness.
name: Corrupt
text: Choose any one Magi in play. Attack Corrupt to the chosen Magi. If the chosen Magi is discarded from play, discard Corrupt from play. When a Creature is played by any Magi, discard Corrupt from play. The Creature played becomes a Core Creature instead of its original region, and your Magi gains control of that Creature.

flavor:
"In the Weave, each and every blade of grass is a 
potential enemy or ally. It all depends on your perspective."
-- Zaya, Weave Elder
name: Countless Blades
text: Move one energy from each opposing Creature to your Magi. Your Powers, Spells and Effects cannot increase the energy moved by Countless Blades.

effects.name: Rebound
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if Crag Quor is smaller than the smallest opposing Creature in play, add four energy to Crag Quor.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Crag Quor loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"Wow, that makes my heart go boom-boom! I'm
all excited to start the fight!"
-- Gogor, Celebrated Hero of the Underneath
name: Crag Quor

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Cragnoc loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"In a Cragnoc's grip."
-- Kybarite phrase meaning "safe"
name: Cragnoc

powers.name: Lend a Hand
powers.text: Roll two dice. Add that amount of energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"Whadda ya mean 'There's no such thing as sandy craws'?"
-- Korg, Exiled Emperor of Bograth
name: Craw

powers.name: Sift
powers.text: Discard Craw from play. Search your discard pile for a d'Resh Relic and add it to your hand.

flavor:
"Who could have dreamed up a creature that hates its own kind so much?"
-- Sinder, Apprentice
name: Creeping Ainjer

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing Bograth Creature. Remove one energy from it and add three energy to your Magi.

text:
Creeping Ainjer's text cannot be altered.
Core Magi can play Creeping Ainjer.

flavor: Cold winds from the mountains, and cold fogs from the swamp... are they really all that different?
name: Creeping Chill
text: Until the end of your next turn, whenever one of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures is attacked, it gains three energy for each of your Bograth Creatures in play, and whenever one of your Bograth Creatures attacks, it gains three energy for each of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures in play.

flavor: Cold winds from the mountains, and cold fogs from the swamp... are they really all that different?
name: Creeping Chill
text: Until the end of your next turn, whenever one of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures is attacked, it gains three energy for each of your Bograth Creatures in play, and whenever one of your Bograth Creatures attacks, it gains three energy for each of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures in play.

flavor:
"At first, we thought that they were just honing their
hunting instincts but their ferocity was too intense."
-- Hok
name: Crouching Xamf

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing Kybar's Teeth Creature. Remove one energy from it and add four energy to your largest Creature.

text:
Crouching Xamf's text cannot be altered.
Core Magi may play Crouching Xamf.

effects.name: Mostly Regal Presence
effects.text: All non-Core, non-Bograth Creatures in play lose one energy, before energy is removed, whenever they attack one of your Bograth Creatures.

flavor:
"It fits me like a glove!"
"Korg, you wear it on your head."
-- Korg and Zet
name: Crown of Grath

flavor:
"Do not worry about Naroom's allies, for I am fear. Uh... here."
-- Hrada, Dark Ruler
name: Crushing Darkness
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. If this discards the cosen Creature from play, play it as a Core Creature with half of its starting energy, rounded up, ignoring all costs. That Creature cannot attack or use any of its Powers this turn. Shadow Magi cannot play this Spell.

flavor:
"Eep! It feels like the mushrooms are closing in on me."
"Relax. They are."
-- Grej and Ulk
name: Crushing Fungus
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. If this discards the chosen Creature from play, its Magi does not energize on his or her next turn. Only Underneath Magi and Underneath Shadow Magi can play Crushing Fungus.

flavor:
"Nothing's more fun than just sitting around watching the grass grow!"
-- Kesia, Musician
name: Crushing Growth
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. If this discards the chosen Creature from play, all opposing Creatures must attack on their player's next turn, if able. Only Weave Magi and Weave Shadow Magi can play Crushing Growth.

flavor:
"No, trust me, it is just you."
-- Valkan, Pyromancer and former bridge-builder
name: Crushing Heat
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. If this discards the chosen Creature from play, its Magi cannot use any of his or her Powers or Effects or any Powers or Effects on his or her Relics until the start of your next turn. Only Cald Magi and Cald Shadow Magi can play Crushing Heat.

flavor:
"For something that floats, ice is awfully heavy."
-- Bronn
name: Crushing Ice
text: Choose an opposing Creature. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. If this discards that Creature from play, discard three energy from the chosen Creature's Magi. Only Nar and Nar Shadow Magi can play Crushing Ice.

flavor: Tryn and Barak watched in horror as the ash hyren stood aside. The great shadow beast loomed over Barak. "Run!" yelled Tryn, as she brought forth great roots to beat the monster back.
name: Crushing Roots
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. If this discards the chosen Creature from play, choose any one of your Creatures in play. Add three energy to that Creature. Only Naroom Magi and Naroom Shadow Magi can play Crushing Roots.

flavor:
"I keep looking for the grain that broke the quanjuel's back."
-- Harresh
name: Crushing Sands
text: Choose an opposing Creature. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. If this discards that Creature from play, discard one energy from ech of that player's Creatures. Only d'Resh Magi and d'Resh Shadow Magi can play Crushing Sands.

flavor:
"Oh... my... there are things we were not meant to know..."
-- Stradus, Warrior
name: Crushing Stench
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. If the chosen Creature is discarded from play, play a Bograth Creature from your hand with two energy instead of its starting energy. That Creature cannot attack this turn. Only Bograth Magi and Bograth Shadow Magi can play Crushing Stench.

flavor: Weight patiently.
name: Crushing Stones
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. If this discards the chosen Creature from play, add one energy to each of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures in play. Only Kybar's Teeth Magi and Kybar's Teeth Shadow Magi can play Crushing Stones.

flavor:
"(GASP!) IT MUST BE MINE!"
-- Bria, Collector, upon seeing the Scroll of Fire
name: Crushing Surf
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. If this discards the chosen Creature from play, choose any one of that player's Relics in play. Gain control of the chosen Relic.

flavor:
"Mmmm. Crushing vines."
-- Culla, Jungle Guard
name: Crushing Vines
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Remove four energy from the chosen Creature. If the chosen Creature is discarded from play, until the end of your turn, all of that player's Creatures are stalked; whenever a stalked Creature is attacked, discard one energy from the stalked Creature before energy is removed. Only Paradwyn Magi and Paradwyn Shadow Magi can play Crushing Vines.

flavor:
"It takes a willful man to stand alone in the Moonlands 
with no allegiances but himself."
-- Orwin, Elder
name: Crushing Will
text: Choose a Creature and remove four energy from it. If this discards the Creature from play, choose up to two non-Universal Relics and discard them from play.  Only Universal and Universal Shadow Magi can play Crushing Will.

flavor:
"Wow, this wind could blow away a furok... hey, where's my furok?"
-- Sperri, Friend of Furoks
name: Crushing Winds
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. If this discards the chosen Creature from play, draw two cards. Only Arderial Magi and Arderial Shadow Magi can play Crushing Winds.

flavor: We have no trampling feet with which to make thunder, but we have thunder with which to make trampling feet.
name: Cry of Thunder
text: Play Cry of Thunder only before your Attack Step. Add two energy to each of your Arderial Creatures in play. Also, add one energy to each of your Xyx in play. At the end of your turn, discard from play each of your Creatures that did not attack this turn.

flavor: The Cave Rudwot turned to face him, and Wence took a step back. The lizard's eye were taking on the glow of the fallen Arboll.
name: Crystal Arboll

powers.name: Healing Light
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard Crystal Arboll from play. Add two energy to the chosen Creature. If the chosen Creature is Underneath, add two additional energy.

effects.name: Renew
effects.text: After a Crystal Creature is discarded from play on an opposing turn, draw a card.

flavor:
"All you could wish for in fine crystal..."
-- Ulmi
name: Crystal Goblet

effects.name: Ricochet
effects.text: Once per turn, as Crystal Hyren is attacked, remove one energy from each opposing Creature.

flavor:
"Look out for shrapnel!"
-- Ulk, Prodigy
name: Crystal Hyren

powers.name: Illuminate
powers.text: Choose a Spell in play and discard it.

flavor:
"The bee's knees! The jile's style! I am all of these times twenty!"
-- Gogor, Celebrated Hero of the Underneath
name: Crystal Jile

powers.name: Earthbound
powers.text: Choose any Magi in play. Add six energy to the chosen Magi.

text: Underneath Shadow Magi may play Crystal Jile.

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Crystal Lascinth is not affected by Core Spells or Powers.

effects.name: Spines
effects.text: Whenever one of your Underneath Creatures is attacked, remove one energy from the attacking Creature before energy is removed. Remove an additional energy if the attacking Creature is Core.

flavor:
"We have nothing to fear... but them! Run!"
-- Togoth
name: Crystal Lascinth

effects.name: Anti-Magic
effects.text: Crystal Parmalag is not affected by opposing Spells, Powers or Effects that specifically discard Creatures from play. Your Spells, Powers, and Effects may not prevent Crystal Parmalag from losing energy.

flavor: It's like a colossus, but with less maintenance.
name: Crystal Parmalag

effects.name: Regenerate
effects.text: At the end of each opponent's turn, if Crystal Saris was not attacked, add two energy to it.

flavor: The Shadow Magi were far too busy fending off Gogor's assault to notice that the saris had doubled in size.
name: Crystal Saris

flavor:
"Oh no you don't!"
-- Motash, Elder
name: Crystal Shield
text: Choose one of your Creatures and attach Crystal Shield to it. While Crystal Shield is attached, the Creature gains "Effect - Deflect: Once per turn, as an opposing Spell or Power chooses this Creature, you may choose another Creature that could have been chosen by that Spell or Power. The Spell or Power chooses that Creature instead. Discard Crystal Shield from play."

effects.name: Dream Charge
effects.text: At the end of each opponent's turn, if Crystal Twinklet was not attacked, draw a card.

effects.name: Deflect
effects.text: Once per turn, as an opposing Spell or Power chooses Crystal Twinklet, you may choose another Creature that could have been chosen by that Spell or Power. The Spell or Power chooses that Creature instead.

flavor:
"Ooh-pretty! Can I touch it?"
-- Gruk
name: Crystal Twinklet

flavor:
"I have nothing to hide, Korremar. Do you?"
-- Chur
name: Crystal Vision
text: Attach Crystal Vision to your Magi. Play with your hand face up on the table. As long as there are only d'Resh cards in your hand, each of your cards costs one less energy to play, to a minimum of one. You cannot play a second Crystal Vision while this card remains attached to your Magi.

flavor: "Halt!... No, no, uh... Don't move!... uh, no, that's not it... uh... Freeze! Ah, there we go." -- Halsted
name: Crystallize
text: Choose a Creature. Attach Crystallize to the chosen Creature. While Crystallize is attached, the chosen Creature cannot attack. When Crystallize is discarded, draw a card.

effects.name: Surround
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures in play attacks a stalked Creature, add one energy to the attacking Creature before energy is removed.

flavor:
"Well, as Marella would say, 'Culla me happy to meet you!' Ha ha... ha...
never mind."
-- M'lady Iyori, Emissary to Paradwyn
name: Culla

flavor:
"Funny, I usually hear my opponents curse at the abaquist."
-- Arosa, Stormkeeper
name: Curse of the Abaquist
text: Choose any one of your Orothe or Paradwyn Creatures in play.
