Until the end of the turn, the chosen Creature gains the text: "Power -- Possess: Choose any one opposing Creature in play with less energy than this Creature. Discard this Creature from play. Gain control of the chosen Creature. That Creature cannot attack this turn." Orothe Shadow Magi and Paradwyn Shadow Magi can play Curse of the Abaquist.

flavor:
"Funny, I usually hear my opponents curse at the abaquist."
-- Arosa, Stormkeeper
name: Curse of the Abaquist
text: Choose any one of your Orothe or Paradwyn Creatures in play. Until the end of the turn, the chosen Creature gains the text: "Power -- Possess: Choose any one opposing Creature in play with less energy than this Creature. Discard this Creature from play. Gain control of the chosen Creature. That Creature cannot attack this turn." Orothe Shadow Magi and Paradwyn Shadow Magi can play Curse of the Abaquist.

flavor:
"Attacking the Vashp"
-- Naroom expression meaning "courting disaster"
"Befriending the Vashp"
-- Arderial expression meaning "courting disaster"
name: Cyclone Vashp

powers.name: Cyclone
powers.text: Choose one of your Creatures and one of your opponent's Creatures in play. Discard as much energy from your opponent's Creature as is on your Creature. Discard your Creature from play.

effects.name: Backlash
effects.text: Whenever Cyclone Xyx is attacked, before energy is removed, remove one energy from each of the attacking player's Creature.

flavor:
"They should have listened to me. They may not know it now, but they'll
wish they had."
-- Jaela, Lady of the Sky
name: Cyclone Xyx

powers.name: Storm Front
powers.text: Discard one energy from each opposing Arderial Creature.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: At the end of your turn, add one energy to each of your burrowed and illusionary Creatures that attacked this turn.

effects.name: Escape
effects.text: Your burrowed and illusionary Creatures that are discarded from play by opposing cards that specifically discard Creatures from play are instead returned to your hand.

flavor: "I think I thought I saw things you can't even imagine."
name: d'Jarvish

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: At the end of your turn, add one energy to each of your burrowed and illusionary Creatures that attacked this turn.

effects.name: Escape
effects.text: Your burrowed and illusionary Creatures that are discarded from play by opposing cards that specifically discard Creatures from play are instead returned to your hand.

flavor: "I think I thought I saw things you can't even imagine."
name: d'Jarvish

flavor: "The best way to improve your memory is to decide what you want to forget."
name: d'Rasha

powers.name: Foretelling
powers.text: Choose a player's deck. Look at the top three cards of the chosen deck. You may choose one of the cards and place it at the bottom of that deck. Place the remaining cards on the top of that deck in any order.

effects.name: Dream Inversion
effects.text: Opposing Spells, Powers, and other Effects that discard energy from Dagok instead add an equal amount of energy. Opposing Spells, Powers, and other Effects that add energy to Dagok instead discard an equal amount of energy.

flavor:
"It hurts so good."
-- Warrada, The Shadow Empress
name: Dagok
text: Naroom Magi can play Dagok. Naroom Shadow Magi can play Dagok for one less energy.

flavor:
"He may not seem helpful at first, but he always comes through when you
need him."
-- Ythra
name: Dakat

powers.name: Deja Vu
powers.text: Discard a card from your hand. The next time this turn one of your Spells or Powers removes energy from an opposing Creature, choose another Creature in play. Remove an equal amount of energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor: You can fly on the wings of a darbok... until it drops you.
name: Darbok

powers.name: Divebomb
powers.text: Choose one of your other Creatures and an opposing Creature. Return your chosen Creature to your hand, discarding its energy. Discard four energy from the opposing chosen Creature.

text: d'Resh Shadow Magi can play Darbok.

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Core Spells and Powers do not affect Darge.

effects.name: Pummel
effects.text: Whenever Darge attacks a Core Creature, Darge loses no energy in the attack.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Darge loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor: A mountain to bury the darkness.
name: Darge

flavor: O'Qua was surprised to find the Core using a weapon from her own arsenal.
name: Dark Ayebaw

powers.name: Implode
powers.text: Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Discard Dark Ayebaw from play, and discard X Core and/or Arderial cards from your hand. Discard X+2 energy from the chosen Creature or Magi.

text: Arderial Magi may play Dark Ayebaw.

effects.name: Solid
effects.text: Dark Cragnoc cannot be discarded from play by opposing Spells that specifically discard Creatures from play. Your cards cannot add energy to Dark Cragnoc.

flavor:
"Give your friends a hug. Give your enemies a big, hard squeeze."
-- Warrada, The Shadow
name: Dark Cragnoc

powers.name: Cremate
powers.text: Choose any one opposing Creature in play. Discard energy from Dark Cragnoc equal to the amount of energy on the chosen Creature. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

text: Kybar's Teeth Magi can play Dark Cragnoc.

effects.name: Revile
effects.text: Whenever Dark Furok attacks and loses energy, discard half that amount of energy, rounded down, from any one Creature in play.

flavor:
"I don't even WANT to know what's perched up there..."
-- Tony Jones
name: Dark Furok
text: Naroom Magi may play Dark Furok.

flavor:
"I've got a bad feeling about this."
-- Hrada, Dark Lord
name: Dark Portents
text: Choose a player. Reveal the top five cards of the chosen player's deck. Add one energy to your Magi for each Creature revealed. You may discard one of the revealed cards. Put the remaining cards back on the chosen player's deck in the same order.

flavor: Harror ambushed Dey in the vast expanses of d'Resh. "Time to pay, fool", she hissed, between clenched teeth.
name: Dark Vellup

powers.name: Purge
powers.text: Discard a card from your hand and draw a card. If a copy of the card you discarded is in play, draw an extra card.

text: Arderial Magi may play Dark Vellup.

flavor: One hyren to bring them all, and in the darkness bind them.
name: Darkbreed Hyren

powers.name: Subvert
powers.text: Choose any one hyren in play. Gain control of the chosen hyren. That hyren may not attack this turn.

effects.name: Smolder
effects.text: Whenever a player draws a card, discard one energy from each of that player's Creatures in play. Darkbreed's Minion loses no energy from this Effect.

flavor: "I am the mouth of the darkbreed hyren."
name: Darkbreed's Minion
text: Cald Magi can play Darkbreed's Minion.

flavor:
"I don't mind the darkness too much. Look at the alternative; we could see
where we're going!"
-- Zet
name: Darkness
text: Until the end of the turn, all of your Bograth Creatures in play gain "Power -- Darkness: Discard this Creature from play. Choose an opposing Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Use this Power only before your Attack Step."

effects.name: Salvage
effects.text: Whenever your Magi loses energy from an opposing card, add an equal amount of energy to Dasia.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Dasia, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Dasia attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Dasia and any one of your other Paradwyn or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: Dasias are perhaps the most popular pets in the Weave.
name: Dasia

effects.name: Salvage
effects.text: Whenever your Magi loses energy from an opposing card, add an equal amount of energy to Dasia.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Dasia, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Dasia attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Dasia and any one of your other Paradwyn or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: Dasias are perhaps the most popular pets in the Weave.
name: Dasia

flavor:
"Mmmmmm... more sand..."
-- Dey
name: Daydreams
text: Reverse the order of your deck. (Deal your deck, one card at a time, into a single face-down pile.) Draw a card.

flavor: It's a trap!
name: Deadfall
text: Until the beginning of your next turn, the next two Creatures played lose half of their starting energy, rounded up. Naroom Shadow Magi may play Deadfall.

effects.name: Calling
effects.text: Once per turn, as you are playing a Bograth Creature, you may discard a Bograth card from your hand to reduce the Creature's energy cost by the number of your Bograth Creatures in play, to a minimum of zero.

flavor:
"I hit them with this stick, and they work harder! It's magic!"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Ruthless Emperor of Gret
   and Mighty Bograth
name: Deadwood Staff

flavor: "Oops!"
name: Deceptive Dreams
text: Choose an opponent and one of that player's Creatures. Return the chosen Creature to its owner's hand, discarding all of its energy. Look at the chosen player's hand. If there are any Creatures in that player's hand, play one of them on that player's side, ignoring all costs and restrictions.

flavor:
"I guess they found a way to use that knowledge after all."
-- Orthea
name: Deep Barl

powers.name: Consume
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Draw two cards.

text: Orothe Shadow Magi may play Deep Barl.

flavor: When it doesn't like the tides, it turns them.
name: Deep Hyren

powers.name: Hurricane
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Discard three energy from each non-Orothe Creature and Magi in play.

effects.name: Sunken Treasure
effects.text: Whenever another player plays a Relic from his or her hand, you may discard two energy from Deep Wellisk. If you do, discard the Relic from play.
Deep Wellisk may not be discarded from play by opposing Spells, Powers, or Effects that specifically discard Creatures from play.

flavor:
"Old wellisks never leave, they just keep sinking deeper."
-- Orothean graffito
name: Deep Wellisk
text: Orothe Shadow Magi may play Deep Wellisk.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Whenever you play a Xyx, add two additional energy to it.

flavor: She was among the first to fight against the shadow geysers, and the experience taught her well.
name: Defender of the Sky

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Whenever you play a Vellup, add one energy to it.

flavor:
"You can always tell when her mind starts to 
wander: the vellups start appearing again."
-- Stradus, Arderial Warrior
name: Delia

powers.name: Recurring Dreams
powers.text: Choose any one Vellup in your discard pile. Put the chosen Vellup into your hand.

flavor:
"Looks like now you'made up of 98% nothing."
-- d'Rasha
name: Desiccate
text: Choose one of your Creatures. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature. If you do, choose a Creature in play. Discard all energy from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Gulp
effects.text: If you have no Creatures in play and no energy on your Magi, before your Magi is defeated you may discard Dewstone from play to add five energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"Do the dewstone."
-- Kybarite maxim
name: Dewstone

powers.name: Sip
powers.text: Add one energy to your Magi for each opposing Creature defeated in attacks this turn.

effects.name: Gulp
effects.text: If you have no Creatures in play and no energy on your Magi, before your Magi is defeated you may discard Dewstone from play to add five energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"Do the dewstone."
-- Kybarite maxim
name: Dewstone

powers.name: Sip
powers.text: Add one energy to your Magi for each opposing Creature defeated in attacks this turn.

effects.name: Balance
effects.text: If you have fewer Creatures in play than any opponent, each opposing Creature costs two additional energy to play.

flavor: "I only need one."
name: Dey

effects.name: Tunneling Attack
effects.text: You burrowed Creatures may attack as normal.

flavor:
Zed snorted. "You and what army?"
That's when he noticed the rumbling under his feet.
name: Digging Goggles

flavor: It mocks you as it fades away.
name: Diobor

powers.name: Fireball
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard Diobor from play. Remove two energy from the chosen Creature.

powers.name: Energy Transfer
powers.text: Add X Energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"I call my diomants 'the fire fighters'."
-- Valkan, Pyromancer
name: Diomant

powers.name: Flame Hunt
powers.text: Choose any one Magi in play. Discard Diomant from play. Discard four energy from the chosen Magi.

powers.name: Energy Transfer
powers.text: Add X energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"Burn, baby, burn!"
-- Inscription on Disc of Inferno
name: Disc of Inferno

powers.name: Hotfoot
powers.text: Choose an opposing Creature. Remove one energy from it for each opposing Creature in play.

effects.text: While Djarmander is in play, all Relics in play are frozen; Powers on frozen cards cost one additional energy to use.

effects.name: Dreamdrain
effects.text: When an opposing Relic is discarded from play, add two energy to Djarmander.

flavor: As deadly as they are unpronounceable.
name: Djarmander

effects.name: Dominate
effects.text: When Drahkar is discarded from play, choose one opposing Creature with three energy or less. Discard the chosen Creature.
As you play Drahkar, reduce its cost by five. Drahkar is not considered to be in play when checking to see if your Magi is defeated, and it cannot attack Magi directly.

flavor:
"You tell it it's not real!"
-- Chur
name: Drahkar
text: d'Resh Shadow Magi can play Drahkar.

effects.name: Fair
effects.text: Other players' cards do not use Effects during attacks.

effects.name: Fight
effects.text: Opposing Powers cost one additional energy to use.

flavor: First he levels the playing field, then he levels the opposition.
name: Drajan

flavor:
"What army? To the Drakans, they're just kindling."
-- Barak, Cald Warlord
name: Drakan

powers.name: Thermal Blast
powers.text: Roll one die. Choose any one Creature in play. Discard energy equal to the die roll from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Ye know what it's made of? Artificially sweetened
dreams. Ye can put it in yer mouth now, but ye won't
taste it until ye go to sleep."
-- Blu, Vault Guardian
name: Dream Balm

powers.name: Vitalize
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play with less than its starting energy. Discard Dream Balm from play. Restore the chosen Creature to its starting energy.

effects.name: Absorb
effects.text: Once per turn, after an opponent plays a Creature, you may move up to two energy from that Creature to a Creature you control.

flavor:
"Your dreams become my reality."
-- Salara
name: Dream Catcher

flavor: Target painted.
name: Dream Channel
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Attach Dream Channel to the chosen Creature. Increase your Magi's energize rate by two while Dream Channel is in play. If the chosen Creature leaves play, discard Dream Channel from play.

flavor: The dam broke and the dreams flooded through.
name: Dream Rift
text: Arderial Magi may play Dream Rift.

effects.name: Dreamdrain
effects.text: Reduce each Magi's Energize by the number of that Magi's Spells and Relics in play. At the beginning of their turn, any player may discard all of their Relics and Spells from play to discard Dreamdrain Charm from play.

flavor: It siphons away thoughts and dreams, trapping them before they even begin.
name: Dreamdrain Charm

effects.name: Loan Strength
effects.text: Once per turn, as one of your Arderial Creatures uses a Power, you may pay the energy cost from your Magi instead.

flavor:
"Here, let me give you a hand."
-- Amara, Shield Maiden
name: Dreamthread Bracelet

flavor: "Why ask for what you can take?"
name: Drig

powers.name: Leech
powers.text: Discard one energy from each opposing Creature, and add one energy to each of your Bograth Creatures in play.

flavor:
"This is going to ruin my complexion."
-- Tryn, Daughter of Runes
name: Drought
text: All cards in play gain no energy the text time they energize.

effects.name: Lore
effects.text: When you play Drowl, draw two cards.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Drowl attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Drowl and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
Hunting drowl, hunting drowl
Moving quiet as the night
Fearsome scowl, hungry growl
May I never see that sight
name: Drowl
text: Weave Shadow Magi may play Drowl.

flavor:
"Let the beats commence!"
-- Ookami, Jungle Drummer
name: Drum Solo
text: Choose two Paradwyn Creatures. Restore each Creature to its printed starting energy.

effects.name: Vengeance
effects.text: If Drush is attacked and defeated, choose any one of the attacking player's Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor: Thought to be one of the rarest of dream creatures, a cache of them was recently discovered.
name: Drush
text: Weave Magi may play Drush.

effects.name: Vengeance
effects.text: If Drush is attacked and defeated, choose any one of the attacking player's Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor:
"Vengeance is bitter, but the taste grows on you."
-- Lanyx, Crucible
name: Drush
text: Weave Magi may play Drush.

effects.name: Snowball
effects.text: The first time each turn that Dryte attacks a frozen Creature, add three energy to Dryte after energy is removed and it can immediately attack a second Creature.

flavor:
"Two drytes don't make it wrong."
-- Helgrem
name: Dryte

effects.name: Condemn
effects.text: At the beginning of each of your opponent's turns, you may choose any one Creature in play. Until the end of that opponent's turn, each time the chosen Creature loses less energy from Powers, Spells, or attacks, it loses three additional energy.

flavor:
"He has been marked. Let him come, if he dares."
-- Morag, the Executor
name: Dryte Fiend
text: Cald Magi may play Dryte Fiend.

effects.name: True Path
effects.text: During your Draw step, if you have three or more Oracles in play, draw an additional card.

flavor:
"Well, we're headed toward 'Nowhere'. 'Sand' is off to the left, and
'Lost' is over to the right."
-- Ahron
name: Dune Compass

effects.name: Grim Reflection
effects.text: At the beginning of each player's Draw step, if that player has more cards in his or her hand than any other player, that player draws one less card this turn. While Ebony Mirror is in play, all players draw at least one card during their Draw step.

flavor:
"I don't like looking in a mirror that stares back."
-- Chur
name: Ebony Mirror

flavor: "Kbish! K-BISH! Boy, I was just going crazy! Blu never spoke to me again after that."
name: Ebylon

powers.name: Shatterwave
powers.text: Choose any one Relic in play. Discard the chosen Relic from play.

flavor:
"Big deal. If I want darkness at midday, I'll go back home."
-- Ulk, Underwarden
name: Eclipse
text: Choose any one Magi in play. The chosen Magi's Creatures cannot attack during that Magi's next turn.

effects.name: Escape
effects.text: If Eebit is defeated in an attack, instead of discarding it, put it back into its owner's hand.

flavor:
"How many lives DO these pests have?"
-- Zet, Core Warrior
name: Eebit

effects.name: Familiarity
effects.text: Whenever Eidon plays a Creature, add two energy to Eidon if another Creature with the same name is already in play.

flavor: "I travel all over the Moonlands... that is, when I can get away from Gia."
name: Eidon

effects.name: Allies
effects.text: When you play Elder Vellup, you may search your deck for any one non-Vellup Arderial Creature. Reveal the Creature to all players and place it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: Vellup flocks often attract other, larger, hungrier creatures.
name: Elder Vellup

flavor:
"Very rare, but very, very tasty."
-- Poad, Naroom Innkeeper
name: Elder Weebo

powers.name: Vitaminize
powers.text: Discard Elder Weebo from play. Until the end of your next turn, each of your Naroom Creatures in play with an energize rate has its energize rate increased by two. Each of your other Naroom Creatures in play gains an energize rate of two until the end of your next turn.

effects.name: Regal Presence
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Creature attacks, it removes energy from the defending Creature equal to either its starting energy or current energy, whichever is less.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Elder Yark loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"It's tough to put up a good fight when you have an uncontrollable urge to
kneel in respect."
-- Targ'n, Elder
name: Elder Yark

effects.name: Regal Presence
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Creature attacks, it removes energy from the defending Creature equal to either its starting energy or current energy, whichever is less.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Elder Yark loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"It's tough to put up a good fight when you have an uncontrollable urge to
kneel in respect."
-- Targ'n, Elder
name: Elder Yark

flavor:
"Not in my house!"
-- Jaela, Regis
name: Elemental Shield
text: Choose any one other Magi in play. Until the end of your next turn, your cards in play are not affected by that Magi's Spells, Powers, and Effects.

effects.name: Dream Hard
effects.text: At the beginning of your Energize Step, if Elios is able to energize, choose a number less than his energize rate. Reduce Elios' energy rate by the chosen number until the start of your next turn. During your Draw Step, draw cards equal to the chosen number instead of your normal two.
If Elios is defeated, discard all but five cards from your hand.

flavor: I'll be fine. No, really. I have it under control.
name: Elios

effects.name: Sabotage
effects.text: When Emaal is defeated, discard all energy from all opposing Magi and draw a card.

flavor: "You're not as big as you thought you were."
name: Emaal

effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, choose an opponent. Increase your energize by one for each Relic the chosen opponent has in play.
Each of your Non-Nar, non-Universal cards costs one additional energy to play.

flavor: "Oh boy! Water of life! Just what I was hoping you'd get!"
name: Emaya

powers.name: Improvise
powers.text: Discard a Relic from your hand to choose a Creature. Discard two energy from or add two enery to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Heat Feed
effects.text: Whenever one of your other Creatures attacks, add one energy to Ember Hyren.

flavor:
"Our love is like a glowing ember burning bright."
"Oh, please!"
-- Barak and Tryn
name: Ember Hyren

powers.name: Singe
powers.text: Choose a Creature. Discard two energy from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Heat Feed
effects.text: Whenever one of your other Creatures attacks, add one energy to Ember Hyren.

flavor:
"Are all men from Cald loud-mouthed braggarts?"
"Yeah, but I'm the best."
-- Tryn and Barak
name: Ember Hyren

powers.name: Singe
powers.text: Choose a Creature. Discard two energy from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Scorch
effects.text: When any player plays a Spell, you may discard Ember Vard from play. If you do, choose one of that player's Creatures. Discard five energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor: Fire Flyers.
name: Ember Vard

effects.name: Scorch
effects.text: When any player plays a Spell, you may discard Ember Vard from play. If you do, choose one of that player's Creatures. Discard five energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor: Fire Flyers.
name: Ember Vard

effects.name: Tinker
effects.text: Once per turn, when you use a Power or Effect printed on one of your Kybar's Teeth Relic in play that involves a die roll, you may reroll one of those dice. If you do, you may choose which result to use.

flavor: "I'm of the belief that when a wheel squeaks, you oughta hit it with a hammer until it stops."
name: Emec

effects.name: Recycle
effects.text: Once per turn, as one of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures is being defeated, or being discarded from play by an opposing card while it has energy, you may discard one of your Relics from play. If you do, leave your Creature in play with its current energy or restore it to the energy it had before the attack instead of discarding it.

flavor:
"We can rebuild it. We have the technology. We can make it better than it
was before. Better, stronger, faster."
-- Emec, Ringsmith
name: Emec's Forge

effects.name: Imaginary Friends
effects.text: You are considered to have three additional Bograth Creatures in play for all of your Spells, Powers and Effects.

flavor: "Don't worry about me. I'll manage."
name: Emlob

effects.name: Act Like Gia
effects.text: If you have no Core cards in play, draw an additional card at the end of each of your turns and your Weave Creatures lose one less energy when attacked.

effects.name: Fight Like Nagsis
effects.text: If you have Core cards in play, all of your Creatures may attack, even those that cannot normally attack.

flavor: "My voice is raw from speaking in falsetto all the time."
name: Empress Gia
text: Empress Gia can only play Core, Weave, and Universal cards.

effects.name: Act Like Gia
effects.text: If you have no Core cards in play, draw an additional card at the end of each of your turns and your Weave Creatures lose one less energy when attacked.

effects.name: Fight Like Nagsis
effects.text: If you have Core cards in play, all of your Creatures may attack, even those that cannot normally attack.

flavor: "My voice is raw from speaking in falsetto all the time."
name: Empress Gia
text: Empress Gia can only play Core, Weave, and Universal cards.

flavor:
"I am a Force of Nature."
-- Band inscription
name: Energy Band

powers.name: Charge
powers.text: Use this Power only before your Attack Step. Choose any one Creature in play. Add two energy to the chosen Creature. That Creature must attack this turn, if able.

flavor: "It's packed with nine essential nutrients and a full day's supply of energy! Got Soil?"
name: Enrich
text: Choose any one burrowed Creature in play. Add three energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor: Abracadableeeerrrgh!
name: Entangle
text: Choose any one Magi in play. The chosen Magi cannot play any spells during his or her next turn.

flavor:
"Even your spells no longer belong to you."
-- Morag, the Executor
name: Entomb
text: Choose any one Spell. For the rest of this game, all Spells of that name are considered Core instead of their normal region.

flavor:
"Sometimes it's best to just hunker down and gather your strength!"
-- Strag, Adventurer
name: Entrench
text: Choose a Creature and attach Entrench to it. While Entrench is attached, the Creature gains "Effect - Entrenched: As this Creature is attacked, add two energy to it. This Creature may not attack." A Creature may not have more than one Entrench attached.

flavor:
"Poor child. The Epiks are devouring his sweet dreams,
and all he's left with are nightmares."
-- Jaela, Arderial Regis
name: Epik

powers.name: Dream Feast
powers.text: Choose any one player. Discard Epik from play. Look at the chosen player's hand and choose up to two Creature cards there. The player discards the chosen cards.

flavor:
"Aaah! Aaah! Giant Eebit! Run! Run--" *POP*
"Hey, look at the cute little fuzzball..."
-- Salafy, Woodskeeper
name: Equilibrate
text: All Creatures in play with more than their starting energy are reduced to their starting energy.

effects.name: Ignite
effects.text: While Ergar is in play, each of your Cald Creatures in play gains the following text: "Power -- Spark: (1) Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature or Magi."

flavor:
"Who would you like to get blasted by today?"
-- Barak, Cald Warlord
name: Ergar

effects.name: Nomad
effects.text: Erisa's frozen Creatures do not count as being in play when checking to see if she is defeated.

effects.name: Legacy
effects.text: When Erisa is defeated, leave her frozen Creatures and frozen Relics in play. When you reveal your next Magi, discard all of your Relics from play if that Magi is not Nar.

flavor: "Honey, the leftovers are in the freezer!"
name: Erisa

effects.name: Discordia
effects.text: Once per turn, when an opposing Magi plays a non-Universal Creature not of their Magi's region, you may choose and discard one of the Magi's Creatures from play.

flavor: "Korg, Korg, he's our man, if he can't do it, GREAT!"
name: Eryss

effects.name: Discordia
effects.text: Once per turn, when an opposing Magi plays a non-Universal Creature not of their Magi's region, you may choose and discard one of the Magi's Creatures from play.

flavor: "Korg, Korg, he's our man, if he can't do it, GREAT!"
name: Eryss

effects.text: When Essence of Frost is in play, all cards in play are frozen; Powers on frozen cards cost one additiona energy to use. Spells cost frozen Magi one additional energy to play.

flavor:
"Oooooh... pretty.."
"Brrrr... pretty cold..."
-- Bria and Orlon
name: Essence of Frost

flavor: Distilled, fermented life force. Aged over 600 years. Drink moderately. Serve chilled.
name: Essence of Naroom

powers.name: Call of the Wild
powers.text: Choose any one Naroom, Weave, or Paradwyn Creature in play. Discard Essence of Naroom from play. Gain control of the chosen Creature. That Creature may not attack this turn.

text: Naroom Shadow Magi may play Essence of Naroom.

effects.name: Short Fuse
effects.text: As one of your cards is discarded from play by an opposing card, discard one energy from the opposing card's Magi.

effects.name: Really Short Fuse
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if you have no Creatures in play, you may discard Everburning Wick from play to choose a Creature. Discard five energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"It gets shorter and shorter and shorter, but it doesn't ever go away."
-- Valkan
name: Everburning Wick

effects.name: Short Fuse
effects.text: As one of your cards is discarded from play by an opposing card, discard one energy from the opposing card's Magi.

effects.name: Really Short Fuse
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if you have no Creatures in play, you may discard Everburning Wick from play to choose a Creature. Discard five energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"It's best to give it a wide margin."
-- Zaya, Elder
name: Everburning Wick

effects.name: Devour
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Creature is discarded from play or reduced to zero energy by one of your cards, draw a card.

flavor: I'll show you jellybeans!
name: Evil Evu
text: You may play Naroom cards, ignoring regional restrictions and penalties.

effects.name: Lore
effects.text: At the end of each of your turns, draw a card.

flavor: "Give me enough time, and enough jellybeans, and I'll have the answer."
name: Evu

effects.name: Red Ones
effects.text: At the end of your turn, discard one Jellybean Counter from Evu's Jellybeans and draw a card.

flavor:
"I hear they're all black, now..."
-- Eidon
name: Evu's Jellybeans

powers.name: Black Ones
powers.text: Discard one Jellybean Counter from Evu's Jellybeans. Choose any one player. That player chooses and discards one card from his or her hand. If your Magi is Core, the discard is random. If your Magi is Evu, you do not need to discard a Jellybean Counter to use this Power.

text: When you play Evu's Jellybeans, add X Jellybean Counters to it. If Evu's Jellybeans has no Jellybean Counters on it, discard it from play. Naroom Shadow Magi may play Evu's Jellybeans.

flavor:
"We need to get Korg a royal cloak. He's already exposed plenty enough for
me."
-- Olabra, the Greatest Elder Ever
name: Exposure
text: Each non-Nar Magi loses energy equal to their Energize. Each Core Magi loses two additional energy.

flavor:
"In the eye of the storm, all is still... usually."
-- Stradus, Arderial Warrior
name: Eye of the Storm

powers.name: Storm Seeker
powers.text:
Roll one die.
1 = Discard your hand.
2, 3, 4 or 5 = Do nothing.
6 = Draw five cards, or choose any one opponent. 
The chosen opponent discards his or her hand.

effects.text: At the end of each of your turns, each player starting with you and going to the left, names one Spell. Until the end of your next turn, the named Spells may not be played.
All opposing Spells, Powers and Effects that reveal your hand to other players have no effect. If Eyes of Arderial is discarded from your hand by an opposing card, you may play it instead.

flavor: For all his foresight, Arderial did not see Agram's betrayal.
name: Eyes of Arderial

flavor: What is luck, other than skill performing anonymously?
name: Fate's Whimsy
text: Play only after any player rolls one or more dice. Re-roll one of those dice. Choose which result to use. You may play this Spell on any player's turn.

flavor:
"I'll be there in a minute!"
-- Korg
name: Feet of Stone
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Until the end of your next turn, the chosen Creature may not attack or use any Powers or Effects. Kybar's Teeth Shadow Magi may play Feet of Stone.

effects.name: Affinity
effects.text: Fiend of Furoks ignores regional penalties and restrictions when playing Furoks.

effects.name: Reconstruct
effects.text: Once per turn, you can play a Furok from your discard pile as if it were in your hand, paying all costs.

flavor: "It's ALIIIIVE! ... Again!"
name: Fiend of Furoks

effects.name: Perch
effects.text: Whenever you play a Furok, you can play one copy of Fird from your hand or discard pile, paying all costs. Fird cannot attack this turn.

flavor:
"F-F-F-Fird, fird, fird, fird is the word."
-- Poad, Innkeeper
name: Fird

effects.name: Fird Favor
effects.text: Whenever a Spell or Power would affect one or more of your Furoks in play, you may discard two energy from your Magi. If you do, the Spell or Power does not affect any of your Furoks in play.

flavor:
"Just holding it makes you feel large and furry, and if you don't have
antlers, the firds will come sit on your shoulders!"
-- Sperri, Friend of Furoks
name: Fird Stone

flavor:
"Have some flame!"
-- Barak, Cald Warlord
name: Fire Ball
text: Remove two energy from any Creature or Magi.

flavor: She's gonna blow!
name: Fire Chogo

powers.name: Heat Storm
powers.text: Discard Fire Chogo from play to discard one energy from each non-Cald Creature in play.

flavor:
"These creatures pay the final price
To heal those of the Crater.
You too might need to sacrifice
For those whose needs are greater."
-- "The Arbolit", verse 10
name: Fire Flow
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Move up to four energy from your Magi to the chosen Creature.

flavor: You be the ammunition this time!
name: Fire Grag

powers.name: Metabolize
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures and any one of your opponents' Creatures in play. Discard twice your Creature's current energy from your opponent's Creature. Discard your chosen Creature from play.

flavor:
"Cald, Cald is deranged,
For they dance in the fire and play.
I'll stay here in Naroom, it's the very best home,
'Cuz the bugs don't keep burning all day!"
-- Poad, Innkeeper
name: Firefly Amulet

powers.name: Swarm
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard a Cald card from your hand to remove two energy from the chosen Creature. If the discarded card was a Spell, that Creature cannot attack on its player's next turn.

flavor:
"Oh give me a home, where the Leaf Hyren roam,
Where the Pliths and Carillions play,
Where always is heard, the Furok's horn bird,
And the bugs don't keep burning all day!"
-- Poad, Naroom Innkeeper
name: Firefly Swarm
text: Choose any one non-Cald Creature in play. Discard two energy from the chosen Creature. That Creature may not attack on its controller's next turn.

flavor:
"You are a diamond in the rough. You just need a little more heat and
pressure."
name: Firestorm Orish

powers.name: Firestorm
powers.text: Choose one of your Cald or Arderial Creatures in play. Discard two energy from the chosen Creature to add three energy to any one of your other Creatures in play. Spells, Powers, and Effects cannot prevent or modify this energy loss or gain.

flavor:
"You are a diamond in the rough. You just need a little more heat and
pressure."
name: Firestorm Orish

powers.name: Firestorm
powers.text: Choose one of your Cald or Arderial Creatures in play. Discard two energy from the chosen Creature to add three energy to any one of your other Creatures in play. Spells, Powers, and Effects cannot prevent or modify this energy loss or gain.

flavor: Magi flambé.
name: Flambit

powers.name: Immolate
powers.text: Discard Flambit from play. Choose a Magi and a Creature. Move up to three energy from the chosen Magi to the chosen Creature.

flavor: One for you, fifteen for me.
name: Flame Control
text: Rearrange the energy on your Creatures as you wish.

flavor:
Writhe and expire,
In the rage of the fire.
After the rain,
Only ashes remain.
name: Flame Geyser
text: Discard three energy from each Creature and Magi in play.

flavor: Korg was pleasantly surprised when the Hyren disintegrated after only a single blow of his sword. But his shout of triumph died when he saw the other Cald minions suddenly burn brighter.
name: Flame Hyren

powers.name: Energy Transfer
powers.text: Distribute Flame Hyren's energy among any number of Creatures. Discard Flame Hyren from play.

flavor: T'Lok stood over Vorga, ready to drop a massive boulder on the prone Magi. Just then, Xandia's Jakla appeared and blasted T'Lok off the edge of the cliff.
name: Flame Jakla

powers.name: Heat Syphon
powers.text: Choose a Magi and remove three energy from it. If this Power removes all the energy from the chosen Magi, add two energy to Flame Jakla.

flavor:
"What are you doing? Naroom trees weak, Cald fire strong!"
-- Sinder, to Barak
name: Flame Rudwot

powers.name: Healing Flame
powers.text: Choose any one other Cald or Naroom Creature in play. Add three energy to the chosen Creature.

powers.name: Burning Branches
powers.text: Choose any one non-Cald, non-Naroom Creature in play. Discard three energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"What are you doing? Naroom trees weak, Cald fire strong!"
-- Sinder, to Barak
name: Flame Rudwot

powers.name: Healing Flame
powers.text: Choose any one other Cald or Naroom Creature in play. Add three energy to the chosen Creature.

powers.name: Burning Branches
powers.text: Choose any one non-Cald, non-Naroom Creature in play. Discard three energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Do you hear a popping sound?"
"Hey, it wasn't me!"
-- Tryn and Barak
name: Flame Spurt
text: Attach Flame Spurt to your Magi. When one of your cards is attacked, before energy is removed, you may discard Flame Spurt from play to discard two energy from the attacking Creature. You can only use one Flame Spurt during an attack.

effects.name: Familiarity
effects.text: When you play Flame Trulb, add one energy to it for each Bograth or Cald Creature in play, whichever is less.

flavor:
"Fire, like wood, is a tool, Tryn. It can help, it can hurt. Let me teach
you how to use fire, and more importantly, when."
-- Barak, Warlord
name: Flame Trulb

powers.name: Fireball
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Familiarity
effects.text: When you play Flame Trulb, add one energy to it for each Bograth or Cald Creature in play, whichever is less.

flavor:
"Fire, like wood, is a tool, Tryn. It can help, it can hurt. Let me teach
you how to use fire, and more importantly, when."
-- Barak, Warlord
name: Flame Trulb

powers.name: Fireball
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Best Defense
effects.text: Whenever your Magi loses energy from an opposing card, it loses one less energy.

effects.name: Good Offense
effects.text: As an opposing card discards energy from your Magi, you may discard Flameplate Armor from play and a card from your hand to discard the energy from any opposing Magi instead.

flavor: Good armor deflects blows. Better armor deflects blows somewhere useful.
name: Flameplate Armor

flavor: Velouria's creatures surrounded the twisted furok. A blue flash of energy flowed from creature to creature, sucking the energy from it.
name: Flashfreeze
text: Choose a Creature. Remove one energy from the Creature for each Frozen card you control.

flavor:
"Nobody's bigger than my Rock Hyren. Nobody."
-- Targ'n, Elder
name: Flint Staff

powers.name: Tremor
powers.text: Choose an opposing Creature. If it is larger than your largest Creature, move two energy from the chosen Creature to your largest Creature.

flavor:
"Sometimes nature can be a little too generous."
-- Eidon, Keeper
name: Flood of Energy
text: Energize all cards with an energize rate.

flavor:
"On the other hand, what if we held a war and everybody came?"
-- Olabra, Really Greatest Elder Ever
name: Flourish
text: Until the end of your next turn, all Creatures with starting energy greater than two cost two less energy to play, to a minimum of two.

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Core Spells and Powers do not affect Flugg.

effects.name: Support
effects.text: Whenever one of your other Creatures is attacked by a Core Creature, before energy is removed, add four energy to the defending Creature.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Flugg attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Flugg and one of your other Creatures in play.

flavor: To boldly grow where nothing has grown before.
name: Flugg
text: Weave Shadow Magi may play Flugg.

effects.name: Dodge
effects.text: Whenever Flutter Yup attacks or is attacked by a Creature with more than three energy, Flutter Yup loses no energy in the attack.

flavor:
"Long, long ago, children didn't know how to cry for their mommies. Then
the Ancients made flutter yups."
-- Ora, Shieldmaiden
name: Flutter Yup

flavor:
"The bigger they are, the harder they drop."
-- Jaela, Regis
name: Flying Darbok

powers.name: Airlift
powers.text: Choose one of your Creatures in play. Move all energy from Flying Darbok to the chosen Creature, and add two energy to the chosen Creature. The chosen Creature can attack Magi directly this turn. Use this Power only before the Attack step.

effects.name: Empower
effects.text: Whenever an Arderial or Naroom Spell or Power adds energy to one or more Creatures in play, add one energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"I saw this little guy rescue a family of tree hinkos from the middle of a
lava flow, and I just had to keep him."
-- Poad, Innkeeper
name: Flying Hinko

effects.name: Empower
effects.text: Whenever an Arderial or Naroom Spell or Power adds energy to one or more Creatures in play, add one energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"I saw this little guy rescue a family of tree hinkos from the middle of a
lava flow, and I just had to keep him."
-- Poad, Innkeeper
name: Flying Hinko

flavor:
"Let me gather my wits, then we shall strike!"
"Excellent! I'll just sit here and wait, then."
-- Korg and Olabra
name: Focus
text: During your next turn, this Magi's energize rate is tripled. You cannot play any cards until the end of your next turn.

flavor:
"No place to hide? I'll fix that."
-- Shimmer, Arderial Adept
name: Fog Bank
text: Choose any one Creature in play. The chosen Creature cannot be attacked during your opponents' next two turns. Place this card on the chosen Creature while Fog Bank is in effect.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Fog Hyren, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to two, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"I hate this! The only thing worse than the fog of war is a war of fog."
-- Ookami, Jungle Drummer
name: Fog Hyren

powers.name: Obscure Knowledge
powers.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card if your Magi is not Bograth.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Fog Hyren, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to two, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"I hate this! The only thing worse than the fog of war is a war of fog."
-- Ookami, Jungle Drummer
name: Fog Hyren

powers.name: Obscure Knowledge
powers.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card if your Magi is not Bograth.

flavor:
"You got any Sap of Life?"
"NO! WE'RE ALL OUT OF SAP OF LIFE!"
"Well, in that case... in that case, what DO you have?"
name: Forest Blessing
text: Restore each Naroom Creature in play with less than its starting energy to its starting energy.

effects.name: Underbrush
effects.text: Whenever a Spell or Power adds energy to Forest Hyren, add an additional energy to Forest Hyren.

flavor: The most beautiful foliage in the forest can be found in the hyren's footsteps.
name: Forest Hyren

powers.name: Energy Transfer
powers.text: Choose any one other Creature in play. Add seven energy to the chosen Creature.

text: Naroom Shadow Magi can play Forest Hyren.

effects.name: Underbrush
effects.text: Whenever a Spell or Power adds energy to Forest Hyren, add one additional energy to Forest Hyren.

flavor: From life comes life.
name: Forest Hyren

powers.name: Energy Transfer
powers.text: Choose any one other Creature in play. Add seven energy to the chosen Creature.

text: Naroom Shadow Magi may play Forest Hyren.

flavor: The jile roars! That means the battle is won!
name: Forest Jile

powers.name: Reinforce
powers.text: Add two energy to each of your Creatures that attacked this turn.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Whenever an opponent plays a Creature, add one energy to Forest Wudge. If the Creature played is Naroom, add an additional energy to Forest Wudge.

effects.name: Home Turf
effects.text: When you play Forest Wudge, if any opposing Magi is Naroom or Naroom Shadow, draw a card.

flavor:
"Anklebiter."
-- Eidon, Elder
name: Forest Wudge
text: Naroom Shadow Magi can play Forest Wudge, ignoring regional penalties.

flavor: Without its glass cover, the blossom withers in the faintest light, unless it can find a dark heart in which to take root.
name: Forgotten Dancer

powers.name: Excise
powers.text: Choose any one Core Creature in play. Discard Forgotten Dancer from play. Take control of the chosen Creature. That Creature loses energy equal to the amount of energy on your Magi and may not attack this turn.

flavor:
"No, I don't remember ever forgetting any dreams."
-- Harresh
name: Forgotten Dreams
text: Choose four non-Spell cards in your discard pile. Shuffle the chosen cards into your deck. Draw a card.

flavor:
"The oldest melodies are ingrained in our souls."
-- Mohani
name: Forgotten Songs
text: Play Forgotten Songs when one of your Creatures is being discarded from play by another card. Put the Creature into your hand instead of the discard pile.

flavor:
"That's not how it was! Agram didn't have four arms!"
"But wouldn't it be cool if he did?"
-- Risha and Nashiq
name: Forgotten Tales
text: Put the top four cards of your deck into your discard pile. Choose a non-Spell card in your discard pile and put it into your hand.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: During your Draw Step, you may choose to add three energy to any one Creature, instead of drawing one of your two cards. Use this Effects only one per turn.

flavor: Knowledge or power. Your choice.
name: Fossik

flavor: "No sooner has Naroom fallen, than Core creatures begin invading us from above."
name: Fossik, Ringsmith

powers.name: Strengthen
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Discard a card from your hand to add two energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Big Chill
effects.text: Whenever one of your frozen Creatures is in an attack, remove one energy from the opposing Magi before energy is removed.

flavor: "I'm just like everybody else; just a little luckier."
name: Fray

effects.name: Refresh
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if your Magi is Underneath, you may discard Freep from play to add five energy to your Magi.

flavor: Freeps only emergy from their caves when they are most needed, and that makes them popular.
name: Freep

flavor:
"Get out of the way -- looks like Gorran's cooking up a new batch of
jile-treats."
-- Keggerop, Amazing Creature Dreamer
name: Frenzy
text: If you have at least three Bograth Creatures in play, add two energy to each Creature in play.

effects.text: While Frost Hyren is in play, all Creatures in play are frozen; Powers on frozen cards cost one additional energy to use.

effects.name: Frostbite
effects.text: Whenever any player plays a Relic, discard one energy from each of that player's Creatures.

flavor: Around these beasts, water of life turns crunchy.
name: Frost Hyren

flavor:
"Eenie, meenie, mynie --" SMASH "D'oh!"
-- Emaya
name: Frost Raxis

powers.name: Thermal Stress
powers.text: Choose a Relic in play. That Relic's player must discard one of their Relics from play. If the discarded Relic is not the one you chose, add two enery to Frost Raxis.

flavor:
Flickering, the froxfire light
Silhouettes the beast at night.
What a nice, inviting sight!
It's much more fun to pounce!
-- The Scarlet Song
name: Froxfire
text: Choose any one stalked Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

effects.name: Magic Scent
effects.text: Whenever an opposing player plays a Spell or Relic, draw a card.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Frusk attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Frusk and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Go! Go away! Shoo! I mean it!"
"Anybody want a peanut?"
-- Zet & Korg
name: Frusk

effects.name: Swamp Lore
effects.text: Once per turn, when you play another Bograth Creature, draw a card.

effects.name: Forest Power
effects.text: Once per turn, when you play another Naroom Creature, add two energy to your Magi.

effects.name: Companionship
effects.text: If you do not have at least one other Bograth and one other Naroom Creature in play, discard Furlosk from play.

flavor:
"We all need somebody to lean on."
-- Wiep, the Sniveler
name: Furlosk

effects.name: Swamp Lore
effects.text: Once per turn, when you play another Bograth Creature, draw a card.

effects.name: Forest Power
effects.text: Once per turn, when you play another Naroom Creature, add two energy to your Magi.

effects.name: Companionship
effects.text: If you do not have at least one other Bograth and one other Naroom Creature in play, discard Furlosk from play.

flavor:
"We all need somebody to lean on."
-- Wiep, the Sniveler
name: Furlosk

effects.name: Retrieve
effects.text: When a defending Creature removes energy from Furok, place half of that energy, rounded up, back on your Magi.

flavor:
"Fine, you can pet it. But don't blame me if it rolls over on you."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Furok

effects.name: Terra Rebirth
effects.text: Whenever one of your other Creatures is discarded from play, you may discard five energy from Furok Guardian. If you do, return the discarded Creature to play with its starting energy at the end of the current player's turn.

flavor: Power overwhelming.
name: Furok Guardian

effects.name: Thick Coat
effects.text: When you play Furok Protector, choose an opposing Magi. Set Furok Protector's energy equal to the chosen Magi's energize.

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Furok Protector is not affected by Core Spells and Powers.

flavor: A Magi's best friend.
name: Furok Protector

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Galiant loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor: It always has the best seat in the house.
name: Galiant

powers.name: Riding Tail
powers.text: Your largest Creature in play gains energy equal to the current energy on the smallest opposing Creature in play.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Galiant loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor: It always has the best seat in the house.
name: Galiant

powers.name: Riding Tail
powers.text: Your largest Creature in play gains energy equal to the current energy on the smallest opposing Creature in play.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Before you draw your cards during your Draw Step, add two energy to your Creature with the least energy. If there is a tie, you choose which Creature the energy gets placed on.

flavor: Feel better now? Good! Next...
name: Gar

effects.name: Spawn
effects.text: Whenever Garadan attacks a Magi, after energy is removed, you may immediately play any one Core or Naroom Creature from your hand with one energy instead of its starting energy and without paying any costs.

flavor: It manifests your nightmares.
name: Garadan
text: Naroom Magi may play Garadan.

effects.name: Rake
effects.text: Energy removed by your Creatures in attacks is unaffected by opposing cards. All of your Creatures must attack each turn, if able.

flavor: A garan hits so hard, it'll knock you clean out of your dream.
name: Garan
text: Naroom Shadow Magi may play Garann.

effects.name: Perpetual Motion
effects.text: When you play Gargagnor, choose any one other player. All of your Effects that ordinarily happen at the beginning of your turn happen at the beginning of the chosen player's turn instead.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Gargarnor loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor: Its roar has an echo built in.
name: Gargagnor
text: Kybar's Teeth Shadow Magi may play Gargarnor.

effects.name: Cold Burn
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, choose a Creature. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature. Discard two additional energy is that Creature is frozen.

flavor:
"Beware the Garlak's breath!"
"Why? Is it that cold?"
"No, it stinks!"
-- Fray and Emaya
name: Garlak

effects.name: Talisman
effects.text: If you have an Amulet of Ombor in play, you can play Gate to Ombor from your hand or from your deck, ignoring all costs. Add one to all die rolls you make for Amulet of Ombor (die rolls of 6 remain 6).
Gate to Ombor cannot be discarded from play by opposing cards that specifically discard Relics from play. Discard Gate to Ombor from play if your Magi is not an Underneath Magi.

flavor:
"There's no place like home."
-- Gruk, Underwarden
name: Gate to Ombor

powers.name: Guard
powers.text: Search your deck for one of your Magi's starting Creatures. Play that Creature, reducing its cost by five energy, to a minimum of zero. That Creature can never attack.

flavor:
"One size hits all!"
-- Bria, Vault Curator
name: Gauntlets of Colossal Power

powers.name: Whole Lotta Glove
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard Gauntlets of Colossal Power from play. The next time the chosen Creature attacks, it removes twelve energy instead of its current energy.

effects.name: Realitywarp
effects.text: You may discard three of your Paradwyn Creatures with the effect "Dreamwarp" from play instead of paying Ghazran's energy cost.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Ghazran, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"It eats dream creatures. I guess that makes it a somnivore."
-- Ookami, Jungle Drummer
name: Ghazran

effects.name: Abrade
effects.text: Whenever an opponent uses a Power, choose one of that player's Creatures. Discard one enery from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Drift
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, move up to two energy from one of your Creatures to Gherish.

flavor: "Sand gets into everything..."
name: Gherish

effects.name: Glow
effects.text: All of your Creatures can attack while burrowed.

flavor:
Strag watched the Core forces fan out through the cavern the bwisps had
conveniently prepared. "My lord," he said to Motash, "the weebos are in
the pot."
The Underlord smiled grimly. "Cook 'em."
name: Ghost Bwisp

flavor: "Eidon, don't you have some work to do?"
name: Gia

powers.name: Unearth
powers.text: Discard any one of your Relics from play to search your deck for any one Relic and put it directly into play. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

effects.name: Impede
effects.text: All players draw one less card during their Draw Step.

flavor: Gia thought it a fair trade for safe passage through the Weave.
name: Gia Pet

powers.name: Power Siphon
powers.text: Choose any one opposing Spell in play. Gia Pet gains energy equal to the energy cost of the chosen Spell.

text: Weave Magi can play Gia Pet. Non-Core, non-Weave Magi cannot play Gia Pet.

effects.name: Research
effects.text: Once per turn, you may play a Creature from under Gia's Tome as if it were in your hand. If your Magi is Gia, Creatures played from Gia's Tome cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"Get me that BOOOOK!"
-- Evu, Loremaster
name: Gia's Tome

effects.name: Tinder
effects.text: Whenever you play a Spell or use a Power that discards energy from one or more opposing Creatures, add one energy to Giant Arboll.

flavor:
"Your pain, my gain."
-- Grega, Pyromancer
name: Giant Arboll

powers.name: Healing Flame
powers.text: Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Move all energy from Giant Arboll to the chosen Creature or Magi.

effects.name: Momentum
effects.text: If Giant Baldar attacks and defeats a Magi's last Creature in play, discard all but one energy from the defeated Creature's Magi.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Giant Baldar loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"They're very easy to find; just follow the
wreckage. The hard part comes when you actually
catch up to one."
-- Kazm, Scout
name: Giant Baldar

flavor:
"When a tree falls in the forest, it sometimes falls on
the one that hears it."
-- Poad, Naroom Innkeeper
name: Giant Carillion

powers.name: Stomp
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

effects.name: Big Chill
effects.text: Creatures in play cannot gain energy above their starting energy.

flavor: Those Choguses that survive their wild youth are truly creatures to be feared.
name: Giant Chogus
text: Kybar's Teeth Shadow Magi may play Giant Chogus.

effects.name: Pack Hunt
effects.text: Instead of its normal attack, Giant Korrit can attack with one of your other Creatures. Both Giant Korrit and the attacking Creature remove energy from the defending Creature, but Giant Korrit loses no energy in the attack.

flavor: That's a big mushroom, all right.
name: Giant Korrit

flavor:
"Look, it's a Paralit with barnacles on its back! No, wait, we're still
several leagues away... oh... Mother of..."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Giant Parathin

powers.name: Interchange
powers.text: Discard Giant Parathin from play. Place your current Magi on the bottom of your Magi pile face down. Bring in your next Magi with his or her starting energy. You do not get the new Magi's starting cards. You may keep your current Relics and Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Going Parmalag"
-- Underneath expression meaning "on the defensive"
name: Giant Parmalag

powers.name: Withdraw
powers.text: Giant Parmalag cannot be attacked until after your next turn.

flavor:
"Tough choice, I know."
-- Fossik, Underkeeper
name: Giant Vulbor

powers.name: Mind Shock
powers.text: Remove four energy from any one Creature. That Creature's Magi may discard up to two cards. For each card discarded, remove two less energy.

effects.name: Great Weave
effects.text: Once per turn, whenever one of your Core or Weave Creatures is attacked, you may rearrange the energy on your Core and Weave Creatures in any way you wish.
Gift of the Weave cannot be discarded from play by cards that specifically discard Relics from play. Discard Gift of the Weave frm play if your Magi is not a Weave Magi or Weave Shadow Magi.

flavor:
"Oh yeah? You gonna make us?"
-- Ashio, shortly before the Shadow Magi fled the Weave
name: Gift of the Weave
text: Weave Shadow Magi can play Gift of the Weave.

flavor: A bountiful gift for those with the key.
name: Gilded Cage
text: Choose any one non-Naroom Creature in play. The chosen Creature may not used any of its Powers or Effects until the beginning of your next turn. If an opponent's Spell, Power or Effect discards Gilded Cage from your hand, draw cards equal to the number of cards in that opponent's hand.

effects.name: Dream Blur
effects.text: All of your Bograth Creatures in play are also Core. All of your Core Creatures in play are also Bograth.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Glablit loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor:
"I'm #2. I try harder."
-- Golthub, Royal Toady
name: Glablit

effects.name: Magic Resistance
effects.text: Players must pay two additiona energy from their Magi to choose Glacier Hyren for a Spell.

flavor: It moves less than a mile a month, but two or three years from now, be scared.
name: Glacier Hyren

powers.name: Frostbite
powers.text: Move one energy from each frozen Creature to Glacier Hyren.

effects.name: Serenity
effects.text: As you play Glade Hyren, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, reduce Glade Hyren's cost by one for each of your other Naroom Creatures in play, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"I don't even dream them up; they simply appear in times of need."
-- Eidon, Elder
name: Glade Hyren

flavor: The night has an appetite.
name: Gloom
text: Choose any one player. Discard each of the chosen player's Creatures from play. For each Creature, the chosen player may discard one cards from his or her hand or discard one energy from his or her Magi to prevent the Creature from being discarded.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Whenever you play an Underneath Creature, you may move one additional energy from your Magi to that Creature. If the Creature is a Bisiwog, you may move one additional energy to it.

flavor:
"Dreaming can hurt a bit when using these. But the
results are worth the discomfort."
-- Motash, Underlord
name: Gloves of Crystal

flavor: "The walls tremble at my mighty... aww, look, a baby Bisiwog."
name: Gogor

powers.name: Gravel Storm
powers.text: Roll one die. Discard energy equal to the die roll from each Creature in play. Gravel Storm does not affect burrowed Creatures.

effects.name: Paydirt
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures defeats an opposing Creature in an attack, draw a card.

flavor:
"Talk to the spade..."
-- Gogor, Celebrated Hero
name: Gogor's Spade

effects.name: Paydirt
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures defeats an opposing Creature in an attack, draw a card.

flavor:
"I * my *."
-- motto carved on Gogor's wall.
name: Gogor's Spade

flavor: "It looks good to be the king."
name: Golthub

powers.name: Mire
powers.text: Choose any one region. Defeat Golthub. Discard all non-Magi cards of the chosen region from play.

text: Golthub can only play Bograth, Core, and Universal cards.

flavor: "It looks good to be the king."
name: Golthub

powers.name: Mire
powers.text: Choose any one region. Defeat Golthub. Discard all non-Magi cards of the chosen region from play.

text: Golthub can only play Bograth, Core, and Universal cards.

effects.name: Combat Reflexes
effects.text: Once per turn, when an opposing Creature attacks Ashgar directly, before energy is removed, you may immediately play a Cald Spell from your hand. Reduce this Spell's cost by two, to a minimum of zero.

flavor:
"He puts the terror back in terrific."
-- Gar, Healer
name: Good Ol' Ashgar

flavor: I will own all of you.
name: Gorath

powers.name: Enslave
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play with less than X energy. Gain control of the chosen Creature. The chosen Creature may not attack this turn. If Gorath leaves play, return all Creatures Enslaved by Gorath to their owners' control.

flavor: Chains wrapped tightly around Xandia, forcing a scream of rage from her lips. T'lok stepped from behind a boulder. "You didn't think I'd be that easy to get rid of, did you?"
name: Gorath Cub

powers.name: Chain Whip
powers.text: Choose a Creature or Magi with more than its printed starting energy. Remove three energy from it.

flavor:
"I didn't even know you had a spell named after him!"
-- Grega, to Fossik
name: Gorgle's Curse
text: Choose any one non-Underneath Creature in play. Discard all but one energy from the chosen Creature. That Creature cannot attack until your current Magi is defeated.

flavor:
"There is no need to fear fire -- let our enemies do that for us."
-- Gorgle
name: Gorgle's Gift
text: If you have a Creature in play, choose any one Creature in play. Discard seven energy from the chosen Creature. Return any one of your Creatures in play to your hand, discarding all of that Creature's energy.

effects.name: Pyrovision
effects.text: Whenever you discard all of an opposing Creature's energy with a Spell or Power, draw one card.

flavor: You looking at me...?
name: Gorgle's Glasses

flavor:
The ring saved old Gorgle's life many times.
Then his luck ran out.
name: Gorgle's Ring

powers.name: Wild Fire
powers.text:
Roll one die.
1, 2 or 3 = Discard one energy from each of your Creatures in play.
4 or 5 = Choose any one Creature in play. Discard two energy from the
chosen Creature.
6 = Choose any one Magi in play. Discard four energy from the chosen
Magi.

effects.name: Jile-treats
effects.text: At the end of your turn, add one energy to each of your Jiles in play.

effects.name: Affinity
effects.text: Ignore regional penalties and restrictions when playing Jiles from your hand.

flavor: "They'll do anything for my jile-treats!"
name: Gorran

effects.name: Melancholy
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures loses energy from an opposing Spell or Power, add one energy to Gragling.

effects.name: Lonely
effects.text: If you have another Creature in play, Gragling gains 'ENERGIZE: 1'.

flavor:
"Little grag lost, in a world all alone. Poor thing; all this happiness is
bringing him down."
-- Harror, Nightstalker
name: Gragling

effects.name: Share
effects.text: Whenever you play a Bograth Creature, choose any one Bograth Creature in play. Add one energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Transform
effects.text: When you reveal Grahnna, if your previous Magi was Wiep, place any one Bograth card from your discard pile into your hand.

flavor:
"Did you bring enough for everybody?"
-- Phlouk, Grand Supreme Ringsmith
name: Grahnna

effects.name: Grounding
effects.text: Once per turn, as an opposing player plays a Spell, you may discard three energy from Grakanden to cancel all effects of that Spell. Return the Spell to that player's hand at the end of the turn.

flavor:
I've never met a mushroom that could talk, but I'd swear that thing just
said 'NO!'"
-- Kesia, Weaverunner
name: Grakanden

effects.name: Burrow
effects.text: On all opponents' turns, Granas is burrowed; it cannot attack and loses no more than two energy per turn from attacks and opposing Spells and Powers.

effects.name: Pummel
effects.text: Whenever Granas attacks a Creature, Granas removes an additional energy from the defending Creature.

flavor:
"They're like magma. They move slowly underground, then way too fast on
the surface."
-- Gyrg
name: Granas

effects.name: Burrow
effects.text: On all opponents' turns, Granas is burrowed; it cannot attack and loses no more than two energy per turn from attacks and opposing Spells and Powers.

effects.name: Pummel
effects.text: Whenever Granas attacks a Creature, Granas removes an additional energy from the defending Creature.

flavor:
"They're like magma. They move slowly underground, then way too fast on
the surface."
-- Gyrg
name: Granas

effects.name: Mind Feast
effects.text: Reduce your Magi's Energize by two.

effects.name: Dream Binge
effects.text: Whenever an Arderial Magi energizes, add an equal amount of energy to Grand Epik.

flavor:
"Of such epiks are great tales made."
-- Jaela, Arderial Regis
name: Grand Epik

effects.name: Improved Invulnerability
effects.text: Granite Hyren loses three less energy in attacks.

flavor:
Formed from the hardest substance in the Teeth, these hyren can take an
incredible amount of abuse before showing signs of wear.
name: Granite Hyren

effects.name: Rock Solid
effects.text: All of your Parmalags in play lose one less energy in attacks.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Granite Parmalag loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"Going parmalag."
-- Kybarite expression meaning 'untouchable'
name: Granite Parmalag

effects.name: Chill
effects.text: Whenever Gransaber attacks, it removes two additional energy.

flavor: I'm tired; pop me a cold one!
name: Gransaber

powers.name: Ferocity
powers.text: Discard one of your other Nar Creatures from play to restore Grandsaber to its starting energy.

effects.name: Climb
effects.text: Your Magi loses no energy in attacks while you control at least one Creature.

flavor: Hrada's spell barely missed Hok as he rolled off the cliff. His trusty hook saved him from a long, painful fall.
name: Grapple Tooth

powers.name: Grapple
powers.text: If your largest Creature is larger than each opposing Creature, draw a card.

effects.name: Weaver
effects.text: All of your Paradwyn Creatures gain "Effect -- Weave: Whenever this Creature attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between this Creature and any one of your other Paradwyn or Weave Creatures in play."

effects.name: Dreamwarper
effects.text: All of your Weave Creatures in play and being played gain "Effect -- Dreamwarp: As you play this Creature, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn."

flavor:
"Our strengths could work well together, but Gia is too busy negotiating
with the Dark Twins."
-- M'lady Iyori, emissary to Paradwyn
name: Grass Etiki

effects.name: Weaver
effects.text: All of your Paradwyn Creatures gain "Effect -- Weave: Whenever this Creature attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between this Creature and any one of your other Paradwyn or Weave Creatures in play."

effects.name: Dreamwarper
effects.text: All of your Weave Creatures in play and being played gain "Effect -- Dreamwarp: As you play this Creature, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn."

flavor:
"Our strengths could work well together, but Gia is too busy negotiating
with the Dark Twins."
-- M'lady Iyori, emissary to Paradwyn
name: Grass Etiki

effects.name: Evade
effects.text: Whenever Grass Hyren is attacked, roll a die. Grass Hyren loses that much less energy in the attack.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Grass Hyren attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Grass Hyren and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"If at first you don't succeed, you're probably fighting a grass hyren."
-- Eidon, Keeper
name: Grass Hyren

effects.name: Hunting Howl
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if your smallest Creature in play is larger than the largest opposing Creature in play, add one energy to each of your other Kybar's Teeth Creature in play.

flavor:
"Nah, it's nothing. Just a gratch."
-- Zet
name: Gratch

flavor:
"Gravity is one force you just can't fight", said Koll.
"Unless you're an Arderian", replied Sorreah.
name: Gravity
text: Choose a Creature with more than its starting energy. Reduce that Creature to its printed starting energy.

flavor:
"My Super Big Grax Team will handle this! Go Grax!"
-- Korg, Core Warrior
name: Grax

powers.name: Tendril
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard half of the chosen Creature's energy, rounded up.

flavor:
"Looks more like a puddle of stinky water to me."
-- Bazha, Lifekeeper
name: Great Pool of Wisdom

powers.name: Stagnant Energy
powers.text: Roll a die. If the number you roll is less than the number of your Bograth Creatures in play, draw a card.

effects.name: Enduring Renewal
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures is discarded from play, you may discard one energy from your Magi to draw a card.

flavor:
"Great Throne Mushrooms only grow in this one place, and only in this
shape. It almost seems they like being sat on..."
-- Ninibom, Universal Greeter
name: Great Throne Mushrooms

effects.name: Overwhelm
effects.text: Whenever Great White Narth attacks, after energy is removed, add one energy to Great White Narth for each of the defending player's frozen Creatures.

flavor:
"It's a real beauty, eh?"
-- Bronn
name: Great White Narth

powers.name: Sustain
powers.text: Discard Great White Narth from play. If Great White Narth defeated an opposing Creature in an attack this turn, add five energy to your Magi.

effects.name: Expect It
effects.text: If Greater Gargagnor is discarded from your hand or deck by an opposing card, play it instead, ignoring all costs.

effects.name: Solid
effects.text: Greater Gargagnor cannot be specifically discarded from play by opposing Spells.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Greater Gargagnor loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"What do you mean they get bigg... oh, my!"
-- Ulk, Underwarden
name: Greater Gargagnor

powers.name: Unearth
powers.text: Discard a card from your hand. Search your discard pile for any one Kybar's Teeth card and place it into your hand.

flavor: Don't make it angry. You won't like it when it's angry.
name: Greater Vaal

powers.name: Immolate
powers.text: Roll two dice. Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Discard energy equal to the dice total from the chosen Creature or Magi.

effects.name: Ooze
effects.text: When you play Green Stuff, add one energy to it.

flavor:
"Yum! JUst like mom used to make!"
-- Gorran, High Exalted Trainer
name: Green Stuff

flavor:
"She's Gorgle's granddaughter. Just as powerful, and just as
unpredictable."
-- Valkan, Cald Pyromancer
name: Grega

powers.name: Thermal Blast
powers.text: Roll one die. Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Discard energy equal to the die roll from the chosen Creature or Magi.

flavor: Rumor has it she used the ring on the suitor who gave it to her.
name: Grega's Ring

powers.name: Thermal Blast
powers.text: Roll a die. Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Discard energy equal to the die roll from the chosen Creature or Magi. If the die roll is two or less, discard Grega's Ring from play.

effects.name: Kinship
effects.text: Grej may play Underneath cards, ignoring regional penalties and restrictions.

flavor: An orphan found at the entrance to the Underneath, she has found her people among the peaks, but not forgotten her home at the mountain's roots.
name: Grej

powers.name: Toughen
powers.text: Choose any one of your Underneath Creatures in play. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen Creature gains "Effect - Invulnerability: This Creature loses one less energy in attacks."

flavor:
"Why? I'll tell you why! We're attacking to cause dis...ray! And to break
things!"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Warlike Emperor of Great
   and Mighty Bograth
name: Gremble

powers.name: Parasitic Growth
powers.text: Discard Gremble from play. Discard your hand and draw three cards.

flavor:
"Why? I'll tell you why! We're attacking to cause dis...ray! And to break
things!"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Warlike Emperor of Great
   and Mighty Bograth
name: Gremble

powers.name: Parasitic Growth
powers.text: Discard Gremble from play. Discard your hand and draw three cards.

flavor: "I am the groundbreaker, down-pounding ground shaker. I am the thunder-maker, underworldly undertaker." -- Hammer inscription
name: Gremm's Hammer

powers.name: Build
powers.text: Add two Pound Counters to Gremm's Hammer.

powers.name: Break
powers.text: Choose any one non-Underneath Creature in play. Discard energy from the chosen Creature equal to the number of Pound counters on Gremm's Hammer. Discard Gremm's Hammer from play.

flavor: Gremm's Helmet is best used by those who are good role-players.
name: Gremm's Helmet

powers.name: Mimic
powers.text: Choose any one opposing Magi in play. Your Magi gains all Powers and Effects on the chosen Magi until the beginning of your next turn.

effects.name: Snow Plow
effects.text: Whenever Grendile attacks a Creature, after energy is removed, discard energy from that Creature's Magi equal to the energy on Grendile.

flavor:
"Ice, with attitude."
-- Poad, Innkeeper
name: Grendile

effects.name: Snow Plow
effects.text: Whenever Grendile attacks a Creature, after energy is removed, discard energy from that Creature's Magi equal to the energy on Grendile.

flavor:
"Dude, that is so cool!"
-- Yaki, Core Stalker
name: Grendile

effects.name: Backlash
effects.text: If your opponent removes Grim Goblet from play, discard your hand.

flavor:
"Dark sustenance for dark hearts. Foul knowledge wrapped in shadows.
It breeds nightmares."
-- Gia, Weave Seer
name: Grim Goblet

powers.name: Reap
powers.text: Discard Grim Goblet from play. Draw three cards. You may not use Reap if you played Grim Goblet this turn.

text: Cald Magi may play Grim Goblet.

effects.name: Rampage
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures attacks, discard one energy from the defending Magi.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Grizzled Moga loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"It's more than a little disgruntled. It's a big disgruntled."
-- T'lok
name: Grizzled Moga

effects.name: Recover
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures is attacked and defeated, add half of the energy lost from your Creature in that attack (rounded down) to Groll.

flavor: Where trouble comes, Groll goes.
name: Groll

effects.name: Betrayal
effects.text: Your Creatures lose one extra energy in attacks with Core Creatures.

flavor: "T'lok! What have you done?"
name: Groll the Fallen

powers.name: Desperate
powers.text: Choose a Creature. Until the beginning of your next turn, after that Creature removes energy from an opposing Creature in an attack, add energy to Groll the Fallen equal to the energy removed from the opposing Creature.

flavor: Bria's phrup nullified the magic of the relics guarding Evu's study. A brief search of the premises revealed exactly what she had been looking for.
name: Grotto Phrup

powers.name: Dreamsynch
powers.text: Discard Grotto Phrup from play. Powers and Effects on opposing Relics currently in play may not be used until the beginning of your next turn. All ongoing Effects on opposing Relics in play are cancelled.

text: Orothe Shadow Magi may play Grotto Phrup.

flavor:
"If I can't make them shake with fear, I can at least make them shake."
-- Strag, Underwatcher
name: Ground Breaker
text: Roll one die. Choose any one Magi in play. Discard energy equal to the die roll from the chosen Magi.

flavor:
"Let's see how far the ivy spreads this time!"
-- Tryn, Daughter of Runes
name: Grow
text: Roll one die. Choose any one Creature in play. Add energy equal to the die roll to the chosen Creature.

flavor: The merging is complete!
name: Grubble

powers.name: Dreamform
powers.text: Choose any one other Grubble in play. Discard both this Grubble and the chosen Grubble from play. Search your deck for any one Creature and play that Creature with its starting energy.

flavor:
"Sure, she's an incredible Mushroom Farmer, but I
can only stand them for dinner so often."
-- Wence, Naroom Adventurer
name: Gruk

power.name: Undream
power.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Return the chosen Creature to its owner's hand and place its energy on Gruk.

flavor: "I wonder how long it'll take Strag to miss these spiffy claws?"
name: Gulg

powers.name: Fortify
