powers.text: Add two energy to each Creature you control that defeated a Creature in an attack this turn.

effects.name: Slide
effects.text: If Gum-Gum is attacked, you may switch it with any other Creature you control before energy is removed.

flavor:
"When hunting Gum-Gums, make sure you're ready for whatever they choose to
hide behind."
-- Fossik, Underkeeper
name: Gum-Gum

effects.name: Night's Shade
effects.text: Once per turn, when a Creature is discarded from play, choose a Creature. Discard two energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Run through the forest, gumph!"
-- Sperri, Fiend of Furoks
name: Gumph
text: Naroom Magi can play Gumph.

effects.name: Vile Herald
effects.text: Bograth Magi and Core Magi can play both Core Creatures and Bograth Creatures, ignoring regional penalties and restrictions.

effects.name: Escape
effects.text: If Gwaeg is defeated while defending, place it into your hand instead of your discard pile.

flavor:
"Korg, you have much more in common with these people than you think."
-- Zet
name: Gwaeg
text: Only Bograth Magi or Core Magi can play Gwaeg.

effects.name: Vile Herald
effects.text: Bograth Magi and Core Magi can play both Core Creatures and Bograth Creatures, ignoring regional penalties and restrictions.

effects.name: Escape
effects.text: If Gwaeg is defeated while defending, place it into your hand instead of your discard pile.

flavor:
"Korg, you have much more in common with these people than you think."
-- Zet
name: Gwaeg
text: Only Bograth Magi or Core Magi can play Gwaeg.

effects.name: Maximum Warp
effects.text: Once per turn as you are playing another Paradwyn Creature, you may change its starting energy to any other number until the end of the turn. You cannot change it to less than one or to more than Gwomba's current energy.

effects.name: Maximum Fury
effects.text: All Bograth Creatures lose one additional energy in attacks.

flavor:
"When it's well fed, we're all well fed!"
-- Boria, Elder
name: Gwomba

effects.name: Digging Mastery
effects.text: Each of your Underneath Creatures in play loses no more than two energy each time it is attacked.

flavor:
"What we need is a bigger shovel!"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Excavating Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Gyrg

effects.name: Serve
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if your Magi is d'Resh, you may move all energy on Habob to your Magi.

flavor:
"With a friend like him, you won't have many enemies."
-- Drajan
name: Habob
text: When you reveal a d'Resh Magi, if you have one or more recurring cards in your discard pile, you may discard one energy from your Magi to choose one recurring card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

flavor:
"Now that's what I call a hard rain."
-- Taisa
name: Hailstorm Pendant

powers.name: All Hail You
powers.text: If you have no Creatures in play, choose a Creature in play. Remove energy from the chosen Creature equal to your Magi's energize.

flavor:
"When Hajnyn decides to vanish, he's as hard to find as 
a shadow in a storm."
-- Ust
name: Hajnyn

powers.name: Iceberg
powers.text: Choose a Frozen Creature you control and an opposing Creature with less energy. Discard both Creatures from play.

effects.name: Crack
effects.text: Opposing Relics cost two additional energy to play.
Each of your non-Nar, non-Universal cards costs one additiona energy to play.

flavor: "I once dueled a Magi from Orothe. She was very frustrated with me for some reason."
name: Halsted

flavor:
"Mine."
-- Bria, Vault Curator
name: Hand of the Sky

powers.name: Dream Steal
powers.text: Choose any one other player. Look at the chosen player's hand. You may discard Hand of the Sky from play to play a Spell from that player's hand, paying all costs, but ignoring regional penalties and restrictions. Shuffle the chosen Spell into its owner's deck.

effects.name: True Friend
effects.text: As an opposing Spell or Power removes energy from your Magi, remove two less energy. If your Magi is Universal or Naroom, remove three less energy instead.

flavor:
"He's been with me longer than I care to remember. I
don't know what I'd do without my hapu."
-- Tuku
name: Hapu
text: Hapu may not be chosen by an Effect, Power or Spell that could cause it to change controllers.

flavor:
"Today I steal your dreams, tomorrow I steal the sky."
-- Harror, Nightstalker
name: Harban

powers.name: Browbeat
powers.text: Choose any one opposing Creature in play with only one energy. Gain control of the chosen Creature.

text: Arderial Magi may play Harban.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Hardshell Weebo, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Yeah! Weebos on the halfshell!"
-- Poad, Innkeeper
name: Hardshell Weebo

powers.name: Vitalize
powers.text: Choose any one other Creature in play. Add one energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor: Funny how leveling the playing field is so unfair...
name: Harmony
text: All Creatures in play with more than three energy are reduced to three energy. All Creatures in play with less than three energy are raised to three energy. Non-Weave Magi may not play Harmony.

flavor: "I'll be back before you even know I'm gone!"
name: Harresh

powers.name: Time Shuffle
powers.text: Draw two cards. Place one card from your hand at the bottom of your deck.

effects.name: Spellfire
effects.text: Whenever any player plays a Spell, you may choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature or Magi.

flavor: I'm a blade with which my master strikes fear.
name: Harror

effects.name: Starfire
effects.text: Magi can retrieve, but not play, their starting cards. Your cards cannot force other players to discard cards from their hands.
If any opposing Magi are Core, decrease Harror, Nightstalker's energy by two.

flavor: "You may think you are safe now, but remember: night falls everywhere."
name: Harror, Nightstalker

flavor: "They may take our land, but they'll never take MY KITCHEN!" yelled Poad. With that, the coalition forces ate what might be their last meal before the assault on the Dark Twins.
name: Harvest Feast
text: Choose up to three Naroom Creatures. Add two energy to each of them.

effects.name: Master Illusionist
effects.text: Once per turn, when you play an illusion, draw a card.

flavor: "Despite the Avatar's words, I know better; deception is reality."
name: Hasseth

powers.name: Banish
powers.text: Discard one of your illusions from play and discard a random card from your hand to choose a Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Weebolicious!"
-- Hrada, Dark Lord
name: Haunt
text: Choose an opposing Creature. Attach Haunt to the chosen Creature. When that Creature is discarded, play it instead, ignoring all costs and regional restrictions. The Creature becomes Core instead of its original region(s). The Creature cannot attack the turn you play it.

flavor:
"You think that's scary? Picture this..."
-- Morag, Corrupter
name: Haunting Visions
text: Choose an opposing Creature and attach Haunting Visions to it. The Creature may not be chosen by its controller's Spells and Powers.

flavor: "A little warmth, a little regrowth, and you'll feel better, Barak. I promise", said Tryn with a smile and a wink.
name: Heal
text: Choose up to five Creatures in play. Add a total of five energy, divided any way you choose, to the chosen Creatures.

flavor:
"Like a backrub in a hot springs while you watch the sun set... Ahhh..."
-- Bazha, Lifekeeper
name: Healing Light
text: If your Magi has less energy than any other and you have fewer Creatures in play than any other player, draw two cards and add three energy to your Magi. You can only play one Healing Light per turn.

effects.name: Korg's War
effects.text: Increase the energize rate of your Magi by one. At the start of your turn, if you have at least fifty energy in play and your Magi is Bograth and an opposing Magi is Paradwyn, or vice versa, defeat all opposing Magi stacks.

effects.name: Without End
effects.text: Whenever your Magi is defeated, an opponent of your choice gains control of Heart of Paradise.

flavor:
"I'll find it, and I'll break it."
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Destructive Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Heart of Paradise

effects.name: Korg's War
effects.text: Increase the energize rate of your Magi by one. At the start of your turn, if you have at least fifty energy in play and your Magi is Bograth and an opposing Magi is Paradwyn, or vice versa, defeat all opposing Magi stacks.

effects.name: Without End
effects.text: Whenever your Magi is defeated, an opponent of your choice gains control of Heart of Paradise.

flavor:
"I'll find it, and I'll break it."
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Destructive Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Heart of Paradise

flavor:
"Which each breeze that blows through our fair cities, the heart beats
again. So long as the winds soar, Arderial will survive."
-- Jaela, Regis
name: Heart of the Sky

powers.name: Dream Steal
powers.text: Choose any one other player. Look through the chosen player's deck. You may discard Heart of the Sky from play to choose any one Spell from that player's deck and play it, paying all costs, but ignoring regional penalties and restrictions. Shuffle that player's deck and discard the chosen Spell afterward.

flavor: Fire and forget.
name: Heat Lens

powers.name: Mind Burn
powers.text: Choose any one player. Look at the chosen player's hand. You may choose any one card in that player's hand. The player discards the chosen card.

flavor:
"You call this hot? I laugh on your lapel. Ha ha ha ha ha!"
-- Lanyx, Crucible
name: Heat of Day
text: Choose a number of Creatures up to the number of cards in your hand. Discard one energy from each chosen Creature.

effects.name: One for All
effects.text: Players cannot play a Creature if a copy of that Creature is in play.

flavor: "I'd like to greet this Eidon guy I keep hearing about."
name: Helgrem

powers.name: All for One
powers.text: Discard a Creature from your hand. Choose a copy of the discarded Creature in play. Restore the chosen Creature to its starting energy.

effects.name: Unravel
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Creature or Relic uses a Power that affects one or more of your other Weave Creatures in play, you may discard one energy from Heppeswip to discard the opposing Creature or Relic from play.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Heppeswip attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Heppeswip and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
Ven aimed the heat lens at the clumsy-looking creature.
"Prepare to... HEY! That's expensive!"
name: Heppeswip

flavor:
"Not all of your tunnels have to be dug through the dirt..."
-- Trug, Engineer
name: Hidden Door
text: Search your deck for up to two Underneath Relics and place them into your hand.

flavor: Just be sure you want the answer before you ask the question.
name: Hogra Stones

powers.name: Divination
powers.text:
Roll one die and discard the top card of your deck:
1-2: Add four energy to your Magi if the discarded card is a Creature.
3-4: Add two energy to your Magi if the discarded card is a Spell.
5-6: Discard three energy from your Magi if the discarded card is a
     Relic.

effects.name: Resilience
effects.text: While any opponent has more Creatures in play than you, your Kybar's Teeth Creatures may not be discarded by opposing Spells, Powers, and Effects that specifically discard Creatures from play.

flavor: He can chase down a gargagnor. And he does so, regularly.
name: Hok

flavor:
"The problem with this is that you can't see yourself
either, so you have to guess where your feet are going."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Hood of Hiding

powers.name: Conceal
powers.text: bla blah blah...

flavor:
"You wait, Lanyx. When it gets really hot, the horizon disappears."
-- Korremar
name: Horizon's Mirage
text: Attach Horizon's Mirage to your Magi and place a d'Resh Creature from your hand under it. At the end of your next turn, play the Creature under Horizon's Mirage, ignoring all costs and discard Horizon's Mirage.

flavor:
The Call of the Horn rings through the deep,
All Relics one lost are now yours to keep.
-- Ancient Insciption
name: Horn of Renewal

powers.name: Salvage
powers.text: Each player chooses up to four non-Universal Relics in his or her discard pile. Shuffle those Relics into their owner's deck. Discard Horn of Renewal from play.

flavor: "They don't understand. Power doesn't corrupt... corruption is power!"
name: Hrada

powers.name: Tainted Touch
powers.text: Choose one non-Core Magi in play. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen Magi is a Core Shadow Magi of his or her original region. That Magi may still play Creatures and Spell of his or her original region with a regional penalty of one. Naroom Magi must pay an additional penalty of one.

effects.name: Lock Box
effects.text: When an opponent chooses one of your Relics for a Spell, Power or Effect, discard one energy from that player's Magi.

effects.name: Safe Deposit
effects.text: When your Magi is defeated, all of your other Orothe Relics stay in play.

flavor:
"I hear it's quite large."
-- O'Qua, Summoner
name: Hubdra's Chest

flavor:
"He drew his sword and said 'Take this!'
So I did."
-- Orlon, Friend of Wellisks
name: Hubdra's Cube

powers.name: Relic Subversion
powers.text: Choose any one other Relic in play. Gain control of the chosen Relic, and place it on Hubdra's Cube. You may not use this Power if there is already a Relic on Hubdra's Cube. If Hubdra's Cube leaves play, discard all Relics on it.

flavor:
"Tharik-shell points bounce off dream auras, but they 
go through Magi just fine."
-- Blu, Vault Guardian
name: Hubdra's Spear

powers.name: Stab
powers.text: Choose any one Magi with no Creatures in play. Discard Hubdra's Spear from play. Discard all but one energy from the chosen Magi.

effects.name: Dreamfetch
effects.text: Whenever you play an Underneath Spell that does not remain in play, you may discard Hubram from play to put the Spell into your hand instead of your discard pile.

flavor: Echoes travel for miles and miles in the Underneath.
name: Hubram

effects.name: Retrieve
effects.text: Whenever Hunter Furok attacks a Magi, add energy to your Magi equal to the number of the defending player's Relics in play.

effects.name: Chill
effects.text: When Hunter Furok attacks, it removes two additional energy.

flavor: With one of these looming over your shoulder, you can't get anything done.
name: Hunter Furok

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Core Spells and Powers do not affect Hunter Jile.

flavor:
A great wave to wash out corruption;
A hunter to stalk shadow prey.
name: Hunter Jile

powers.name: Drench
powers.text: Choose any one player. Discard Hunter Jile from play. The chosen player reveals his or her hand and discards all Core Creature shown.

effects.name: Spell Drain
effects.text: Once per turn, when an opponent plays a Relic or a Spell, add three energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"I was doing fine, having fun. Then the eye of the storm winked at me."
-- Kazm, Scout
name: Hurricane Orish

effects.name: Spell Drain
effects.text: Once per turn, when an opponent plays a Relic or a Spell, add three energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"I was doing fine, having fun. Then the eye of the storm winked at me."
-- Kazm, Scout
name: Hurricane Orish

flavor:
You say there are three things you can do to utterly wreck me? You mean
this, and this, and this?
name: Husp

powers.name: Ensnare
powers.text: Discard Husp from play. Search through any player's deck. You may remove up to three different cards from the deck and place them in their owner's discard pile. Shuffle the deck afterward.

flavor:
Through the forests, through the deep,
Through the mountains hyren creep.
Caverns echo hyrens' cries.
Streaking shadows split the skies.
name: Hyren's Call
text: Search your deck for any one hyren. Play the hyren with full energy. The hyren cannot attack this turn. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "If I take you away from you, what's left?"
name: Iain

powers.name: Beginning's End
powers.text: Choose any one opposing Creature in play. Discard energy from the chosen Creature equal to that Creature's starting energy.

flavor: "Remember when I said I'd save you for last? I lied."
name: Iain, Commando

powers.name: Impair
powers.text: Each opposing Creature with more than its starting energy is reduced to its printed starting energy.

flavor:
"Although our song is way too long,
We find there's something worse;
We've just been told of arbolls cold
We need another verse!"
-- The Arbolit, verse after the last verse
name: Ice Arboll

powers.name: Ice Pack
powers.text: If Ice Arboll is frozen, discard it to add two energy to each of your Creatures.

effects.name: Smash
effects.text: When Ice Furok attacks a frozen Creature, it loses no energy in the attack.

flavor:
"I hear they're real Furokious -- OW! Ow ow ow ow ow!"
-- Marella
name: Ice Furok

effects.cost: If your Magi's Energize is greater than each opposing Magi's, Ice Hyren gains ENERGIZE: 1.
effects.name: Shared Strength
Ravage
effects.text: When Ice Hyren attacks and defeats a Creature, choose an opposing Relic. Discard the chosen Relic.

flavor:
"Well, it was nice while it lasted."
-- Eryss, the Insane
name: Ice Hyren

effects.name: Shared Strength
effects.text: If your Magi's Energize rate is greater than any opposing Magi's, Ice Hyren gains ENERGIZE: 1.

effects.name: Ravage
effects.text: When Ice Hyren attacks and defeats an opposing Creature, choose any one opposing Relic in play. Discard the chosen Relic from play.

flavor:
"Ice, under pressure. Good stuff."
-- Eryss, The Insane
name: Ice Hyren

effects.name: Magnify
effects.text: During your Draw step, if you have a frozen card in play, draw an additiona card.

flavor:
"Hmmm, looks like snow."
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Meteorological Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Ice Lens

flavor: A frozen explosion.
name: Ice Rupture
text: Choose one of your frozen Nar Creatures. Discard your Creature to choose an opposing Magi and one of that Magi's Creatures. Discard as much energy as your frozen Creature had from each chosen card.

effects.name: Icy Vines
effects.text: Once per turn, as an opposing Frozen Creature attacks, move one energy from that Creature to Ice Vinoc.

flavor: Their chilling grip drains the energy from even the stoutest Dream Creatures.
name: Ice Vinoc

effects.name: The Rest Is Unseen
effects.text: The first time Iceberg Hyren is attacked, you may discard one energy from your Magi. If yu do, add nine energy to Iceberg Hyren before energy is removed. This Effect cannot be copied.

flavor: It likes to fight foes of huge size, and has taken down some that are truly titanic.
name: Iceberg Hyren

effects.name: The Rest Is Unseen
effects.text: The first time Iceberg Hyren is attacked, you may discard one energy from your Magi. If yu do, add nine energy to Iceberg Hyren before energy is removed. This Effect cannot be copied.

flavor:
"Who knew water could be harder than rock?"
-- T'lok
name: Iceberg Hyren

effects.name: Chilling Thought
effects.text: Your cards cost one extra energy to play.

flavor: It gives the term "brain freeze" a whole new meaning.
name: Icecap
text: When Icecap comes into play choose an opposing Magi. That Magi gaines control of Icecap. At the end of your turn, you may discard all of your Relics from play.

flavor:
"Now I know what it's like to be an eebit running from a charging
carillion."
-- Orwin, Vacationer
name: Icefang Battlesled

powers.name: Zoom
powers.text: Choose one of your Creatures. Add two energy to the chosen Creature. That Creature can and must attack a Magi directly this turn. Use this power only before the Attack step.

flavor: Frost sears the skins as readily as flame.
name: Icefield Ashryte

powers.name: Thermal Stress
powers.text: Choose a card in play of a different region than its Magi. Discard the chosen card.

flavor: The hot sun seemed to have no effect on the legions of Nar creatures. A haze of ice seemed to surround each one.
name: Icepack
text: Choose a Creature and attach Icepack to it. If the Creature is Frozen, its Powers cost two less energy, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Spike
effects.text: Whenever an opponent plays a Relic, choose one of that players Creatures. Discard two energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor: They say that no two ickles are alike, but who has seen all the ickles?
name: Ickle

flavor:
"It almost seems too small. Three sizes too small."
-- Orwin, Vacationer
name: Icy Heart
text: Each of your cards with an energy cost (X equals zero) greater than or equal to your Magi's Energize costs one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Cold Comfort
effects.text: Reduce each Magi's Energize by the number of frozen Creatures that Magi has in play.
If any player has no Creatures in play, discard Icy Prison from play.

flavor: The more you grow, the tighter it seems.
name: Icy Prison

flavor:
K.O.
2 Hit Special Move Finish
25000 Points
name: Impact
text: Choose any one of your Creatures and any one Magi in play. Discard twice as much energy as the chosen Creature has from the chosen Magi. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor: What is the sound of one mind emptying?
name: Implosion
text: Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Discard X Orothe cards from your hand. Discard X energy from the chosen Creature or Magi.

flavor: It's a pyro maniac.
name: Inferno Xyx

powers.name: Blast
powers.text: Discard Inferno Xyx from play. Choose any one Creature in play. Discard fifteen energy from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Reprise
effects.text: When you play Inhibitor Band, return all other Universal Relics to their owners' hands.

effects.name: Universal Lock
effects.text: Players cannot play Universal Relics from their hands.

flavor:
"Secret powers need secrets, and they're not secrets if everyone knows
about them."
-- Gia, Seer
name: Inhibitor Band

flavor:
"How are those snowballs coming?"
-- Laranel, Ice Queen
name: Instant Fortress

powers.name: Bastion
powers.text: Choose an opponent. If you did not attack the chosen opponent or any of that opponent's cards this turn, that player cannot choose your Magi or Creatures for Powers or Spells until your next turn or until Instant Fortress leaves play. Use this Power only after your Attack step.

flavor: Can you stand twice the pain?
name: Intensify
text: The next Spell or Power that discards energy from one or more Magi instead discards twice as much energy from each of those Magi.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Inyx, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to the number of other Paradwyn Creatures that you have in play, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Happiness can be rather indiscriminate."
-- Bazha, Lifekeeper
name: Inyx

powers.name: Vitalize
powers.text: If there is at least one opposing Creature in play, add one energy to each Creature in play.

flavor:
"Anyone who uses the word 'fireproof' has never run into an ithapher."
-- Valkan, Cald Pyromancer
name: Ithapher

powers.name: Combustion
powers.text: Until the end of your turn, each Spell of Power that discards energy from a single Creature discards one additional energy.

effects.name: Spite
effects.text: If Iximin is defeated in an attack, discard three energy from the Creature that defeated it.

flavor: An Iximin doesn't need to hold it breath. It just holds yours.
name: Iximin

flavor:
"Wow. Your knowledge, her power. This gal's got it togeher."
-- Fossik, Underkeeper
name: Iyori

powers.name: Lost Wisdom
powers.text: Discard one card from your hand. Choose any one player. The chosen player discards one card at random from his or her hand.

effects.name: Sandomancy
effects.text: Whenever you play a d'Resh Relic, choose a Creature. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Until there's nothing left but the sand."
-- Gherish
name: Izmer

powers.name: Abrade
powers.text: Choose an opposing Creature. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Collector
effects.text: Whenever any player plays a Relic, add two energy to J'lith.

effects.name: Coveting
effects.text: If you ever have no Relics in play, discard J'lith from play.

flavor:
"I've got more magical trinkets than I can count, and I'm still little old
me!"
-- Tryn, Daughter of Runes
name: J'lith

effect.name: Spite
effect.text: If Jaela is defeated, discard one energy from each Creature in play.

flavor: Regis of the sky realm, she watches over her people in their isolation.
name: Jaela

flavor: Everyone gets a chance to climb the Teeth... but only one.
name: Jagged Rocks
text: Add two energy to the smallest Kybar's Teeth Creature in play. Discard three energy from the largest non-Kybar's Teeth Creature in play.

effects.name: Perpetual Motion
effects.text: When you reveal Jagt, choose any one other player. All of your Effects that ordinarily happen at the beginning of your turn, instead happen at the beginning of the chosen player's turn.

flavor: Fighting Jagt is like having a dream that never ends. Except the dream is hers, not yours.
name: Jagt

effects.name: Guardian
effects.text: After an opposing card discards one or more of your Orothe Relics from play, you may remove one energy from Jaim. If you do, return the Relics to their owner's hand.

flavor: "I'm never caught unprepared when my relics are near."
name: Jaim
text: You may not play more than two Relics per turn.

flavor: Skulking in the lava pools of Cald, these creatures enjoy picking on passing Arbolits.
name: Jakla Prowler

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing Cald Creature. Remove one energy from it and remove one energy from its controller's Magi for each Spell in your discard pile.

text:
Jakla Prowler's text cannot be altered.
Core Magi may play Jakla Prowler.

flavor: "You think you can beat me with fruit on sticks? Ha! Ow! Ow-ow!"
name: Jalex

powers.name: Designer Intent
powers.text: Choose a region. Until the end of your turn, Jalex can play Creatures and Spells of the chosen region, ignoring regional restrictions and penalties.

effects.name: Bicker
effects.text: Whenever Janx attacks, discard two energy from each of the defending Magi's stalked Creatures after energy is removed.

flavor:
"Good tracker, decent navigator. Lousy conversationalist."
-- Liriel
name: Janx

effects.name: Double or Nothing
effects.text: Increase the energize rate of all Magi in play by five. All Spells cost one additional energy to play.

flavor:
"Wait -- what's that?"
"It ain't no Magi, that's fer sure."
-- Zet and Korg
name: Jasker's Mask

flavor:
"One ticket for the Beatdown Express, coming up!"
-- Kalius
name: Jetstream
text: Play an Arderial Creature from your hand with a starting energy of three or less, ignorng all costs. That Creature cannot gain energy this turn.

effects.name: Vitalize
effects.text: All of your Jiles and Bograth Creatures in play gain ENERGIZE: 1.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Jile loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor: Jiles led Bograth's invasion of Paradwyn, scouting the opposition for their masters.
name: Jile

effects.name: Tap Strength
effects.text: Once per turn, whenever one or more opposing Creatures gains any amount of energy, you may add energy to Jip equal to the total energy gained by the opposing Creatures.

flavor: It's happy when you're happy... which may then make you unhappy.
name: Jip
text: Naroom Shadow Magi may play Jip.

flavor: It gives to the soil, and the soil gives back tenfold.
name: Jore

powers.name: Nourish
powers.text: Add one energy to each of your other burrowed Creatures.

effects.name: Heatwave
effects.text: Once per turn, after a Cald Spell discards an opposing Creature from play, remove two energy from that Creature's Magi.

flavor: His smoldering good looks make him popular among the ladies no matter where he goes.
name: Jory

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Jumbor attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Jumbor and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"That thing called me stupid!"
"Yeah... and your point?"
-- Korg and Zet
name: Jumbor

powers.name: Taunt
powers.text: Choose any one player. Each of the chosen player's Creatures must attack during that player's next Attack Step, if able.

text: Weave Shadow Magi may play Jumbor.

effects.name: Defender
effects.text: If Jungle Eebit would be defeated in an attack, move up to two energy from your Magi to Jungle Eebit, after energy is removed, instead of discarding it from play.

flavor:
"They're tough little buggers... I'll give 'em that!"
-- Yricho
name: Jungle Eebit

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: Once per turn, as any player plays a Creature, you may choose to increase or decrease its starting energy by up to two until the end of the turn, to a minimum of one. Dreamwarp may not raise a Creature's starting energy above the amount of energy on that player's Magi.

flavor:
"Paradwyn is a wild, untamed place. You just never know what's going to
happen in there."
-- Gia, Weave Seer
name: Jungle Hyren

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: Once per turn, as any player plays a Creature, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to two until the end of the turn, to a minimum starting energy of one. This Effect cannot raise a Creature's starting energy above the amount of energy on that player's Magi.

flavor: Dream a belittled dream.
name: Jungle Hyren

flavor:
Searching eyes and twitching nose
As anticipation grows.
The jungle jile surely knows
It's more fun to pounce!
-- The Scarlet Song
name: Jungle Jile

powers.name: Mass Stalk
powers.text: Choose any one player. Until the beginning of your next turn, all of that player's Creatures are stalked; whenever a stalked Creature is attacked, discard one energy from the stalked Creature before energy is removed.

flavor:
"Ninx's riddles leave people in such a confused state
that they can't tell whether he's a man or a woman."
-- Liriel, Bagala Trainer
name: Jungle Riddle
text: Discard a card from your hand and choose an opponent. That opponent removes up to five energy from his or her Magi. Add energy to your Magi equal to five minus the energy your opponent removed from his or her Magi.

effects.name: Rage
effects.text: Whenever Junjertrug attacks, add two energy to it before energy is removed.

effects.name: Hunger
effects.text: Junjertrug must attack each turn if able.

flavor:
"Bad dream! Bad! No treat!"
-- Marella
name: Junjertrug

flavor: It's more effective than a dinner bell.
name: Junjertrug Horn

powers.name: Summon
powers.text: Search your deck and/or discard pile for any one Junjertrug. Place the chosen Creature into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

effects.name: Stalk
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Magi plays a Creature, you may discard one energy from K'ly. If you do, until the end of your next turn, that Creature and all other Creatures played this turn are stalked; whenever a stalked Creature is attacked, discard one energy from the stalked Creature before energy is removed.

effects.name: Hunt
effects.text: Whenever K'ly attacks a stalked Creature, add one energy to K'ly before energy is removed.

flavor: They say it can hear you blink.
name: K'ly

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play K'teeb, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Wow, I wish you were a giant carillion... Oh, wait, you can do it!
WOO-HOO!"
-- Yaki, Tracker
name: K'teeb

powers.name: Dream Cross
powers.text: Choose any one of your other Creatures in play. Until the chosen Creature leaves play, all Powers printed on the chosen Creature are also considered to be printed on K'teeb. K'teeb cannot copy a Power that it already has. All of K'teeb's Powers that reference the card that they are printed on now reference K'teeb.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play K'teeb, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Wow, I wish you were a giant carillion... Oh, wait, you can do it!
WOO-HOO!"
-- Yaki, Tracker
name: K'teeb

powers.name: Dream Cross
powers.text: Choose any one of your other Creatures in play. Until the chosen Creature leaves play, all Powers printed on the chosen Creature are also considered to be printed on K'teeb. K'teeb cannot copy a Power that it already has. All of K'teeb's Powers that reference the card that they are printed on now reference K'teeb.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play K'teeb Cub, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Aww, look, a Keeb C'tub. I mean--"
-- Gogor, Celebrated Hero of the Underneath
name: K'teeb Cub

powers.name: Empower
powers.text: Choose any one of your Naroom or Paradwyn Creatures in play. The first time the chosen Creature uses a Power this turn, the cost for that Power is zero. If there is an X in the cost, X equals zero.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play K'teeb Cub, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Aww, look, a Keeb C'tub. I mean--"
-- Gogor, Celebrated Hero of the Underneath
name: K'teeb Cub

powers.name: Empower
powers.text: Choose any one of your Naroom or Paradwyn Creatures in play. The first time the chosen Creature uses a Power this turn, the cost for that Power is zero. If there is an X in the cost, X equals zero.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play K'teeb Thumper, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor: The K'teeb thumped the Jile, but when it lifted its claw, there was nothing there.
name: K'teeb Thumper

powers.name: Dreamthump
powers.text: Choose any one Creature or Magi in play that used a Power on its player's last turn. Discard three energy from the chosen Creature or Magi.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play K'teeb Thumper, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor: The K'teeb thumped the Jile, but when it lifted its claw, there was nothing there.
name: K'teeb Thumper

powers.name: Dreamthump
powers.text: Choose any one Creature or Magi in play that used a Power on its player's last turn. Discard three energy from the chosen Creature or Magi.

flavor: "Come unto me, all ye of the wind, for I will give you breath."
name: Kalius

powers.name: Wind Spawn
powers.text: Play any one Arderial Creature from your hand. Place two energy on it instead of its normal starting energy. Discard that Creature from play at the end of this turn.

effects.name: Purity
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if all Spells in your discard pile are Arderial, discard all of your non-Arderial cards from play and choose any one non-Arderial Creature in play with three or less energy. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor:
"When all is said and done, it's how you got there that matters."
-- Kalius
name: Kalius' Ring

flavor:
"These scurvy knaves know the real thing from a Relic Mirror reflection.
Good thing they're easily intimidated."
-- Blu, Vault Guardian
name: Karak

powers.name: Steal
powers.text: Choose any one player and a Relic controlled by that player. Place the chosen Relic under Karak. While Karak is in play, Relics with the same name cannot be played by the chosen player. Relics under Karak are not affected by Spells and Powers. When Karak leaves play, return any Relics under Karak to their owners' hands.

effects.name: Acquisition
effects.text: Whenever you gain control of an opposing player's card, add two energy to your Magi.

flavor: Your loss becomes my gain.
name: Karak Band

effects.name: Cloud
effects.text: When you play Karak Ink, choose an opponent. Whenever that opponent draws a card outside of their Draw step, they must reveal it to all players. If the revealed card is a Creature, add one energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"YECCH!"
-- Evil Evu
name: Karak Ink

effects.name: Two for Me
effects.text: Whenever you take control of another player's card, draw two cards.

flavor:
"I don't like it when you do that. Reminds me of our government."
-- Tony Jones
name: Karak Necklace

powers.name: None for You
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play that you own. Gain control of the chosen Creature.

flavor: "Crackle!"
name: Karkik

powers.name: Flameburst
powers.text: Choose any one player with more Creatures in play than you. Discard the chosen player's smallest Creature from play. In the case of a tie, you choose the Creature to be discarded.

flavor: "Crackle!"
name: Karkik

powers.name: Flameburst
powers.text: Choose any one player with more Creatures in play than you. Discard the chosen player's smallest Creature from play. In the case of a tie, you choose the Creature to be discarded.

effects.name: Vengeance
effects.text: If any opposing Magi is Cald, increase Karse's energize by two.

effects.name: Fury
effects.text: Each of your Orothe and Universal cards that costs seven or more energy costs three less energy to play.

flavor: "I'm givin' them all I got!"
name: Karse

effects.name: Relic Subversion
effects.text: When you reveal Kayliel, gain control of all opposing Relics.

flavor: Cute but crabby.
name: Kayliel

effects.name: Hunter
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Magi plays a Creature with starting energy less than the current energy of your smallest Kybar's Teeth Creature in play, add three energy to Kazm.

flavor: You think that little guy will save you? Think again!
name: Kazm

effects.name: Momentum
effects.text: Once per turn, when you play a Bograth Creature, you may add energy to it equal to the number of your other Bograth Creatures in play. Discard one of your Bograth Creatures from play.

flavor:
"It can always get worse."
-- attributed to Grath
name: Keggerop

flavor: Feed me.
name: Kelthet

powers.name: Consume
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Move all of the chosen Creature's energy to Kelthet.

flavor: The tuk berries taste like tuk berries!
name: Keru

powers.name: Weed
powers.text: Search your deck for up to three cards and discard them. Shuffle your deck and draw a card.

effects.name: Native Strength
effects.text: Kesia may not play non-Weave Spells. Weave Spells cost Kesia two less energy, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Wild Growth
effects.text: Whenever any of your Creatures in play use an Effect that specifically moves energy, add one energy to that Creature.

flavor:
"She's good. Arrogant, naive, and narrow-minded, but very good."
-- Yerthe
name: Kesia

flavor:
"Dang! Tune that thing, will ya?"
-- Tony Jones
name: Kesia's Flute

powers.name: Bend
powers.text: Discard one energy from any number of your Weave Creatures in play; if Kesia is your Magi, may move move all energy to Kesia instead of discarding it. Add two energy to an equal number of other Creatures in play.

effects.name: Hunt
effects.text: Whenever Khisp attacks a stalked Creature, add two energy to Khisp before energy is removed.

flavor:
"Khisps. Very dangerous. You go first."
-- Al-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Super-Brave Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Khisp

effects.name: Burrow
effects.text: As long as your have another Kybar's Teeth and another Underneath Creature in play, Kier is burrowed; it cannot attack and loses no more than two energy per turn from attacks and opposing Spells and Powers.

effects.name: Crush
effects.text: Whenever Kier attacks a Creature, Kier removes an additional energy from the defending Creature.

flavor:
"Believe me, there's a lot of space between the mountaintops and the
tunnels. Just about anything could be hiding in there."
-- Grej
name: Kier

effects.name: Burrow
effects.text: As long as your have another Kybar's Teeth and another Underneath Creature in play, Kier is burrowed; it cannot attack and loses no more than two energy per turn from attacks and opposing Spells and Powers.

effects.name: Crush
effects.text: Whenever Kier attacks a Creature, Kier removes an additional energy from the defending Creature.

flavor:
"Believe me, there's a lot of space between the mountaintops and the
tunnels. Just about anything could be hiding in there."
-- Grej
name: Kier

effects.name: Swoon
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, you may add five energy to Kiersta. If you do, skip your Attack step this turn. You cannot use Swoon on your next turn.

flavor:
"Falling asleep at random is one thing, but falling asleep on a vine
swing?"
-- Bazha, to Emlob
name: Kiersta

flavor:
"Finally! A tool worthy of the mighty Gogor!"
-- Gogor, Celebrated Hero
name: Kiesel's Hammer

powers.name: Daze
powers.text: Choose a Creature and remove one energy from it. That Creature may not gain energy until the beginning of your next turn.

effects.name: Snowblind
effects.text: Whenever Kintor attacks, it does not remove energy from the defending Creature as normal. Instead, roll a die. Remove that much energy from the defending Creature.

flavor:
"Whenever it fights, someone ends up hurting. There's just no telling
who."
-- Fray
name: Kintor

effects.name: Acclimate
effects.text: If your Magi is Frozen, your Spells and Powers on your Magi cost one less energy. If your Relics are Frozen, Powers on your Relics cost one less energy.

flavor: On a long trek through the lands of Nar, Kintor furs can make a world of difference.
name: Kintor Furs

effects.name: Motivate
effects.text: Once per turn, when one of your Creatures is attacked, you may have it remove energy equal to its starting energy instead of its current energy.

effects.name: Demotivate
effects.text: Once per turn, when one of your Creatures is attacked, you may have the attacking Creature remove energy equal to its starting energy instead of its current energy.

flavor: Fierce fighting power. No strings attached.
name: Kioko

flavor:
"She shows exceptional ability for one so young."
-- Nimbulo, Elder
name: Klynn

powers.name: Seer
powers.text: Roll a die. Reveal a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the die roll. If you reveal any Spells, choose one and add it to your hand. Discard the remaining cards.

effects.name: Nightmare
effects.text: When you play Koil, choose any one Creature in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Re-Koil
effects.text: If Koil is defeated in any attack, after it is discarded from play, choose any one player's discard pile. Shuffle the chosen discard pile into its owner's deck.

flavor:
"Those who survive the nightmares it brings do not survive the nightmares
it brings back."
-- Togoth, the Guardian
name: Koil

flavor: Oh yeah? You and whose dream army?
name: Koll

powers.name: Dream Twist
powers.text: Discard your largest Creature from play (in the case of a tie, you choose which one to discard).  Search your deck for any one Kybar's Teeth Creature with starting energy less than the discarded Creature's starting energy. Play the chosen Creature with its starting energy. That Creature may not attack this turn.

effects.name: Parting Shot
effects.text: Each time one of your Creatures is defeated in an attack, discard two energy from the Creature that defeated it.

effects.name: Fight Back
effects.text: Whenever Kolte is attacked, discard two energy from the attacking Creature before energy is removed.

flavor: "Enough of this lame-o pacifism. HIYAH!"
name: Kolte

effects.name: Dis...ray
effects.text: Korg may not play Universal cards. All Creatures played by Korg lose one energy when they come into play.

flavor:
"Shaddup, Zet! I'm in charge, and I say we go in and cause di... dis...
dis...ray!"
name: Korg

effects.name: Korg
effects.text: Korg & Zet may play no more than two cards each turn and may not play Relics.

effects.name: Zet
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures attacks, once per attack, one of your other Creatures may join in the attack. The defending Creature's player chooses one of your attacking Creatures to lose energy in the attack.

flavor:
"ZET!!! I have a plan so cunning, you could brush your teeth with it!"
"YOU?! Cunning?"
name: Korg & Zet
text: Korg & Zet count as two Magi for deck construction.

effects.name: Performance Art
effects.text: At the start of each of your turn, all non-Bograth Creatures in play lose one energy.

effects.name: Artistic Expression
effects.text: Korg's energize rate is increased by one.

effects.name: One-Syllable Words
effects.text: Korg can play Korg's Poetry.

flavor:
"Actually, I quite liked it."
-- Tony Jones
name: Korg's Poetry

effects.name: No Moving Parts
effects.text: Korg can play Korg's Sceptre.

flavor:
"You want some of this?"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Charitable Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Korg's Sceptre

powers.name: Grand Majesty
powers.text: Discard one of your cards from play. Discard one energy from each opposing Creature.

effects.name: Empower
effects.text: Powers on your Kybar's Teeth cards cost one less energy to use, to a minimum of one.

flavor: "Time may be on your side, but gravity is on ours."
name: Korok

flavor: As cold, dark, and barren as a desert at night.
name: Korremar

powers.name: Mind Shock
powers.text: Choose any one player. Skip your Draw Step this turn. During the chosen player's next turn, he or she may only draw one card.

effects.name: Dark Shield
effects.text: Core Creatures cost all players one extra energy to play.

effects.name: Wisdom
effects.text: Korremar, Avatar's Illusions may attack one extra time each turn.

flavor: Korremar met Rayje and Sinder on their way out of Paradwyn. It was easy to convince the legend and his apprentice that their goals were the same.
name: Korremar, Avatar

effects.name: Pack Hunt
effects.text: Instead of its normal attack, Korrit can attack with one of your other Creatures. Both Korrit and the attacking Creature remove energy from the defending Creature, but Korrit loses no energy in the attack.

flavor: Oh look, they want to play too.
name: Korrit

effects.name: Icy Touch
effects.text: Whenever Korul attacks, before energy is removed, discard energy from the defending Creature equal to the number of the defending player's Relics in play.

flavor: He who has the most toys, still pays.
name: Korul

effects.name: Borrow
effects.text: Koza can use Powers on opposing Relics.

effects.name: Steal
effects.text: Once per turn, when you play a Relic from your hand, choose a Magi. Discard two energy from the chosen Magi.

flavor: "The time of prophecy has arrived. It's time for Nar to move."
name: Koza

effects.name: Devour
effects.text: Whenever Krawg attacks, draw a card. If Ashgar is your Magi, draw an additional card.

effects.name: Immunity
effects.text: Opposing Effects do not affect Krawg.

flavor:
"Seems like a committee on one, to me. It's a
wonder it accomplishes anything."
-- Sinder
name: Krawg

effects.text: While Krenkrajak is in play, all Magi in play are frozen; Powers on frozen cards cost one additional energy to use. Spells cost frozen Magi one additional energy to play.

effects.name: Thick Skinned
effects.text: Krenkrajak is not affected by opposing Powers.

flavor:
"Did you say brisk? I'll show you BRISK, baby!"
- Balachron
name: Krenkrajak

flavor:
"Yeah, I really kwupped up on his hide."
-- Bazha, Lifekeeper
name: Kwup

powers.name: Fear
powers.text: Choose any one stalked Creature. Discard three energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Here, we don't need pliths to run our messages."
-- Hok
name: Kybar's Echo
text: Until the end of your next turn, whenever one of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures is discarded from play, return it to your hand instead.

effects.text: Kybar's Fang cannot be discarded from play by opposing cards that specifically discard Relics from play. Discard Kybar's Fang from play if your Magi is not a Kybar's Teeth Magi.

flavor:
"Dang nabbit! There goes the roof again!"
-- Motash, Elder
name: Kybar's Fang

powers.name: Ancient Protector
powers.text: If an opponent has more Creatures in play than you and Kybar's Fang is a Relic, Kybar's Fang becomes a Creature instead of a Relic until the end of the turn. Add fourteen energy to Kybar's Fang whenever it becomes a Creature. Discard all energy from Kybar's Fang whenever it becomes a Relic.

flavor:
"Kybar's greatest gift: gravity."
-- Kazm
name: Kybar's Gift
text: If you have a Creature in play, choose an opposing Magi. Return one of your Creatures to your hand, discarding all of that Creature's energy. Reveal your hand to all players. Discard energy equal to the number of Kybar's Teeth Creatures in your hand from both the chosen Magi and one of that Magi's Creatures.

flavor:
"Swing it? I can barely lift it!"
-- Kazm
name: Kybar's Hammer

powers.name: Whump
powers.text: Discard a card from your hand. Roll one die. Choose any one Creature in play with less energy than the die roll. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor: Funny how so much of Kybar's wisdom revolves around fighting...
name: Kybar's Scroll

powers.name: Lore
powers.text: Roll one die. Look at that number of cards from the top of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and shuffle the rest into your deck.

effects.name: True Gift
effects.text: Kyg'n is not defeated, even if he has no energy or Creatures in play, until he is directly attacked.
Increase Kyg'n energize rate by the number of Creatures an opposing Magi of your choice has in play.

flavor: "If you do, it will be the worst mistake you've ever made."
name: Kyg'n

effects.name: Drift Back
effects.text: If Kyroll is defeated in an attack while frozen, return it to its owner's hand.

flavor: "What dat, hammer? You not like puny Core Magi? Me either..."
name: Kyroll

powers.name: Smash
powers.text: Choose a frozen Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

effects.name: Legacy
effects.text: When Lady of the Sky is defeated, permanently increase the Energize rate of all of your other Arderial Magi by one for the rest of the game.

flavor:
"With the right leader, even a vellup can take down a colossus. But I'd
still bet on the colossus."
name: Lady of the Sky

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Lahalou, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"For a little thing, it sure is big."
-- Ookami, Jungle Drummer
name: Lahalou

powers.name: Grow
powers.text: Add one energy to Lahalou.

flavor:
"I used to take a torch to the fields of grain.
Now, I take a scythe."
name: Lanyx

powers.name: Harvest
powers.text: Choose any one non-Core Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor: "It's time to repay some people for their treacheries. Korremar, Barak, Harror..."
name: Lanyx, Reaper

powers.name: Hatred
powers.text: Remove two energy from each opposing Creature. Remove one extra energy from each d'Resh Creature.

effects.name: Cold Shoulder
effects.text: Opponents must discard one energy from their Magi to choose Laranel or one of her Creatures for a Spell or Power.
Each of your non-Nar, non-Universal cards costs one additional energy to play.

flavor: In a world of power, hers is the voice of order.
name: Laranel

effects.name: Warning
effects.text: If Lasada is defeated, draw three cards.

flavor: If I'm not around to learn from my mistakes, someone else will be.
name: Lasada

effects.name: Diplomacy
effects.text: After Lasada, Emissary is defeated, choose up to one Relic, one Spell and one Creature in your discard pile and add them to your hand. Discard a card for each non-Arderial card you added to your hand in this way.

flavor:
"Lasada's negiotations always leave you with more than you started with."
-- Delia, Keeper
name: Lasada, Emissary

effects.name: Reflexes
effects.text: Whenever Lascinth is attacked, it removes energy immediately, before Creatures normally remove energy.

effects.name: Hunger
effects.text: Lascinth must attack each turn, if able. Your cards may not prevent Lascinth from attacking.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Lascinth attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Lascinth and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: A Lascinth can snap fast-moving insects out of the air, so don't be poking it with your slow-moving fingers.
name: Lascinth

flavor: Before the firestorm swept over him, Wence thought he saw a burning image of the creature that fueled it.
name: Lava Aq

powers.name: Firestorm
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Discard one energy from all non-Cald Creatures and Magi in play.

flavor:
"Arbolits heal when they burn out.
It's just a day's work to 'em.
But Lava Arbolls' stronger flames
Can easily outdo 'em."
-- "The Arbolit", verse 5
name: Lava Arboll

powers.name: Healing Flame
powers.text: Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Discard Lava Arboll from play. Add three energy to the chosen Creature or Magi.

effects.name: Charge
effects.text: If Lava Balamant attacks, add one energy before energy is removed.

flavor:
"Now that line down there looks like a lava stream, but
it's really a charging pack of those Lava Balamants."
-- Stradus, Arderial Warrior
name: Lava Balamant

flavor:
"Life is full of tough choices. It's time you make one."
-- Grega, Keeper
name: Lava Blast
text: Each of your opponents choose a Creature he or she controls, if any. Remove three energy from each chosen Creature. This energy loss may not be modified by Powers, Spells or Effects.

flavor: Some things you just can't help.
name: Lava Flow
text: Choose any one non-Cald Creature in play. Discard two energy from the chosen Creature. Opposing cards do not affect Lava Flow when it is played and may not alter the amount of energy discarded by Lava Flow. Cald Shadow Magi may play Lava Flow.

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Leaf Chogo is not affected by opposing Core Spells and Powers.

effects.name: Leaf Storm
effects.text: After Leaf Chogo attacks, you may discard it from play. If you do, add one energy to each of your Creatures. Discard one energy from each opposing Core Creature.

flavor:
"Hey you, get offa my moon!"
-- Yaki, to Warrada
name: Leaf Chogo
text: Naroom Shadow Magi can play Leaf Chogo.

flavor:
"The dead leaves nourish the seedlings. It is the Cycle of Life."
-- Orwin, Naroom Elder
name: Leaf Hyren

powers.name: Energy Transfer
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Add X energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Adapt
effects.text: When you reveal League Elder, choose any one region. League Elder is from that region.

effects.name: Prepare
effects.text: During your draw step, instead of drawing two cards, draw until you have five cards in your hand.

flavor:
"With all the troubles, we need some fun to bring us together."
-- League Charter
name: League Elder

flavor:
"I can see the future, and it's a place about 30 miles east of here..."
-- d'Rasha
name: Lens of Truth

powers.name: Future Sight
powers.text: Discard the top card of your deck. Until the beginning of your next turn, cards with an energy cost less than the cost of the discarded card (X equals zero) cost two less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Defend
effects.text: When you play Lesser Darbok, choose one of your other Creatures in play. The chosen Creature cannot be attacked while Lesser Darbok is in play.

effects.name: Tangle
effects.text: If Lesser Darbok is defeated while defending, attach Lesser Darbok to the attacking Creature. While Lesser Darbok is attached, that Creature cannot attack.

flavor:
"It's not always easy to get the darboks, so we pick on the little ones."
-- Korremar
name: Lesser Darbok
text: d'Resh Shadow Magi can play Lesser Darbok.

flavor: Your life, their weave.
name: Lifeweave
text: Discard your hand. If you discarded two or more cards, add two energy to each of your Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: The clouds sow their seeds, and the blinding trees grow tall and strong.
name: Lightning
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Add two energy to or discard two energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
Lightning rained from the skies onto the heads of the
Shadow Magi. Wherever it touched the ground, the
electricity took the form of a braggle.
name: Lightning Braggle

powers.name: Shock
powers.text: Choose up to three opposing Creatures. Remove one energy from each of them.

flavor: With sticks of sizzling light it beats on the drums of thunder.
name: Lightning Hyren

powers.name: Shockstorm
powers.text: Discard one energy from each non-Arderial Creature in play.

flavor:
"...And you brilliantly found the lightning sand!"
-- Wence, to Zannah
name: Lightning Sand
text: Until the beginning of your next turn, the first time one of your cards is chosen for an opposing Power or attack, the opposing Power does nothing, or your defending Creature loses no energy in the attack.

flavor:
"Who are you?"
"No one of consequence."
"I must know..."
"Get used to disappointment."
-- Togoth and Rayje
name: Lightning Sand
text: Until the beginning of your next turn, the first time one of your cards is chosen for an opposing Power or attack, the opposing Power does nothing, or your defending Creature loses no energy in the attack.

effects.name: Command
effects.text: Whenever one of your Bagalas attacks, add one energy to it before energy is removed.

flavor: "What's new, pussycat?"
name: Liriel

powers.name: Demand
powers.text: Search your deck for any one Bagala and place it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

effects.name: Dazzle
effects.text: Each of your Creatures in play with the Effect "Dreamwarp" has an additional three starting energy.

flavor:
"I'm full of surprises."
-- Liriel
name: Liriel's Cape

powers.name: Mass Heal
powers.text: Discard Liriel's Cape from play. If there is at least one opposing Creature, restore all Creatures with less than their starting energy to their starting energy.

effects.name: Dazzle
effects.text: All of your Creatures in play with the Effect "Dreamwarp" have an additional three starting energy while they are in play.

flavor: *Snap!*
name: Liriel's Cape

powers.name: Mass Heal
powers.text: If there is at least one opposing Creature in play, restore all Creatures in play with less than their starting energy to their starting energy. Discard Liriel's Cape from play.

effects.name: Cheating
effects.text: Whenever any other card requires you to roll a die, you may discard one energy from your hand to roll two dice and choose which number to use.

flavor:
"Chance favors the prepared mind."
-- Zet
name: Loaded Dice

flavor: Bandit is such a dirty word. I prefer 'Treasure Hunter'.
name: Locke

powers.name: Treasure Hunt
powers.text: Reveal the top three cards of your deck and select an opponent. That player chooses one of the cards. Place that card in your hand. If Locke is Frozen, choose one of the remaining cards and place it in your hand. Discard the other cards.

text: Locke may only play Nar and Universal cards.

effects.name: Regroup
effects.text: If Looph attacks and is defeated, you may immediately play a Bograth Creature from your hand, paying all costs.

flavor:
"Eryss went loophie a long time ago."
-- Olabra, The Really Greatest Elder Ever
name: Looph

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Non-Arderial Spells do not affect Lovian.

flavor:
"Ever try to down a cloud?
A little secret -- it usually doesn't work."
-- Orlon, Friend of Wellisks
name: Lovian

flavor: Lurking low behind the jungle leaves, this Minani practices its ambushing skills on the inhabitants of Paradwyn.
name: Lurking Minani

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing Paradwyn Creature and remove one energy from it. That Creature removes no energy in attacks until the beginning of your next turn.

text:
Lurking Minani's text cannot be altered.
Core Magi may play Lurking Minani.

effects.name: Rock Out
effects.text: Each of your cards with the word 'rock' or 'rocks' in its name costs two less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Flint
effects.text: Once per turn, when you play a card with the word 'stone' or 'stones' in its name, draw a card.

flavor: "You're right, Whall. I do make this look easy!"
name: M'ck

flavor:
"I wish I could promise help, but Gia and I aren't seeing eye to eye these
days."
name: M'lady Iyori

powers.name: Natural Selection
powers.text: Use this Power only before your Attack Step. Discard one Creature from your hand. Choose any one player. The chosen player must discard one of his or her Creatures from play.

flavor:
"I wish I could promise help, but Gia and I aren't seeing eye to eye these
days."
name: M'lady Iyori

powers.name: Natural Selection
powers.text: Use this Power only before your Attack Step. Discard one Creature from your hand. Choose any one player. The chosen player must discard one of his or her Creatures from play.

effects.name: Interchange
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if M'Rika has no energy and is not your last Magi, place her on the bottom of your Magi pile, face down and undefeated. Bring in your next Magi with his or her starting energy. You do not get the new Magi's starting cards. You may keep your current Relics, Creatures, and Spells in play.

flavor: "Hang on a sec, I'll be right back (wink)."
name: M'Rika

flavor: For hitting the dreamers instead of their dreams.
name: Maelstrom
text:
Discard X energy from each opposing Magi in play.
Orothe Magi may play Maelstrom.

flavor:
"Urgh... will somebody please stop the world from spinning before I get
sick?"
-- Poad, Naroom Innkeeper
name: Maelstrom Flask

powers.name: Uncork
powers.text: Discard Maelstrom Flask from play. Reveal the top four cards of your deck. You may choose any one revealed Spell. If you do, play the chosen Spell for half of its energy cost, rounded up. If the chosen Spell has an X in its cost, X must equal zero. Discard all other cards revealed.

flavor: With the right fuel, any spark of life can be rekindled.
name: Magam

powers.name: Vitalize
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play with less than its starting energy. Restore the chosen Creature to its starting energy.

effects.name: Rebirth
effects.text: As one of your Cald Creatures is discarded from play on an opponent's turn, you may discard Magam's Ring to restore the Creature to its starting energy instead.

flavor:
"Tis but a flesh wound!"
-- Magam, Flamesmith
name: Magam's Ring

effects.name: Flame Boost
effects.text: Add two energy to the first Creature played on your turn.

effects.name: Flame Strike
effects.text: Discard two energy from the first Creature played on each opposing turn.

flavor:
Fire burns / Fire lives,
Fire works / Fire gives.
-- Ringsmith's Mantra
name: Magam, Flamesmith

effects.name: Defense
effects.text: Whenever a Creature attacks your Magi directly, add two energy to that Magi before energy is removed.

flavor: For some reason, creatures striking the wearer feel no heat.
name: Magma Armor

flavor: The magma takes wing. The foe takes flight.
name: Magma Hyren

powers.name: Fireball
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature.

powers.name: Healing Flame
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Add two energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Hunger
effects.text: Whenever an opponent plays a Creature with a starting energy of two or less, you may add two energy to Magma Jile.

flavor:
"It turned my twee into a scratching post."
-- Tryn, Daughter of Runes
name: Magma Jile
text: Cald Shadow Magi may play Magma Jile.

flavor:
"If you see one of these rolling toward you, run. I'd really hate to see
you get hurt."
-- Barak, to Tryn
name: Magma Parmalag

powers.name: Immolation
powers.text: Discard Magma Parmalag from play. Discard one energy from each of your Creatures in play. Until the end of your turn, your Creatures in play lose no energy in attacks.

flavor:
"If you see one of these rolling toward you, run. I'd really hate to see
you get hurt."
-- Barak, to Tryn
name: Magma Parmalag

powers.name: Immolation
powers.text: Discard Magma Parmalag from play. Discard one energy from each of your Creatures in play. Until the end of your turn, your Creatures in play lose no energy in attacks.

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Core Spells and Powers do not affect Magor.

effects.name: Support
effects.text: Once per turn, as an opposing player is playing a Core Creature, you may increase or decrease its starting energy by up to five until the end of the turn, to a minimum starting energy of one. This Effect cannot raise a Creature's starting energy above the amount of energy on that player's Magi.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Magor, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Help! It's a Core-nivorous plant!"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Witty Emperor of Great
   and Mighty Bograth
name: Magor

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Makoor loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor: They exist only to bring down the noble and besmirch the beautiful.
name: Makoor

powers.name: Onslaught
powers.text: Discard all of your Bograth Creatures from play. For each Creature discarded, choose an opposing Creature in play. Discard three energy from each chosen Creature. You can choose the same Creature more than once with this Power.

flavor:
"I don't usually find myself partial to Corfs but I really seem to like
these."
-- The Real Qwade
name: Malevolent Corf

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing Orothe Creature and remove one energy from it. Place that Creature's remaining energy on its Magi and return it to its owner's hand.

text:
Malevolent Corf's text cannot be altered.
Core Magi may play Malevolent Corf.

effects.name: Taint
effects.text: You may play Core Spells, with a regional penalty of one.

flavor:
"Does this taste bitter to you?"
-- Evu, to Pruitt
name: Mantle of Shadows

effects.name: Vapid
effects.text: Marella may only draw one card total each turn.

flavor:
"Gosh... I dunno! (giggle)"
-- Marella's answer to just about everything
name: Marella

effects.name: Ignorance
effects.text: Your non-Junjertrug cards cost one extra energy to play.

effects.name: Bliss
effects.text: Each of your Junjertrug cards costs two less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

flavor: "Oh, right. The relic. The relic for Gia, the relic chosen specially to help Gia. Gia's relic. Uhh... that relic?"
name: Marella, Savant

flavor:
"This way, they can't see the look on your face when you
find out what's REALLY on their minds."
-- Abwyn's Journal
name: Mask of Abwyn

powers.name: Windsight
powers.text: Choose any one opponent. The chosen opponent shows you his or her hand.

effects.name: Feed
effects.text: Add one energy to Megathan at the end of any turn in which Megathan defeated one or more Creatures.

flavor: I will take you to your grim and watery nightmare.
name: Megathan

effects.name: Guardian
effects.text: If an opposing Spell or Power would discard one of your Creatures from play, you may discard one energy from Mijji. If you do, remove all but one energy from your Creature instead.

flavor: This is my jungle, I have to defend it!
name: Mijji
text: Mijji ignores regional penalties on Naroom cards.

flavor: You... know... not!
name: Mind Blank
text: Sands of d'Resh Magi may play Mind Blank.

flavor: The sand can play tricks on your eyes.
name: Mirage
text: Remove one energy from each opposing non-Illusion Creature. Add one energy to each Illusion. Only d'Resh and d'Resh Shadow Magi may play Mirage.

effects.name: Extra focus
effects.text: Whenever you play a Creature from your hand, you may discard a Bograth or d'Resh card from your hand to add two additional energy to that Creature.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Mirago loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor:
"With this guy, knowledge is power."
-- Fossik, Ringsmith
name: Mirago

effects.name: Extra focus
effects.text: Whenever you play a Creature from your hand, you may discard a Bograth or d'Resh card from your hand to add two additional energy to that Creature.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Mirago loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor:
"With this guy, knowledge is power."
-- Fossik, Ringsmith
name: Mirago

flavor:
"I don't care too much for jewelry, but wow..."
-- Tryn, Daughter of Runes
name: Mirror Pendant

powers.name: Auraflection
powers.text: Choose any one Power on your Magi. Discard energy from your Magi equal to the chosen Power's cost, and discard an additional two energy. Play all actions of the chosen Power.

effects.name: Calling
effects.text: Mist Hyren's cost is reduced by one for each of your Creatures in play.
Mist Hyren can only be played during your Play Creatures Step.

flavor: It's attracted to power. And, apparently, its tastes are not all that discriminating.
name: Mist Hyren

effects.name: Legacy
effects.text: If Mobis is defeated, add three energy to your next Magi when he or she is revealed.

flavor: "My hour will come. That is why I have been preparing someone to rule Orothe in my place."
name: Mobis

flavor:
"When a moga takes a deep breath, stand aside."
-- Kazm, Scout
name: Moga

powers.name: Roar
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. The next time the chosen Creature attacks a Creature, it removes twice as much energy from that Creature.

effects.name: Kickback
effects.text: The first time your Magi is attacked each turn, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, discard the attacking Creature from play, before energy is removed.

flavor:
"Like the boots? Lemme give you a closer look!"
-- Koll
name: Moga Boots

effects.name: Roar
effects.text: At the beginning of your Attack Step, roll a die. Until the end of your turn, whenever one of your Creatures attacks, it gains energy equal to the die roll, before energy is removed.
At the end of your Attack Step, if you attacked with any Creatures this turn, discard all of your Creatures and Relics from play.

flavor: Making one of these is like pulling teeth.
name: Moga Fang Necklace

flavor:
"Awwww, look, a--"
"HRRAAAAWWNK!"
"Aaiiieeee!"
-- Gogor and a moga pup
name: Moga Pup

powers.name: Roar
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. The next time the chosen Creature attacks a Creature, it removes four additional energy from that Creature.

effects.name: Imbue Spell
effects.text: When you play a d'Resh Creature, you may place a d'Resh Spell from your hand under that Creature. Treat that Spell as if it were a Power printed on the Creature. The cost of the Power equals the cost of the Spell, and the name of the Power is the name of the Spell.

flavor: "Oh, I have very vivid dreams. Very vivid indeed."
name: Mohani

effects.name: Heatstroke
effects.text: Creatures gain one less energy from effects.

flavor: "No one hurts my little sister! Especially not some two-bit Shadow Magi!" Xandia looked over the cliff to see what had become of T'Lok, but he was gone.
name: Molten Gauntlets

flavor:
"This is a greeting?"
-- Eidon, neck-deep in snow
name: Mombak

powers.name: Cold Pack
powers.text: Choose another Creature. Add one energy to the chosen Creature. Add two additional energy if that Creature is frozen.

flavor:
"It's my fiercest dream creature, the centerpiece of my collection, and my
best friend."
-- Yerthe
name: Monarch Hyren

powers.name: Command
powers.text: Add one energy to each of your hyren in play.

powers.name: Demand
powers.text: Search your deck for any one hyren, show it to your opponent, and add the chosen card to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: It is a rare beast, indeed, that commands obedience from all hyren, everywhere.
name: Monarch Hyren

powers.name: Command
powers.text: Add one energy to each of your other hyren in play.

powers.name: Demand
powers.text: Search your deck for any one hyren, show it to your opponent, and add the chosen card to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

effects.name: Ebb
effects.text: When you play Monsoon Hyren, move one energy from each of your other Creatures in play to Monsoon Hyren.

flavor:
"I've tried dreaming up more peaceful Monsoon Hyren, but I don't think
it's in their nature."
-- Quilla
name: Monsoon Hyren

powers.name: Ravaging Storm
powers.text: Discard Monsoon Hyren from play. Discard all opposing Creatures with less than five energy.

flavor:
"Wild thing! You moooob me!"
-- Eryss, The Insane
name: Moob

powers.name: Retrieve
powers.text: Discard Moob from play. Add one energy to your Magi for each of your Bograth Creatures in play.

effects.name: Martyr
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Spell, Power or Effect discards energy from one or more of your Creatures in play, you may discard any one of your Bograth Creatures from play. If you do, the Spell, Power, or Effect does nothing.

flavor:
"It's supposed to change color, but it never does."
-- Wiep, the Sniveler
name: Moob Ring
text: If an opposing Spell, Power or Effect causes you to discard one or more cards from your hand, you may discard Moob Ring from your hand or from play instead. If you do, until your current Magi is defeated, no opposing cards can cause you to discard cards from your hand.

flavor: What power! It just gets stronger every time I use it!
name: Morag

powers.name: Theft
powers.text: Choose any one Relic in play. Gain control of the chosen Relic for your next X turns. At the end of X turns, or if Morag is defeated, return that Relic to its owner's hand.

flavor: This present: Darkness.
name: Morag's 'Gift'
text: If you have a Creature in play, choose an opposing Magi. Attach Morag's 'Gift' to the chosen Magi. Return any one of your Creatures to your hand, discarding all of that Creature's energy. While Morag's 'Gift' is in play, whenever the chosen Magi plays a Creature, add two energy to your Magi. A Magi can only be affected by one copy of Morag's 'Gift' at a time.

effects.name: Thick
effects.text: Mosp cannot attack.

effects.name: Tall
effects.text: Mosp loses three less energy whenever it is attacked.

effects.name: Wide
effects.text: None of your none-Mosp Kybar's Teeth Creatures in play can be attacked.

flavor: A mosp gathers no rolling stones.
name: Mosp

flavor:
"You can't clean it! That'll ruin the magic!"
-- Brog, Great Fist of Korg
name: Moss Pendant

powers.name: Decay
powers.text: Add one energy to each of your Bograth Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Before I go, Korg, let me give you a few pointers..."
"Ooh, goody, I like presents!"
-- Zet and Korg
name: Moss Quido

powers.name: Dark Secrets
powers.text: Discard Moss Quido from play. Draw one card for each of your Bograth or Core Creatures in play, whichever is greater. Use this Power only before your Attack Step.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: This Creature loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor: Trulbs seem to multipy after a heavy rain.
name: Moss Trulb

powers.name: Multiply
powers.text: If you control another Trulb, move one energy from each opposing Magi to Moss Trulb.

effects.name: Escape
effects.text: Whenever a Creature you control in play is attacked and defeated, return that Creature to your hand instead of discarding it.

flavor: That's not the last you'll see of him.
name: Motash

effects.name: Dreamcatch
effects.text: If a Creature you control is being returned to your hand and the energy on that Creature is being discarded, instead place the Creature's energy on your Magi.

flavor:
"Undreaming is a sloppy process, but I think I've managed to clean it up a
bit."
-- Motash, Underlord
name: Motash's Staff

effects.name: Prickly
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Creature removes energy from Mowat, remove one energy from that Creature.

effects.name: Skewer
effects.text: When Mowat attacks a Creature with three energy or less, Mowat loses no energy in the attack.

flavor:
"It'll really stick it to you."
-- d'Rasha
name: Mowat

flavor: Splat. Splittysplat. SplishsplatterspSPLAT!
name: Muck Rain
text: Choose an opposing Magi. If the number of Bograth Creatures you have in play is greater than the chosen Magi's Energize rate, choose one of that Magi's Creatures. Discard the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Hah! Your Pyder is mine now!" Arosa boasted.
"Not for long", Blygt said, a sneer on his face.
name: Muck Shovel

powers.name: Depression
powers.text: Choose two Bograth Creatures. Move up to five energy from one Creature to the other Creature.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Muck Vinoc loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor:
"The bigger they are, the deeper they sink."
-- Blygt, Magnificent Remembering Guy
name: Muck Vinoc

powers.name: Grapple
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play with seven or more energy. Discard Muck Vinoc and the chosen Creature from play.

flavor:
"Ah, it's just mud. What harm is mud?"
-- Targ'n, Elder
name: Mud Bubble
text: Choose a Bograth Creature in your discard pile. Place that Creature in your hand. If you play one or more copies of that Creature this turn, draw a card at the end of your turn.

flavor:
Slide, slide, slippity-side, it's never too late to go for a ride.
-- Underling Creche Rhyme
name: Mudslide
text: If you have both a Creature and a Relic in play, each player chooses one of their Creatures in play and one of their Relics in play. Discard each of the chosen cards.

flavor:
"Cover me!"
-- Strag, Underwatcher
name: Muggum

powers.name: Burrow
powers.text: Discard Muggum from play. Choose any two Bograth and/or Underneath Creatures in play. Until the end of your next turn, both chosen Creatures are burrowed; they cannot attack and lose no more than two energy per turn from attacks and opposing Spells and Powers.

flavor:
"Cover me!"
-- Strag, Underwatcher
name: Muggum

powers.name: Burrow
powers.text: Discard Muggum from play. Choose any two Bograth and/or Underneath Creatures in play. Until the end of your next turn, both chosen Creatures are burrowed; they cannot attack and lose no more than two energy per turn from attacks and opposing Spells and Powers.

flavor:
"It can undream its allies, giving its master extra power in a pinch."
-- Strag, Underwatcher
name: Mushroom Hyren

powers.name: Sanctuary
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Place the chosen Creature's energy on your Magi and return the Creature to your hand.

effects.name: Watchful
effects.text: Mydra loses only one energy whenever it is attacked.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Mydra, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"We snuck into their camp last night and called up a flood. But now they
have mydra guarding them."
-- Liriel, Bagala Trainer
name: Mydra

effects.name: Watchful
effects.text: Mydra loses only one energy whenever it is attacked.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Mydra, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"We snuck into their camp last night and called up a flood. But now they
have mydra guarding them."
-- Liriel, Bagala Trainer
name: Mydra

flavor: The first time the Magi of Paradwyn faced the Bograthians, the Mydras got completely out of hand.
name: Mydra Swarm
