text: Choose any one player. If you have at least four Bograth or Paradwyn Creatures in play, the chosen player cannot draw any cards on his or her next turn.

flavor: The first time the Magi of Paradwyn faced the Bograthians, the Mydras got completely out of hand.
name: Mydra Swarm
text: Choose any one player. If you have at least four Bograth or Paradwyn Creatures in play, the chosen player cannot draw any cards on his or her next turn.

effects.name: Burrow
effects.text: Myka loses no more than two energy from each opposing Spell, Power or attack.

flavor: "You shovel real good, Gogor. But that doesn't make you a superhero."
name: Myka

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play N'kala, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"It's so soft and cuddly. And it hardly drools at all."
-- Eryss, The Insane
name: N'kala

powers.name: Support
powers.text: Add one energy to your Magi.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play N'kala, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"It's so soft and cuddly. And it hardly drools at all."
-- Eryss, The Insane
name: N'kala

powers.name: Support
powers.text: Add one energy to your Magi.

effects.name: Fearless
effects.text: As one of your Creatures attacks a larger Creature, add two energy to your Creature.

flavor: "Don't listen to that guy, he's trying to lead you down the path of the Core. I'm gonna lead you down the path of rocks."
name: N'ssah

effects.name: Possession
effects.text: If Nagsis is defeated and your next Magi is non-Core, that Magi becomes a Shadow Magi of its original region. All rules for Shadow Magi apply to the new Magi.

flavor: Don't worry, I'll be back.
name: Nagsis

effects.name: Corruption
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if all Spells in your discard pile are Core, discard each of your non-Core cards from play and choose any Magi. Move up to two energy from the chosen Magi to your Magi.

flavor:
So marked, your freedom ends.
-- Sigil's inscription
name: Nagsis' Sigil

flavor:
"Now I know where all of my dreams end up."
-- Sorreah
name: Nahara

powers.name: Remembrance
powers.text: Choose a Power on a Creature card in any discard pile that does not reference the name of the card it is printed on. Treat this Power as a copy of the chosen Power. X is the cost of the chosen Power. Shuffle the Creature whose Power was chosen into its owner's deck.

flavor:
"Look out -- they're doing the wave!"
-- Valkan, Pyromancer
name: Nalo

powers.name: Tsunami
powers.text: Discard Nalo from play. Discard two energy from each Creature and Magi in play. Opposing cards do  not affect Tsunami when it is used and may not alter the amount of energy discarded by Tsunami.

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: All Ergars and Jiles in play that you control are unaffected by non-Cald Spells.

effects.name: Rare Spirit
effects.text: Whenever a Cald Spell adds energy to one or more of your Creatures in play, instead add twice as much energy to each Creature.

flavor: Step on no pets!
name: Nara

flavor:
"One! One shadow geyser! Bwah hah hah hah!"
-- Korg
name: Naroom Shadow Geyser
text: The energy cost for this Geyser is zero if played by a Naroom Shadow Magi. In order to play this Geyser, you must discard three of your Core Creatures from play. Place this Geyser on the table. Naroom Creatures lose two energy when they are played. Whenever you play a Core Creature, add one energy to it. You may not play another Naroom Shadow Geyser while this one is in play. If your Magi leaves play, you may keep all but one of your Shadow Geysers in play. Agram does not discard any Shadow Geysers from play when he leaves play.

flavor: "The Avatar returns to us."
name: Nashiq

powers.name: Salvage
powers.text: Choose a card in your discard pile. Shuffle the chosen card into your deck. Until the end of the turn, the cost to play cards of the same name is reduced by three, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Dreamdraft
effects.text: Whenever you play one of your d'Resh Magi's starting cards, you can immediately play one Nemsa from your hand, ignoring all costs. Nemsa cannot attack this turn.

flavor:
"That's worth a nemsa."
-- d'Reshi expression meaning "valuable"
name: Nemsa

effects.name: Allies
effects.text: When you reveal Niffer, choose any one region. Niffer is from the chosen region as well as Arderial. Niffer cannot play cards that are not Arderial, Universal, or of her chosen region.

effects.name: Overwrite
effects.text: When you play a Spell, you may discard two energy from Niffer to change any one region named in the Spell to any other region.

flavor: "Well, somebody has to teach you folks how it's done!"
name: Niffer

effects.name: Stealth
effects.text: If an opposing Magi does not have any Creatures with more than five energy in play, Night Hyren may attack that Magi directly.

effects.name: Charge
effects.text: If Night Hyren attacks a Magi, add two energy to Night Hyren before energy is removed.

flavor:
The darkness brings the sound of wings.
The Hyren swoops and turns.
A watchful eyes blots out the sky,
And like a beacon burns.
name: Night Hyren
text: Arderial Shadow Magi may play Night Hyren.

flavor: Orlon had never harmed a Wellisk. Until now.
name: Nightmare Channel
text: Choose any one Creature and any one Magi in play. Attach Nightmare Channel to the chosen Creature. Decrease the chosen Magi's energize rate by two while Nightmare Channel is in play. If the chosen Creature leaves play, discard Nightmare Channel from play.

effects.name: Absorb
effects.text: After a Magi energizes, add one energy to Nightmare Construct. If that Magi is Core, add one extra energy to Nightmare Construct.

flavor:
"I've got something for that meddling Rayje, and his
little apprentice too."
-- Warrada
name: Nightmare Construct
text: Nightmare Construct's starting energy is equal to your Magi's printed energize.

flavor:
"Why'd you have to dream up that one? It... it scares me."
-- Qwade, to Harror
name: Nightmare Hyren

powers.name: Horrible Dreams
powers.text: Choose an opposing Creature. The chosen Creature gains 'Effect -- Toss and Turn: At the beginning of your turn, discard one energy from your Magi and each of your Creatures in play. This Creature removes two less energy from Core Creatures in attacks.'

flavor:
"We can count on none but ourselves."
-- Warrada, The Shadow
name: Nightmare's Dawn
text: All Magi who only have cards of their region in play gain five energy.

flavor:
"All we got now is a little energy."
"Oh, okay, I'll take that."
name: Nimbulo

powers.name: Energy Drain
powers.text: Choose any two Creatures in play. Move one energy from one of the  chosen Creatures to the other chosen Creature.

flavor: "A boot to the head is a greeting that everyone understands."
name: Ninibom
text: If your defeated Magi are Baa, Wiep, and Grannah, in that order, you can play Ninibom as a fourth Magi. You do not lose the game until Ninibom is defeated. If Ninibom is not your fourth Magi, increase Ninibom's energize to seven. Ninibom can only play Bograth, Core, and Universal cards.

flavor:
"Yes friends, act now! Destroy Paradwyn! Defeat the jungle! Eliminate even
the toughest stain!"
name: Ninibom
text: If your defeated Magi are Baa, Wiep, and Grannah, in that order, you can play Ninibom as a fourth Magi. You do not lose the game until Ninibom is defeated. If Ninibom is not your fourth Magi, increase Ninibom's energize to seven. Ninibom can only play Bograth, Core, and Universal cards.

flavor:
"It almost seems like she doesn't even HAVE eyelids."
-- M'lady Iyori, emissary to Paradwyn
name: Ninx

powers.name: Stare Down
powers.text: Choose any one opposing Magi in play with more energy than Ninx. The chosen Magi's energy becomes equal to the energy on Ninx.

flavor:
"It almost seems like she doesn't even HAVE eyelids."
-- M'lady Iyori, emissary to Paradwyn
name: Ninx

powers.name: Stare Down
powers.text: Choose any one opposing Magi in play with more energy than Ninx. The chosen Magi's energy becomes equal to the energy on Ninx.

flavor: "Yeah, that's a puzzle. I'll see if I can dream something up." -- Pruitt, Naroom Ringsmith
name: Nocturne
text: Search through your deck for any one Naroom Creature. Play that Creature with one energy, without paying any costs. That Creature may not attack this turn. Shuffle your deck afterward.

effects.name: Restore
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if Nodj has less than its starting energy, restore it to its starting energy.

flavor:
"Nodj nodj, wink wink, say no more, say--...
never mind, I guess you had to be there."
-- Tony Jones
name: Nodj
text: Naroom Shadow Magi may play Nodj.

effects.name: Sandstorm
effects.text: After an opponent plays a Creature with six or more energy, remove two energy from that Creature.

flavor:
"Nymat is our most resourceful Magi. He can make anything out of a few
random scraps."
-- Korremar, the Avatar
name: Nymat

effects.name: Catch
effects.text: Whenever one of your Weave or Paradwyn Creatures is specifically discarded from play by an opposing card or defeated while defending, you may place it below Nyrex.

effects.name: Release
effects.text: When Nyrex is discarded from play, play any one Creature from below Nyrex ignoring all costs and regional restrictions. Discard all other Creatures below Nyrex.

flavor: Where the Nyrex hides is not nearly so important as what the Nyrex hides.
name: Nyrex

effects.name: Catch
effects.text: Whenever one of your Weave or Paradwyn Creatures is specifically discarded from play by an opposing card or defeated while defending, you may place it below Nyrex.

effects.name: Release
effects.text: When Nyrex is discarded from play, play any one Creature from below Nyrex ignoring all costs and regional restrictions. Discard all other Creatures below Nyrex.

flavor: Where the Nyrex hides is not nearly so important as what the Nyrex hides.
name: Nyrex

flavor:
"We have powerful friends.
You're going to regret this."
name: O'Qua

powers.name: Conjure
powers.text: Search your deck for any Orothe Creature. Play the chosen Creature with four energy. The chosen Creature may not attack this turn.

flavor:
"Can't stand 'em. Too wet."
-- Aubra
name: Oasis
text: Until the end of your next turn, Creatures and Magi do not lose energy from opposing Spells and Powers.

effects.name: Delusions
effects.text: Whenever you use a Spell or Power that specifies Bograth or Core, you may have it specify any other region instead.

flavor:
"Everyone has their weak point. Except us. We are great and mighty. Just
ask Korg."
name: Obgren

flavor:
"If rain fell like sand, we'd have a verdant land."
-- old d'Reshi saying
name: Obsis

powers.name: Sandaclysm
powers.text: Discard Obsis from play. Discard all Creatures from play. Cards do not prevent your Creatures from being discarded by Sandaclysm.

text: Obsis can only be played if there are no opposing Creatures in play.

effects.name: Ice Wall
effects.text: Your frozen Creatures lose two less energy in attacks.
Each of your non-Nar, non-Universal cards costs one additional energy to play.

flavor:
"He's built like a brick icehouse."
-- Zannah
name: Odavast

effects.name: Feral Instinct
effects.text:
Whenever a Creature is played, roll a die:
1, 2, 3 = Choose any one Creature in play. Add one energy to the
chosen Creature;
4, 5, 6 = Choose any one Creature in play. Discard one enery from the
chosen Creature.

flavor: Ook, no, Ogar doesssn't let her petsss' dinner get away.
name: Ogar

flavor: "Dreams have energy, whether they're waiting in your head or fighting on the field."
name: Ohk

powers.name: Mind's Gift
powers.text: Discard any one Creature card from your hand. Choose any one Creature in play. Add three energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Resilience
effects.text: Your Creatures cannot be reduced below one energy by opposing Spells and Powers.

flavor: "You can't bury the mud."
name: Olabra

flavor:
"When around Korg, speak slowly and carry a big stick."
-- Olabra, Really Greatest Elder Ever
name: Olabra's Staff

powers.name: Training Drills
powers.text: If you have five or more Bograth Creatures in play, add one energy to each of your Bograth Creatures. Skip your Attack step. You may only use this Power before your Attack step.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: When you play Olum, add one energy to each other Olum in play.

flavor: Olum together now!
name: Olum

powers.name: Aid
powers.text: Discard Olum. Add one energy to each Olum play.

flavor:
"Walk without rhythm and you won't attract the olum."
-- Mohani
name: Olum Digger

powers.name: Tunnel
powers.text: Until the end of the turn, Olum Digger can attack Magi directly. Whenever Olum Digger attacks a Magi, choose any one of that Magi's Creatures. Discard two energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"These Olum do not work well with their brethren. In fact, I'd say they
hate them."
-- Dey
name: Olum Fiend

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing d'Resh Creature and discard one energy from it. That Creature is an Illusion until the end of your next turn. Illusions are not considered in play when checking to see if your Magi is defeated and cannot attack Magi directly.

text:
Olum Fiend's text cannot be altered.
Core Magi may play Olum Fiend.

effects.name: Plague
effects.text: At the end of each player's turn, that player chooses a non-Olum Creature. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Give it some animite. They love animite"
-- Nahara
name: Olum Mystic

flavor:
"It's cold in here."
"Yeah, but it's a damp cold."
-- Korg and Wiep
name: Ominous Chill
text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Until the end of your next turn, all of your Creatures in play gain "Effect -- Chill: Whenever this Creature attacks, it removes two additional energy from the defending Creature."

flavor:
"It's cold in here."
"Yeah, but it's a damp cold."
-- Korg and Wiep
name: Ominous Chill
text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Until the end of your next turn, all of your Creatures in play gain "Effect -- Chill: Whenever this Creature attacks, it removes two additional energy from the defending Creature."

flavor: The weebo looked up into the sky. "Hmm," it thought, "circling vogos. Something's about to get eaten."
name: Ominous Presence
text: Until the end of your next turn, you may play Core Creatures as if they were Kybar's Teeth Creatures.

effects.name: Heartbeat
effects.text: All Powers that add energy to your Creatures add one additional energy.

flavor: Were it not for the voice of his drums, rolling like a thunderclap and spreading the alarm, Paradwyn might have fallen to Korg's first assault.
name: Ookami

flavor: When Ookami starts to play, every heart starts beating in time.
name: Ookami's Drums

powers.name: Badum
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play with less than its starting energy. Add one energy to the chosen Creature.

powers.name: Badumbum
powers.text: Choose any one Creature n play with less than its starting energy. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Ooze Arboll loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor:
"Hey, now you've hurt its feelings. Give it a hug so it'll know you still
care."
-- Olabra, The Really Greatest Elder Ever
name: Ooze Arboll

powers.name: Amplify
powers.text: Discard Ooze Arboll from play. Add one energy to each of your Bograth Creatures in play.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Whenever Ora plays an Arderial Creature, add one energy to that Creature.

flavor: My Vellup is bigger than yours!
name: Ora

effects.name: Crush
effects.text: When you play Oranragan, choose and discard an opposing Relic from play.

effects.name: Vengeance
effects.text: When an opposing card discards one of your cards from play or reduces one of your other Creatures to zero energy, add two energy to Oranragan.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Oranragan loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"What the heck would you do with a banana that big anyway?"
-- Jagt, Prankster
name: Oranragan

effects.name: Crush
effects.text: When you play Oranragan, choose and discard an opposing Relic from play.

effects.name: Vengeance
effects.text: When an opposing card discards one of your cards from play or reduces one of your other Creatures to zero energy, add two energy to Oranragan.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Oranragan loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"What the heck would you do with a banana that big anyway?"
-- Jagt, Prankster
name: Oranragan

effects.name: Engulf
effects.text: If Orathan attacks a Creature with less than three energy, add two energy to Orathan before energy is removed.

flavor:
"Defending against an Orathan with a handful of Eebits is like trying to
empty a lake with a teaspoon."
-- Pruitt, Naroom Ringsmith
name: Orathan

effects.name: Spray
effects.text: At the end of your turn, add one energy to each of your Orathans in play.

flavor:
"An ancient relic from a time long forgotten, legends say that it was
crafted by the flyers themselves and gifted to the Orothean Elder,
Hubdra."
-- Mobis, Elder
name: Orathan Amulet

powers.name: Pod
powers.text: Search your deck for an Orathan card. Place that card into your hand.

effects.name: Spray
effects.text: At the end of your turn, add one energy to each of your Orathans in play.

flavor:
"Professor of archeology, expert on the Eliwan, and... how does one say
it? Obtainer of rare antiquities."
-- Sive
name: Orathan Amulet

powers.name: Pod
powers.text: Search your deck for an Orathan card. Place that card into your hand.

effects.name: Summoning
effects.text: When your Magi plays a Creature, he or she may use energy from Orathan Flyer to pay for the Creature. The Creature's entire energy cost must be paid by Orathan Flyer.

effects.name: Caution
effects.text: Orathan Flyer may not attack.

flavor:
"They ruled the clouds before our fathers' fathers."
-- Jaela, Arderial Regis
name: Orathan Flyer

flavor: It scatters your thoughts to the wind.
name: Orish

powers.name: Hypnotize
powers.text: Choose any one player. The chosen player discards one card at random from his or her hand.

effects.name: Anti-Magic
effects.text: Any Barl or Wellisk controlled by Orlon cannot be affected by any opposing Spells.

flavor:
"Be careful. Animate causes severe head swelling."
"It does?!" "Sure!"
-- Orlon, to Tony
name: Orlon

effects.name: Purity
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if all Spells in your discard pile are Orothe, discard all of your non-Orothe cards from play and add one energy to your Magi for each Orothe Relic you have in play.

flavor:
"The ring is worthless! I found it in a box of jellybeans. The power is in
YOU, Orlon!"
-- Mobis, Elder
name: Orlon's Ring

flavor: Big ba-da-boom.
name: Ormagon

powers.name: Devastate
powers.text: Discard all non-Underneath Creatures from play.

flavor:
"Now THAT is a BIG mushroom."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Ormagon

powers.name: Devastate
powers.text: Discards all non-Underneath Creatures in play.

flavor:
"You couldn't hit the broad side of an ormalet!"
-- Radget, to Togoth
name: Ormalet

powers.name: Tantrum
powers.text: Discard two energy from each non-Underneath Creature in play.

effects.name: Undermine
effects.text: Whenever Orok loses energy in an attack, choose any one Magi in play. Discard half as much energy as Orok just loses from the chosen Magi, rounded down.

flavor:
"So what's the bird on its horn called?"
-- Sperri, Friend of Furoks
name: Orok
text: Naroom Magi may play Orok.

flavor:
"Four! Four shadow--"
"SHUT UP!"
-- Korg and Zet
name: Orothe Shadow Geyser
text: The energy cost for this Geyser is zero if played by an Orothe Shadow Magi. In order to play this Geyser, you must discard three of your Core Relics from play. Place this Geyser on the table. Opponents must pay two additional energy to play or use Powers on Orothe and Universal relics. Whenever you play a Core Relic, each of your opponent's discards one card from their hands. You may not play another Orothe Shadow Geyser while this one is in play. If your Magi leaves play, you may keep all but one of your Shadow Geysers in play. Agram does not discard any Shadow Geysers from play when he leaves play.

effects.name: Hydromancy
effects.text: Whenever you play a Spell that adds energy to a Creature in play, add one additional energy to that Creature.

flavor:
"A drop, a drizzle, a torrent."
-- Belt inscription
name: Orothean Belt

effects.name: Empower
effects.text: Each of the Powers on your Creatures in play costs one less energy to use, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"Boulders, pebbles, sand."
-- Inscription on left-hand glove
name: Orothean Gloves

flavor:
"What ye see doesn't have to be what ye get."
-- Blu, Vault Guardian
name: Orothean Goggles

powers.name: Foresight
powers.text: Look at the top two cards of your deck. You may discard either or both of these cards, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

flavor: Who is it?
name: Orothean Horn

powers.name: Call of the Sea
powers.text: Use this Power only after your Play Creatures Step, and only if you have no Creatures in play. Put the top card of your deck into your discard pile. If the card is a Creture, discard Orothean Horn from play. Play the Creature with its starting energy, without paying any costs.

effects.name: Relic Guard
effects.text: If your opponent discards one of your Relics from play, you may discard one energy from Orpus instead of discarding the Relic.

flavor:
"Four relic mirrors. Four Orpuses. Try and loot the Vault now, I dare ye."
-- Blue, Vault Guardian
name: Orpus

effects.name: Salvage
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Magi's Spell or Relic discards any amount of energy from Orthea, you may add that amount of energy to any one Orothe Creature in play.

flavor: That hurt. I hope you're happy, because it's your turn.
name: Orthea

flavor:
"He knows a lot about our history. He's been there, after all."
-- Tryn, Daughter of Runes
name: Orwin

powers.name: Recall
powers.text: Take any one card from your discard pile and place it in your hand. Do not draw any cards during your Draw Step this turn. Cards are only affected by Recall once per game.

flavor:
"When will then be now?"
"Soon!"
name: Orwin's Gaze
text: Take any one card from your discard pile and place it on the top of your deck.

effects.name: Purity
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if all Spells in your discard pile are Naroom, discard all of your non-Naroom cards from play and add one energy to each of your Creatures in play.

flavor:
"It builds, like his temper."
-- Tryn, Daughter of Runes
name: Orwin's Ring

flavor: The future is always in motion, but that doesn't stop people from trying to jump on it and pin it down.
name: Orwin's Staff

powers.name: Preordinance
powers.text: Discard Orwin's Staff from play and discard two cards from your hand. Search your deck for any one card. Place that card in your hand without showing it to your opponents. Shuffle your deck.

effects.name: Sentry
effects.text: Your Relics and other Creatures may not be discarded from play or returned to your hand by opposing cards that specifically affect Creatures in this way. Opposing cards may not gain control of your Relics and other Creatures.
At the beginning of your turn, discard Osatch from play.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Osatch attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Osatch and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"See? We closed our eyes and it went away. Now we have a new stragedy."
-- Korg, to Zet
name: Osatch

flavor:
"I don't like cleaning... so I just don't come back."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Overgrowth
text: Choose a Creature. Attach this Spell to the chosen Creature. While Overgrowth is in play, that Creature gains "ENERGIZE: 3".

flavor:
"The tides are our greatest source of knowledge."
-- Owinda
name: Owinda's Gift
text: If you have a Creature in play, draw four cards. Return any one of your Creatures in play to your hand, discarding all of that Creature's energy.

flavor:
"Arbolits sacrifice themselves,
Throughout our land of flame.
Down in the darkened Underneath,
The Korrits do the same."
-- "The Arbolit", verse 12
name: Pack Korrit

powers.name: Morale
powers.text: Add one energy to each other Korrit in play.

effects.name: Familiarity
effects.text: When you play Pagajack, add two energy to it for each other Pagajack in play.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Pagajack attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Pagajack and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"You know what they say? They say 'Don't weave me awone!' Ha ha ha OW!!
Don't hit me!"
-- Marella
name: Pagajack

effects.name: Guard
effects.text: Whenever one of your other Creatures is attacked, add one energy to your Magi.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Pajick Pet is in an attack, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Pajick Pet and one of your other Weave Creatures.

flavor:
"Even their pets have pets in the Weave."
-- Wence's Travelog
name: Pajick Pet

effects.name: Wait
effects.text: At the end of your Attack step, if Paradar did not attack, draw a card.

flavor: Biting its time.
name: Paradar
text: Weave Shadow Magi can play Paradar.

flavor: Must... have... energy.
name: Paralit

powers.name: Lie Channel
powers.text: Discard Paralit from play. Add five energy to your Magi. Discard one energy from each of your Creatures in play.

flavor:
"We need no walls other than their fears."
-- Morag, the Executor
name: Paranoia
text: Choose any one Creature in play. The chosen Creature can only attack if opposing Magi control no Creatures with six or more energy. Attach Paranoia to the chosen Creature. Discard Paranoia if the chosen Creature is discarded from play.

flavor:
"Oh, yes, it'll take you for a ride..."
-- O'Qua, Summoner
name: Parathin

powers.name: Dream Twist
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Reveal and discard cards from the top of your deck one at a time, until you reveal a Creature. Play that Creature with half of its starting energy (rounded up) without paying any costs.

effects.name: Hide
effects.text: Once per turn, as a Creature you control is being attacked, you may move that Creature's energy to your Magi and shuffle the Creature into its owner's deck. You may not add more than the Creature's printed starting energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"Isn't it frustrating to find that your foes has simply vanished?"
-- Arosa, Keeper
name: Parathin Shell

flavor: Protected in their rock-hard shells, they attack by rolling at high speed toward their targets.
name: Parmalag

powers.name: Shield
powers.text: Parmalag is prevented from losing any energy from attacks until the end of your turn.

effects.name: Hoard
effects.text: After an opponent chooses a Relic you control with a Spell or Power, remove one energy from that opponent's Magi.

flavor: Pearl hyren are known for being protective when it comes to their owner's relics.
name: Pearl Hyren

powers.name: Jealousy
powers.text: If you have at least one Relic in play, choose an opponent. If that player controls more Relics than you, add one energy to each Creature you control.

flavor: Skittish doesn't begin to describe the hinko's relationship with its own shadow.
name: Pebble Hinko

powers.name: Skitter
powers.text: Discard a Creature from your hand to add three energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"Take deep breaths. The air is alive, and will give of its
life to restore you."
-- Jaela, to Tony
name: Pharan

powers.name: Healing Rain
powers.text: Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Discard Pharan from play and add its energy to the chosen Creature or Magi.

flavor:
"Not only is he supreme, he even makes the rings really round!"
-- Blygt, Magnificent Remembering Guy
name: Phlouk

powers.name: Ring Testing
powers.text: Play a Bograth Creature from your hand, ignoring all costs. That Creature cannot attack this turn. At the end of your turn, discard energy from Phlouk equal to the Creature's starting energy. If you don't have enough energy on Phlouk, discard the Creature from play.

effects.name: Light Barrier
effects.text: Opposing Creatures with less energy than Phosphor Hyren cannot attack your non-Hyren Underneath Creatures. Phosphor Hyren cannot be burrowed.

flavor:
"The light makes the creche-lings feel safe, and he's great at parties!"
-- Ulk, Underwarden
name: Phosphor Hyren

effects.name: Time Lapse
effects.text: Whenever an opponent plays a card you may discard Phrup from play. If you do, return the card to its owner's hand. Any energy that was used is returned to that player's Magi. Cards with that name may not be played again this turn. Orothe Shadow Magi may play Phrup.

flavor: Thanks for the info. Maybe later...
name: Phrup

effects.name: Stabilize
effects.text: As one of your Creatures is attacked, add one energy to it.

flavor: Literally a pillar of strength, the Pillar Hyren lends the endurance of age-old stone to its comrades.
name: Pillar Hyren
text: If your Magi is Underneath, Pillar Hyren may not be discarded from play by opposing Spells, Powers or Effects while it still has energy. Your Powers, Spells and Effects cannot reduce the amount of energy removed from Pillar Hyren in attacks.

flavor:
"You will learn to respect the power of..." (goosh)
"Arrg ptoo! Respect the power..." (goosh)
"Ack burble blecch! Respect..." (goosh)
-- Korg, Core Warrior
name: Pillar of Brine
text: Choose any one player. During the chosen player's next turn, each of his or her Creatures removes two less energy from opposing Creatures when they attack.

flavor:
"Bitten by a Platheus"
-- Orothe expression meaning 'lazy'
name: Platheus

powers.name: Soporific
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. The chosen Creature cannot attack until after your next turn.

effects.name: Warning
effects.text: If Plith is attacked, draw one card. If Evu is your Magi when Plith is attacked, draw one additional card.

flavor: They bear the news from all over the forest to the ancient Loremaster.
name: Plith

flavor:
"I could've sworn the food he cooked gave me superhuman strength!"
-- Eidon, Keeper
name: Poad

powers.name: Heroes' Feast
powers.text: Add one energy to each of your Creatures in play.

effects.name: Flavor
effects.text: Whenever one of your Spells or Powers adds energy to exactly one of your Creatures, add an additional energy to that Creature.

flavor:
Tastes great!
More filling!
name: Poad's Secret Sauce

effects.name: Hearty
effects.text: Once per turn, when one of your Creaturs is attacked, you may move any amount of energy from Poad to that Creature. Add an additional energy to the Creature if it is Nar or Naroom.

flavor: "Have you had breakfast today?"
name: Poad, Innkeeper

powers.name: Party
powers.text: Choose one of your Creatures. Add energy to the chosen Creature equal to the number of Creatures you have in play. The chosen Creature cannot use Powers this turn. Discard the Creature at the end of the turn.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Pody attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Pody and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: It's always willing to lend a hand, because that's about all it has.
name: Pody

powers.name: Backhand
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play that attacked on its controller's last turn. Discard three energy from the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Poison Baloo Root, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Yes, it's bad for them, but THAT'S GOOD FOR YOU!"
-- Olabra, The Really Greatest Elder Ever
name: Poison Baloo Root

powers.name: Wither
powers.text: Discard one energy from all opposing Creatures.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Poison Baloo Root, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Yes, it's bad for them, but THAT'S GOOD FOR YOU!"
-- Olabra, The Really Greatest Elder Ever
name: Poison Baloo Root

powers.name: Wither
powers.text: Discard one energy from all opposing Creatures.

effects.name: Brilliantly Absent-Minded
effects.text: During your Draw step, draw two additional cards, then discard a card at random from your hand.

effects.name: Peer Pressure
effects.text: When you reveal Pok, if your previous two Magi were Blygt and Brog, in either order, Pok becomes Bograth instead of Paradwyn until the end of the game.

flavor:
"He can calculate the air-speed velocity of an unladen fird, but he can't
quite remember which side of the war he's on."
-- Bazha, to Emlob
name: Pok

effects.name: Bury
effects.text: If Polar Eebit is frozen, it only loses one energy when attacked.

flavor: Laranel and her people arrived too late to help Yaki free Naroom but they were among the first to head for Kybar's Teeth to fight the Twins.
name: Polar Eebit

effects.name: Snowbank
effects.text: If Polar Rudwot attacks while it is Frozen, add two energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"Its friendship has helped me weather countless storms."
-- Hajnyn
name: Polar Rudwot

effects.name: Bolster
effects.text: As Porphin attacks, add energy to it equal to the number of Relics you control. At the end of your Attack Step, discard Porphin from play.

flavor:
"The porphin is ugly, the porphin is small, but with
Relics in play, your foes will fall."
-- Orothean Nursery Rhyme
name: Porphin

flavor:
"The pull of the tide is irresistible."
-- Arosa, Keeper
name: Possession's Glee
text: Add three energy to a Creature you control but do not own. Orothe Shadow Magi may play Possession's Glee.

flavor: You're gonna kick whose what?
name: Power of the Creators
text: Choose a player. If that player's name is printed in the most recent printing of the Magi-Nation Duel rulebook, choose any one Magi in play. Discard that Magi and all of his or her cards from play. You cannot choose a player who has signed this card.

effects.name: Kinship
effects.text: Prek may play Kybar's Teeth cards, ignoring regional penalties and restrictions.

effects.name: Tech Savvy
effects.text: All of your Relics cost one less to play. Your Relics' powers cost one less to use.

flavor: She helped Kazm build his wings, and made a friend for life.
name: Prek

flavor: They frequently cause scrub fires.
name: Primat

powers.name: Kindle
powers.text: Discard Primat from play. Discard from play each Creature with one energy. Discard from play each Naroom Creature with two energy.

text: Cald Shadow Magi may play Primat.

flavor: After working with Animite for so long, she can send anchoring energy to her creatures in her sleep.
name: Pruitt

powers.name: Refresh
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Add three energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Glimmer
effects.text: Whenever you energize, you may choose any one of your Creatures in play. Add the energy to the chosen Creature instead of your Magi. If your Magi is Pruitt, you may also add two energy to her.

flavor:
"Lookin' good, feelin' good."
-- Pruitt, Naroom Ringsmith
name: Pruitt's Robe

effects.name: Nurture
effects.text: Balamants you control lose one less energy in attacks.

flavor: "Yaki, why won't you look at me? What have they done to you?"
name: Pruitt, Ringsmith

powers.name: Refresh
powers.text: Add two energy to each Balamant you control.

flavor:
"My honor, that's all I need. Just my honor. And this colossus..."
-- Tuku
name: Pure of Heart
text: Attach Pure of Heart to your Magi. While all of your other cards in play are from the same region as your Magi, your Magi is unaffected by Core Spells and Powers. If you play a Core card, defeat your Magi. Cards cannot affect Pure of Heart as it is being played.

effects.name: Leadership
effects.text: When you play Pyder, move all but one energy from your Magi to Pyder. Whenever you energize, move all but one energy from your Magi to Pyder.

effects.name: Summoning
effects.text: Whenever you play a Creature, discard energy from Pyder to play the Creature. All of your Bograth Creatures cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"I'm tired. Why don't you do all the work?"
-- Korg, to his first pyder
name: Pyder

effects.name: Burrow
effects.text: Pylofuf is burrowed; it cannot attack and loses no more than two energy per turn from attacks and your opponents' Spells and Powers.

flavor: The pylofuf is also known as 'porkuslime' for obvious reasons. It doesn't dig through soil. It just oozes through the gaps.
name: Pylofuf
text: Underneath Shadow Magi may play Pylofuf.

effects.name: Luck
effects.text: Add one to every die you roll, to a maximum of six.

effects.name: Respite
effects.text: When you defeat an opposing Magi, draw two cards.

flavor: "Now I know why I get up in the morning!"
name: Pyte

effects.name: Rapid Change
effects.text: Whenever you use an Effect that moves energy between two Creatures in play, you may move one additional energy.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Quallon attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Quallon and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Their version of bug zappers is all backwards."
-- Tony Jones
name: Quallon

flavor:
"The power of freedom, the freedom of choice,
When Quallon does find, the Weave's one true Voice."
-- excerpt from Ancient Epic Poem
name: Quallon's Quest
text: Discard a Weave Creature from your hand. Reveal a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the Creature's starting energy. Choose up to two Creatures from the revealed cards and add them to your hand. Shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your deck.

flavor:
"They drive me crazy. When they go somewhere, they get back before they
leave."
-- Risha
name: Quanjuel

powers.name: Timewalk
powers.text: Discard Quanjuel from play. Until the end of the turn, you can play any recurring Creatures in your discard pile as if they were in your hand.

effects.name: Calling
effects.text: Quido Swarm's starting energy is equal to the number of your other Paradwyn and Bograth Creatures in play.

effects.name: Swarm
effects.text: At the beginning of each of your turns, restore Quido Swarm to its starting energy.

flavor:
"Them's good eatin'! You just open your mouth and run around!"
-- Grahnna, to Korg
name: Quido Swarm

effects.name: Calling
effects.text: Quido Swarm's starting energy is equal to the number of your other Paradwyn and Bograth Creatures in play.

effects.name: Swarm
effects.text: At the beginning of each of your turns, restore Quido Swarm to its starting energy.

flavor:
"Them's good eatin'! You just open your mouth and run around!"
-- Grahnna, to Korg
name: Quido Swarm

flavor: "Call me a fool if you want. You know I'm more powerful than the likes of you."
name: Quilla

effects.name: Gift of Life
effects.text: At the start of each player's turn, you may choose any one Weave Creature in play. Add one energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor: He always wakes up happy. Not so, those who fight him.
name: Quirle

effects.name: Battering Ram
effects.text: When Quor attacks an opposing Creature, discard two energy from that Creature's Magi.

flavor: Nothing can keep it from you.
name: Quor

effects.name: Charge
effects.text: When Quor Pup attacks, move up to two energy to it from your Magi.

flavor: Since it spits fire as it speaks, its bark is no different from its bite.
name: Quor Pup

flavor: You think this is the real Qwade? ...It is!
name: Qwade

powers.name: Leech
powers.text: Choose any two Creatures in play. Discard X energy from one of the chosen Creatures. Add X energy to the other chosen Creature.

flavor:
"My garden! It's been rabbaged!"
-- Gruk
name: Rabbage

effects.name: Feisty
effects.text: Whenever Rabid Bisiwog attacks, you may choose two Creatures. Rabid Bisiwog attacks both Creatures and removes its energy from both defending Creatures at the same time.
If Rabid Bisiwog is burrowed, discard it from play.

flavor: "RWAGHERYARGHERERWAGHERYARGH!"
name: Rabid Bisiwog
text: Korremar and Underneath Shadow Magi can play Rabid Bisiwog.

effects.name: Counterattack
effects.text: Immediately after one of your cards is attacked, you may play Rabid Wasperine, paying all costs. If your Magi is Naroom Shadow, add one energy to Rabid Wasperine when you play it. Rabid Wasperine immediately attacks the opposing Creature that just attacked.

flavor:
"Oh, brother darling, look. It's drooling on the carpet again...!"
-- Warrade, to Hrada
name: Rabid Wasperine
text: Naroom Magi can play Rabid Wasperine.

flavor: I'm as thick-skinned as any of my pets.
name: Radget

powers.name: Refresh
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Add one energy to the chosen Creature. Add two additional energy if the chosen Creature is a Parmalag.

flavor:
"You don't have to be crazy to live here... but you must be crazy to
invade us."
-- Boria, to Korg
name: Radiant Spring
text: Until the end of the turn, all Creatures with the Effect "Dreamwarp" may Dreamwarp for up to an additional five energy.

flavor: They all look the same when I'm through with them.
name: Raega

powers.name: Cremate
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play with X energy. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

effects.name: Shining Light
effects.text: Powers on your Hyren cost one less energy to use, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Gift
effects.text: If your Magi is Arderial, your Universal Hyren cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"Our kind have long been friends to your people,
wherever they may call home, and it is clear to us now
that we are needed by our friends."
-- The Monarch Hyren
name: Rainbow Hyren

effects.name: Wild Blooming
effects.text: All of your Paradwyn Creatures in play can use each of their Powers one additional time each turn. At the end of your opponent's next turn, discard from play all of your Creatures that used any of their Powers an additional time during your turn.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Rala, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"The fun never stops!"
-- Kioko, Tracker
name: Rala

effects.name: Wild Blooming
effects.text: All of your Paradwyn Creatures in play can use each of their Powers one additional time each turn. At the end of your opponent's next turn, discard from play all of your Creatures that used any of their Powers an additional time during your turn.

flavor:
"Remember, it wasn't so lucky for the rala."
-- Liriel, Bagala Trainer
name: Rala Tail

effects.name: Chill
effects.text: When Rask attacks, it removes two additional energy.

flavor: Light creatures can walk across the snow. Big creatures have to walk through it.
name: Rask

powers.name: Satiate
powers.text: Discard Rask from play. If your Magi is Nar, Creature with more than their starting energy cannot attack until the beginning of your next turn.

flavor:
"It's like nothing I've ever seen before and nothing I
ever want to see again."
-- Thast
name: Rask Deserter

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing Nar Creature. Remove one energy from it and discard a Relic controlled by that Creature's Magi.

text:
Rask Deserter's text cannot be altered.
Core Magi may play Rask Deserter.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Raveled Drush is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move up to one energy between Raveled Drush and any one of your other Core or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: When one of these things unwinds, it'll tie you in knots!
name: Raveled Drush

powers.name: Ravel
powers.text: Add one energy to Raveled Drush.

powers.name: Unravel
powers.text: Discard all energy from Raveled Drush to discard an equal amount of energy from each opposing Magi.

text: Weave Magi can play Raveled Drush.

flavor:
"Raxis' nest"
-- Cald expression meaning 'one big mess'
name: Raxis

powers.name: Shatterfire
powers.text: Choose any one Relic in play. The Relic's controller may discard four energy from his or her Magi. If he or she doesn't, discard the chosen Relic from play.

effects.name: Study
effects.text: Whenever Rayalon defeats a non-Arderial Creature in an attack, you may place any one Arderial or Core Spell from your discard pile into your hand.

flavor:
"Not again..."
-- Lanyx, Crucible
name: Rayalon
text: Arderial Shadow Magi may play Rayalon.

flavor:
"Rayje? Rayje? No, he's just a legend."
-- Gia, Seer
name: Rayje
text: You can play with more than one copy of Rayje in yur deck. When you reveal Rayje, he gains all Powers and Effects on all of your defeated Rayjes and any one other of the following Powers or Effects until the end of the game: "Power -- Aid: Move one energy from one Creature to another", "Effect -- Lore: During your draw step, draw an additional card", "Effect -- Defense: Whenever one of your Creatures is attacked, add one energy to it before energy is removed", "Effect -- Wily: Once per turn, instead of drawing a card, place any one Spell from your discard pile into your hand", "Effect -- Charge: Whenever one of your Creatures attacks, add one energy to it before energy is removed".

effects.name: Thought Filter
effects.text: Non-Universal Magi may not play non-Universal Spells that are not of their region.

flavor:
"With this on your hand, you can punch your rival without moving a
finger."
-- 'Rayje's Journal'
name: Rayje's Band

flavor:
"Great! You fixed it. I was afraid it was broken for good."
-- Rayje, to Emec
name: Rayje's Belt

powers.name: Lockdown
powers.text: Choose any one Power or Effect on a card in play. Until the end of your next turn, the chosen Power or Effect cannot be used while Rayje's Belt is in play.

flavor:
"And when all else fails, you can take off the belt and whip' em with it."
-- 'Rayje's Journal'
name: Rayje's Belt

powers.name: Lockdown
powers.text: Name any one Power or Effect. Until the end of your next turn, no player may use the named Power or Effect.

effects.name: Dream Filter
effects.text: Non-Universal Magi may not play non-Universal Creatures that are not of their region.

flavor:
"They simply make the creatures think, 'What am I doing taking orders from
this guy?'"
-- 'Rayje's Journal'
name: Rayje's Boots

effects.text: Opposing cards neither prevent your Creatures from attacking nor prevent opposing cards from defending. Opposing cards do not prevent your cards from using their Powers and Effects.

flavor: Many a Magi has spent their last energy running from the wearer.
name: Rayje's Cloak

effects.name: Ancestral Favor
effects.text: All of your Spells cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Invigorate
effects.text: Your Magi's energize rate is increased by one.

effects.name: Tinker
effects.text: Whenever you play a Relic, add one energy to any one Creature in play.

flavor:
"It comes in three different sizes, large, extra large and O MY GOSH, IT'S
COMING THIS WAY!"
-- Pruitt, starting to run
name: Rayje's Construct

powers.name: Auraflection
powers.text: Copy any one Power on your Magi, paying all costs.

powers.name: Channeling
powers.text: Discard two cards from your hand to add two energy to your Magi.

powers.name: Lore
powers.text: Draw one card.

powers.name: Pound Pound Pound
powers.text: Discard any one Relic from play.

effects.name: Leadership
effects.text: Each time you draw a card, choose one of your Creatures in play. Add one energy to the chosen Creature. You cannot choose a Creature more than once per turn with Leadership.

flavor:
To serve and protect.
-- inscription
name: Rayje's Shield

effects.name: Piercing
effects.text: Spells, Powers, and Effects do not reduce energy loss.

flavor: Rayje's legendary sword has been nicknamed "Conscience", because there's no escaping it.
name: Rayje's Sword

effects.text: Players cannot use Powers, Spells or Effects to search their decks or discard piles for cards. Players may not draw more than four cards each turn.
When an opposing Spell, Power, or Effect chooses your Magi, you may discard Reality Anchor from play. If you do, the opposing card does not affect your Magi.

flavor: Reality is the stuff of dreams.
name: Reality Anchor

flavor:
"Not beebs agaaaain..."
-- Qwade
name: Redream
text: Search your discard pile, then your deck for one copy of each of your Magi's starting cards. Add those cards to your hand. You can only play Redream once per turn. If your Magi is not d'Resh, discard a card from your hand for each card you added to your hand with redream.

effects.name: Rebuke
effects.text: Whenever an opponent plays a Creature, you may discard one energy from your Magi. If you do, discard two energy from the Creature played.

flavor: Cast blindly in shallow waters and you will hook yourself a reef.
name: Reef Hyren

flavor:
"Like a poor marksman, you keep missing the target!"
-- Bronn
name: Refract
text: Attach this card to your Magi. When an opponent chooses exactly one of your Nar Creatures for a Spell or Power, you may discard Refract from play If you do, the Spell or Power affects one of your Nar Creatures of your choice instead.

effects.name: Counterweave
effects.text: Whenever one of your Weave Creatures is attacked, move one energy from the attacking Creature to the defending Creature before energy is removed.

flavor: "'Buncha pacifists,' they said. 'Can't fight a real war', they said. I'll say this: Cald! BRING IT!"
name: Rehlya

flavor:
"As good as new, but no better."
- Gar
name: Rejuvenate
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Add five energy to the chosen Creature. This cannot raise a Creature above its starting energy.

effects.name: Trick Image
effects.text: If your opponent discards one of your Relics from play, you may have Relic Mirror discarded from play in its place.

flavor:
"Only fools attack a reflection. But fools are everywhere."
-- Blue, Vault Guardian
name: Relic Mirror

flavor: Pitter-patter-pitter-patter WHAM WHAM WHAM!
name: Relic Stalker

powers.name: Pound Pound Pound
powers.text: Choose any one Relic in play. Discard Relic Stalker from player. Discard the chosen Relic from play.

flavor:
"I remember when things were simpler. The Dark Twins
hadn't trashed Vash Naroom, Yaki smiled all the time
and Evu told us stories. Now look at things..."
-- Pruitt, Ringsmith
name: Remember Ring

powers.name: Good Ol' Days
powers.text: Discard Remember Ring from play. Put a Naroom Creature from your discard pile into play with one energy. That Creature may not attack this turn.

flavor: Not every dream creature is happy to serve its master.
name: Renegade Epik

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing Arderial Creature. Remove one energy from it and draw two cards.

text:
Renegade Epik's text cannot be altered.
Core Magi can play Renegade Epik.

flavor: For hitting anything.
name: Resonate
text: Choose any or all of the following: Choose any one Relic in play. Discard the chosen Relic from play. OR Choose any one Creature in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature. OR Choose any one Magi in play. Discard two energy from the chosen Magi. For each action chosen, Resonate's cost is increased by one.

effects.name: Tinker
effects.text: Whenever you play a Relic, choose any one Creature in play. Add one enery to the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Me mates and I guard the Vault of Science, and
the Vault returns the favor."
-- Blu, Vault Guardian
name: Ring of Secrets

flavor:
Togoth laughed. "You old fool! You may have defeated
my drush but you've made my dryte stronger!"
"Don't worry, I've got plans for your dryte." Mobis said.
name: Ripcurl
text: Choose two opposing Creatures. Move up to four energy from the first Creature to the second Creature.

flavor:
"One single ripple in the ocean can cause a devastating storm in the Kybar
highlands."
-- Mobis, Elder
name: Ripple
text: All Creatures with less energy than their starting energy gain one energy. All Creatures with more energy than their starting energy lose one energy.

flavor: The sea barls swam away, laughing to themselves, as the Magi sought the wisdom they one held...
name: Riptide
text: All players discard all but four cards from their lands. Until the end of your next turn, all other Spells, Powers, or Effects that cause opponents to discard cards from their hand may not be played or used. Opposing cards may not discard Riptide from your hand. Orothe Shadow Magi may play Riptide.

effects.name: Glorious Prophecy
effects.text: During your Energize step, if you have seven different Oracles in play, defeat an opposing Magi.

flavor: "The oracles are keyed to the vast knowledge we have of the Eliwan. If only one could contain all the knowledge, that Magi would be invincible."
name: Risha

powers.name: Insight
powers.text: Reveal an Oracle in your hand. Add one energy to Risha.

flavor:
"This is my fight, and I intend to finish it."
-- Kyg'n
name: Ritual Spear

powers.name: Change of Heart
powers.text: Discard Ritual Spear from play. Choose any one of your defeated Kybar's Teeth or Weave Magi. Defeat your current Magi. The chosen Magi is returned to play with your Magi's current energy and does not get any starting cards. You can keep your current Spells, Relics and Creatures in play. You can only recover any Magi once.

flavor:
"This is my fight, and I intend to finish it."
-- Kyg'n
name: Ritual Spear

powers.name: Change of Heart
powers.text: Discard Ritual Spear from play. Choose any one of your defeated Kybar's Teeth or Weave Magi. Defeat your current Magi. The chosen Magi is returned to play with your Magi's current energy and does not get any starting cards. You can keep your current Spells, Relics and Creatures in play. You can only recover any Magi once.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play River Abaquist, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Never underestimate the power or small creatures in large groups."
-- O'Qua, Summoner
name: River Abaquist

powers.name: Possess
powers.text: Discard River Abaquist from play. If your Magi is Orothe or Paradwyn, choose any one opposing Creature in play with less energy than the number of your Creatures or Relics in play. Gain control of the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play River Abaquist, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Never underestimate the power or small creatures in large groups."
-- O'Qua, Summoner
name: River Abaquist

powers.name: Possess
powers.text: Discard River Abaquist from play. If your Magi is Orothe or Paradwyn, choose any one opposing Creature in play with less energy than the number of your Creatures or Relics in play. Gain control of the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Well, at least we know it's coming."
-- Korg
name: Roar
text: Choose one of your Creatures in play. The next time the chosen Creature attacks, remove twice as much energy from the defending Creature.

effects.name: Ease
effects.text: All of your Creatures with the Effect "Dreamwarp" cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"Ooh! Ooh! I want it! Can you get me one?"
-- Pruitt, to Bria
name: Robe of Petals

effects.name: Ancestral Favor
effects.text: Your Spells cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"Ye can hear the voices of all the wizards who've worn
it before. Ye get to draw on their leftover power, but I tell
ye, matey, it gets creepy."
-- Blu, Vault Guardian
name: Robe of the Ages

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Whenever you play a Naroom Creature, add one additional energy to it.

flavor:
"It's more than a fashion statement, of course, but don't I look good in
vines?"
-- Tryn, to Tony
name: Robe of Vines

flavor:
T'lok came over the block
And there he saw a rock.
But it wasn't a rock...
It was a rock arboll!
name: Rock Arboll

powers.name: Infuse
powers.text: Discard Rock Arboll from play. Add energy to your Magi equal to the energy on the smallest opposing Creature.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Rock Hyren loses two less energy in attacks and from opposing Spells, Powers, and Effects. Your Spells, Powers, and other Effects may not prevent Rock Hyren from losing energy.

flavor:
"Wood, coral, fire... pfft! Whatever. Gimme a big ol' rock any day."
-- Koll
name: Rock Hyren

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Rock Hyren loses two less energy in attacks and opposing Spells, Powers and Effects that discard energy. Your Spells, Powers, and other Effects may not prevent Rock Hyren from losing energy.

flavor: I've heard rock is strong. Nothin' beats rock.
name: Rock Hyren

effects.name: Hide
effects.text: If an opposing Spell or Power discards Rock Silth from play, move energy up to Rock Silth's starting energy from it to your Magi and draw a card.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Rock Silth loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"Fire? I didn't twist any fire in there?! Who..."
"Looking for me, old friend?"
-- Whall and ...?
name: Rock Silth

effects.name: Hide
effects.text: If an opposing Spell or Power discards Rock Silth from play, move energy up to Rock Silth's starting energy from it to your Magi and draw a card.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Rock Silth loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"You! What are you doing here?"
" Time to settle an old score... Or have you forgotten?"
-- Whall and ...?
name: Rock Silth

flavor:
"Woah. Usually I run over the hills, not vice versa."
-- Wence, Naroom Adventurer
name: Rock Slide
text: Discard the Creature with the most energy from play. In the case of a tie, you choose which Creature to discard.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Rock Yajo loses one less energy in attacks.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Rock Yajo is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move up to one energy between Rock Yajo and any one of your other Kybar's Teeth or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Talk about a tough crowd!"
-- Kesia, Musician
name: Rock Yajo

powers.name: Dream Cross
powers.text: Discard Rock Yajo from play. Choose one of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures in play and one of your Weave Creatures in play. Until the end of your next turn, each chosen Creature gains all Powers and Effects printed on the other chosen Creature.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Rock Yajo loses one less energy in attacks.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Rock Yajo is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move up to one energy between Rock Yajo and any one of your other Kybar's Teeth or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Talk about a tough crowd!"
-- Kesia, Musician
name: Rock Yajo

powers.name: Dream Cross
powers.text: Discard Rock Yajo from play. Choose one of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures in play and one of your Weave Creatures in play. Until the end of your next turn, each chosen Creature gains all Powers and Effects printed on the other chosen Creature.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Rockslide Hyren loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"Don't make any loud noises."
-- Kazm, scout
name: Rockslide Hyren

powers.name: Crush
powers.text: Discard Rockslide Hyren from play. Choose three opposing Creatures in play. An opponent of your choice discards two energy from one of the chosen Creatures, four energy from the second chosen Creature and eight energy from the third chosen Creature. Opposing cards do not affect Crush when it is used and cannot alter the amount of energy discarded by Crush.

flavor:
"Feeble fires burn out on their own, including the fire of life."
-- Magam, Cald Ringsmith
name: Rod of Coals

powers.name: Snuff Out
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play with only one energy.Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor: Half-Hyren, half dream, the rokarum is everyone's best friend.
name: Rokarum

powers.name: White Wind
powers.text: Add two energy to each of your other Kybar's Teeth Creatures with less than their starting energy.

effects.name: Collision
effects.text: After Rolling Baldar defeats a Creature while attacking, remove three energy from the smallest opposing Creature. If there is a tie, an opponent of your choice chooses the Creature to be affected.

flavor: A rolling Baldar gathers no Moss Trulbs.
name: Rolling Baldar

effects.name: Blight
effects.text: After an opponent plays a Creature with more energy than Rot Arboll, move one energy from that Creature to Rot Arboll.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: This Creature loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor:
"These aren't the healing kind. They prefer the misery
of those stronger than themselves."
-- Queen Olabra
name: Rot Arboll

effects.name: Myth
effects.text: Rous cannot be attacked. If all of your Creatures in play are Rous, discard Rous from play.

flavor:
"What about the rous?"
-- Zannah, to Wence
name: Rous

powers.name: Hit
powers.text: Choose one opposing Creature. Move one energy from the chosen Creature to Rous.

text: Only Bograth Magi or Core Magi can play Rous.

effects.name: Myth
effects.text: Rous cannot be attacked. If all of your Creatures in play are Rous, discard Rous from play.

flavor:
"I don't believe they exist."
-- Wence, to Zannah
name: Rous

powers.name: Hit
powers.text: Choose one opposing Creature. Move one energy from the chosen Creature to Rous.

text: Only Bograth Magi or Core Magi can play Rous.

effects.name: Trample
effects.text: If Rudwot attacks a Creature that starts the attack with less than three energy, add two energy to Rudwot before energy is removed.

flavor: Good for clearing the weak off the battlefield.
name: Rudwot

effects.name: Mutate
effects.text: Whenever you play a Bograth Creature, you may choose to have it be a Core Creature instead.

effects.name: Invigorate
effects.text: Your Magi's energize rate is increased by one.

flavor:
"I will RUID you!"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Core-rupted Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Ruid

flavor:
"At first, we thought it was a thunderquake. When we
looked around, all we saw was an Underling holding a
small stone in her hand."
-- Valkan
name: Rumble Stones

powers.name: Mini-Quake
powers.text: Remove one energy from each non-Underneath Creature and Magi.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Sabertooth Jumbor attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move up to one energy between Sabertooth Jumbor and any one of your other Naroom or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: Tease it about its lisp, and it'll tease you about that big bruise.
name: Sabertooth Jumbor

powers.name: Taunt
powers.text: Use this Power only before your Attack step. Until the beginning of your next turn, all Creatures must attack, if able, and all of your Creatures in play gain one energy in attacks after energy is removed.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Sabertooth Jumbor attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move up to one energy between Sabertooth Jumbor and any one of your other Naroom or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: Tease it about its lisp, and it'll tease you about that big bruise.
name: Sabertooth Jumbor

powers.name: Taunt
powers.text: Use this Power only before your Attack step. Until the beginning of your next turn, all Creatures must attack, if able, and all of your Creatures in play gain one energy in attacks after energy is removed.

effects.name: Watchful
effects.text: When an opposing Spell is discarding only one of your other Kybar's Teeth Creatures from play, you may discard Sagawal from play instead.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Sagawal loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"I hear a sagawal and an orpus got into a staring
contest. It still hasn't ended."
-- Targ'n, Kybar's Teeth Elder
name: Sagawal

effects.name: Reweave
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, you may move one energy from one of your Weave or Core Creatures to another.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Sagaweave is in an attack, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Sagaweave and one of your other Core or Weave Creatures.

flavor: They are the eyes and ears of the ancient seer.
name: Sagaweave
text: Weave Shadow Magi can play Sagaweave.

effects.name: Snuggles
effects.text: As the beginning of your turn, if your Magi is Nar, you may discard Saitorr from play. If you do, draw a card for each energy on your Magi above his or her starting energy, to a maximum of five.

flavor: "They're bouncy flouncy trouncy pouncy fun fun fun fun fun!"
name: Saitorr

flavor:
"They want fire, huh? I'll give them fire!"
-- Ashgar, Flamekeeper
name: Saladarit

powers.name: Guard
powers.text: Choose any one Cald or Orothe Creature in play. Until the beginning of your next turn, the first time the chosen Creature is attacked, discard the attacking Creature from play before energy is removed.

flavor:
"They want fire, huh? I'll give them fire!"
-- Ashgar, Flamekeeper
name: Saladarit

powers.name: Guard
powers.text: Choose any one Cald or Orothe Creature in play. Until the beginning of your next turn, the first time the chosen Creature is attacked, discard the attacking Creature from play before energy is removed.

effects.name: Protege
effects.text: Once per turn, when you play a Naroom Creature, you may search your discard pile for a copy of that Creature and place it in your hand.

flavor: "What? Why would I want to be Keeper?!?"
name: Salafy

effects.name: Spellcraft
effects.text: Once per turn, as an opponent plays a Spell, choose an Illusion and add four energy to it.

flavor: With a swish of her wrist, Salara's orshaa grew in size. Warrada's ball of purple energy bounced harmlessly off it.
name: Salara

effects.name: Memory
effects.text: During your Play Creatures step, if you have fewer cards in your hand than any opponent, you may play one d'Resh Creature from your discard pile as if it were in your hand.

effects.name: Slips Through Your Fingers
effects.text: If Sand Cape is discarded from your hand by an opposing card, play it instead, ignoring all costs.

flavor: Overlooked like a mistake, forgettable as an old memory.
name: Sand Cape

effects.name: Light Side
effects.text: Each of your starting cards costs two less energy to play.

effects.name: Dark Side
effects.text: You can play Core cards as though they were d'Resh cards.

flavor:
"There are layers and layers to the sands."
-- Korremar
name: Sand Hyren
text: d'Resh Shadow Magi can play Sand Hyren.

effects.name: Light Side
effects.text: Each of your named starting cards cost two less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Dark Side
effects.text: You can play Core cards as through they were d'Resh cards.

flavor:
"It gets awfully dark under the sands..."
-- Korremar, Drifter
name: Sand Hyren
text: d'Resh Shadow Magi can play Sand Hyren.

effects.name: Hunt
effects.text: As Sand Sark attacks a Creature with five or more energy, remove two energy from that Creature.

flavor:
"Knock, knock."
"Who is it?"
"Sandygram!"
-- Old d'Reshi Joke
name: Sand Sark

flavor:
"Believing is seeing."
-- d'Jarvish
name: Sand Strands

powers.name: Mirage
powers.text: Discard Sand Strands from play. Choose any one of your non-illusionary Creatures from play. Add energy to your Magi equal to half of the chosen Creature's energy (rounded up). As long as that Crature remains in play, it is illusionary; illusionary Creatures do not count as being in play when checking to see if your Magi is defeated. Illusionary Creatures cannot attack Magi directly.

flavor:
"Believing is seeing."
-- d'Jarvish
name: Sand Strands

powers.name: Mirage
powers.text: Discard Sand Strands from play. Choose any one of your non-illusionary Creatures from play. Add energy to your Magi equal to half of the chosen Creature's energy (rounded up). As long as that Crature remains in play, it is illusionary; illusionary Creatures do not count as being in play when checking to see if your Magi is defeated. Illusionary Creatures cannot attack Magi directly.

flavor:
"I spend almost as much time in the sand as I do in the woods."
-- Wence the Wanderer
name: Sand Trap
text: Choose a Creature without any Spells attached and attach Sandtrap to it. While Sandtrap is attached, that Creature loses one energy at the beginning of each player's turn.

flavor:
"Dust to Relic to Dust to Creature to Dust."
-- d'Reshi maxim
name: Sandshape
text: Discard a d'Resh Relic from play to play a d'Resh card in your hand, reducing the cost of the card by half (rounded down). Creatures played this way cannot attack this turn.

effects.text: As Sandsifter is being discarded from play by an opposing card, you may discard an Oracle from play. Sandsifter is not affected by the opposing card.

flavor: d'Reshi-vu: the feeling that you've experienced inevitability before.
name: Sandsifter

powers.name: Inevitable Truth
powers.text: Choose an opposing Magi. Discard one energy from the chosen Magi for each Oracle you have in play.

powers.name: Unearth
powers.text: Choose an Oracle in your discard pile. Put the chosen card into your hand.

flavor: The simple truth: d'Reshi have 47 different words for sand, without which their conversations would be very dull.
name: Sandsinger

powers.name: Ballad of the Truth
powers.text: Discard Sandsinger and one of your other cards from play to search your deck for any one d'Resh card and place that card into your hand.

effects.name: Monolith
effects.text: If Sandstone Hyren is the largest Creature in play, opposing players must pay three energy from their Magi to choose it for Spells and Powers.

effects.name: Super Invulnerability
effects.text: Sandstone Hyren loses two less energy in attacks, and loses no energy from Effects during any player's Attack step.

flavor:
"Can't we just go around?"
"Ask it and find out."
-- Harror and Korremar
name: Sandstone Hyren

effects.name: Monolith
effects.text: If Sandstone Hyren is the largest Creature in play, opposing players must pay three energy from their Magi to choose it for Spells and Powers.

effects.name: Super Invulnerability
effects.text: Sandstone Hyren loses two less energy in attacks, and loses no energy from Effects during any player's Attack step.

flavor:
"Daa, Daaa, DAAA - DaDAAAA! BOM-bom BOM-bom BOM-bom BOM-bom BOM!"
-- Jagt, Prankster
name: Sandstone Hyren

effects.text: As you play Sandstorm Orshaa, reduce its cost by four. Sandstorm Orshaa is not considered to be in play when checking to see if your Magi is defeated, and it cannot attack Magi directly.

flavor:
"What I really hate is that crunchy feeling they leave in your teeth."
-- Ythra
name: Sandstorm Orshaa

powers.name: Stinging Sands
powers.text: Choose a Spell in play. Discard the chosen Spell and three energy from that Spell's Magi.

effects.text: As you play Sandstorm Orshaa, reduce its cost by four. Sandstorm Orshaa is not considered to be in play when checking to see if your Magi is defeated, and it cannot attack Magi directly.

flavor:
"Strange things are afoot in the d'Resh desert."
-- Borse
name: Sandstorm Orshaa

powers.name: Stinging Sands
powers.text: Choose a Spell in play. Discard the chosen Spell and three energy from that Spell's Magi.

effects.name: Vortex
effects.text: Once per turn, when an opponent uses a Power, add two energy to Sandstorm Xyx.

flavor:
"All right; you want to play that way? Now it's personal!"
-- Ora, Shieldmaiden
name: Sandstorm Xyx

powers.name: Dissipate
powers.text: Discard Sandstorm Xyx from play. Choose two Creatures in play. Reduce the chosen Creatures' energy to one.

flavor: The Curse of d'Resh: You will never leave the desert... without sand in your shoes!
name: Sandswirl
text: Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. For the next X turns, the chosen Creature or Magi cannot use any Power or Effects and loses one additional energy in attacks.

flavor: The Curse of d'Resh: You will never leave the desert... without sand in your shoes!
name: Sandswirl
text: Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. For the next X turns, the chosen Creature or Magi cannot use any Power or Effects and loses one additional energy in attacks.

flavor:
"You got any Weebos?"
"NO! WE'RE ALL OUT OF WEEBOS!"
"Well, in that case, what do you have?"
name: Sap of Life
text: Choose any one Creature in play with less than its starting energy. Restore the chosen Creature to its starting energy.

effects.name: Protect
effects.text: Whenever one of your other Creatures is attacked, you may choose to have the attacking Creature attack the Sarazen Guard instead. If you do, the attacking player chooses and discards one card from his or her hand after energy is removed.

flavor: It's hard to be more watchful than a guard with five heads.
name: Sarazen Guard

flavor:
"I am not my hyren's keeper... he is!"
-- Voda
name: Sarazen Keeper

powers.name: Forged Alliance
powers.text: If you have a Hyren in play, add one energy to each of your Sarazen in play.

powers.name: Strength
powers.text: If you have at least two Sarazens in play, draw a card.

flavor:
"Everybody relax, I'm here. Where exactly is here, again?"
-- Gogor, Celebrated Hero
name: Sarazen Keeper

powers.name: Forged Alliance
powers.text: If you have a Hyren in play, add one energy to each of your Sarazen in play.

powers.name: Strength
powers.text: If you have at least two Sarazens in play, draw a card.

effects.name: Favored Enemy
effects.text: When you play Sarazen Outcast, choose any one Creature type.

effects.name: Bane
effects.text: Whenever Sarazen Outcast attacks or is attacked by a Creature of the chosen type, add four energy to Sarazen Outcast before energy is removed.

flavor:
"It has a whole team of issues."
-- Olabra, The Really Greatest Elder Ever
name: Sarazen Outcast

effects.name: Incompetent
effects.text: Your Creatures lose one additional energy in attacks.

effects.name: Ally
effects.text: When you play Sareb, you may give control of it to another player.

flavor:
"An incompetent ally is far worse than a dangerous foe."
-- d'Reshi maxim
name: Sareb

flavor: Gimmie!
name: Sarf

powers.name: Snatch
powers.text: Choose an opposing Relic. Discard the chosen Relic. Sarf cannot attack this turn. Use this Power only before your Attack step.

powers.name: Freezerburn
powers.text: If Sarf is frozen, choose a Magi. Discard energy from the chosen Magi equal to that Magi's energize. Discard Sarf.

flavor: Are you ready to find out what you're made of?
name: Sawgrass
text: Choose any one Creature in play that attacked on its controller's last turn. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Sawgrass costs two less energy if the chosen Creature is Core.

effects.name: Morale Boost
effects.text: Increase your energize by one. Draw an extra card during your Draw Step.

flavor:
The Scarletsong Banner brings joy for the taking.
-- Ancient Inscription
name: Scarletsong Banner
text: After an opposing card removes energy from your Magi, discard Scarletsong Banner from play.

effects.name: Call of the Riled
effects.text: All of your Paradwyn Creatures lose one less energy whenever they are attacked, and remove one additional energy whenever they attack.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Scarletsong Hwit, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"When it sings, you hear gold, but you see red."
-- Bazha, Lifekeeper
name: Scarletsong Hwit

flavor: A simple "chirp" from the scarletsong lahalou can alert large areas of the jungle to incoming foes.
name: Scarletsong Lahalou

powers.name: Screech
powers.text: Discard Scarletsong Lahalou from play. Add one energy to your Magi for each Scarletsong card you control.

flavor: What is a lovely sound to native ears, can prove to be a dangerous distraction to foreigners.
name: Scarletsong Lilt
text: Choose an opposing Creature and add Scarletsong Lilt to it. As the chosen Creature loses energy in an attack, remove two energy from the Creature's Magi. Discard Scarletsong Lilt from play at the beginning of your turn.

flavor: Most birds get quiet when there's danger nearby. The scarletsong hwit gets louder.
name: Scarletsong's Trill
text: Until the end of the turn, whenever one of your Creatures in play attacks a stalked Creature, add two energy to the attacking Creature before energy is removed.

effects.name: Flee
effects.text: Whenever Scout Bungaloo is attacked, before energy is removed, you may choose any one other Creature in play. Move all of Scout Bungaloo's energy to the chosen Creature. Add two additional energy to that Creature.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Scout Bungaloo attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Scout Bungaloo and any one of your other Naroom or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: Insatiably curious, they're usually the first to look, first to find, and first to run away.
name: Scout Bungaloo

effects.name: Flee
effects.text: Whenever Scout Bungaloo is attacked, before energy is removed, you may choose any one other Creature in play. Move all of Scout Bungaloo's energy to the chosen Creature. Add two additional energy to that Creature.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Scout Bungaloo attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Scout Bungaloo and any one of your other Naroom or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: Insatiably curious, they're usually the first to look, first to find, and first to run away.
name: Scout Bungaloo

effects.name: Pyromancy
effects.text: Whenever a Spell you play or a Power on a Creature you control discards energy from an opposing Creature, discard one additional energy from that Creature.

flavor:
"I consume."
-- Scroll footnote
name: Scroll of Fire

flavor: The scurrying weggit is unparalleled in irritating other Dream Creatures; especially those of its own kind!
name: Scurrying Weggit

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing Weave Creature and remove one energy from it. That Creature must attack one of your Creatures immediately, regardless of Spells, Powers or Effects. You choose which Creature is attacked.

text:
Scurrying Weggit's text cannot be altered.
Core Magi may play Scurrying Weggit.

flavor: "Gia's taken a real interest in teaching me how to make creatures part of the Weave."
name: Scyalla

powers.name: Pet Project
powers.text: Once per game, choose any one non-Hyren Creature type. Until the end of the game, all Creatures of the chosen type that you play are Weave Creatures instead of their original region.

starting: [Two different non-Hyren Creatures of the same type, i.e., two different Xyxes]

flavor:
"Poor thing. I'd hate to carry so much knowledge around without being able
to access it."
-- Orthea
name: Sea Barl

powers.name: Lore
powers.text: Draw two cards.

flavor:
"Never take a gift directly from a Calder's hands."
-- Moonlands maxim
name: Searing Touch
text: Until the end of the turn, all of your Cald Creatures in play gain: "Effect - Furnace: Whenever you play a Cald Relic, choose any one Creature in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature."

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Seaweed Lascinth attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Seaweed Lascinth and any one of your other Orothe or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
