"Look out! Surf's up!"
-- Valkan, Pyromancer and former bridge-builder
name: Seaweed Lascinth

powers.name: Reflexes
powers.text: Whenever Seaweed Lascinth attacks this turn, it removes energy immediately, before Creatures normally remove energy.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Seaweed Lascinth attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Seaweed Lascinth and any one of your other Orothe or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Look out! Surf's up!"
-- Valkan, Pyromancer and former bridge-builder
name: Seaweed Lascinth

powers.name: Reflexes
powers.text: Whenever Seaweed Lascinth attacks this turn, it removes energy immediately, before Creatures normally remove energy.

flavor: Within the book, Evu keeps the secrets to the heart and soul of Naroom. Now the very forest may wither and die.
name: Secrets of the Book

powers.name: Secrets
powers.text: Choose any one opposing player. The chosen player reveals his or her hand to all players. Draw one card for each Creature revealed, and one card for each non-Creature Naroom card revealed.

flavor: You're entering the whirl of hurt.
name: Sellia

powers.name: Whirlpool
powers.text: Choose a non-Magi card of more than one Region. Discard it from play.

flavor:
"Welcome to the pah-ty!"
-- Qwade
name: Severos

powers.name: Mind Dredge
powers.text: Choose a Creature in an opponent's discard pile. Play the chosen Creature, ignoring regional restrictions and penalties. Pay all costs from Severos instead of your Magi. Use this Power only after the Attack step. When that Creature leaves play, discard Severos from play.

text: Orothe Magi can play Severos

flavor:
"Works better than dream balm on them nightmares.
But ye probably couldn't stand the taste of it."
-- Blu, Vault Guardian
name: Shadow Bones

powers.name: Vitalize
powers.text: Choose any one Core Creature in play. Discard Shadow Bones from play. Add energy to the chosen Creature equal to that Creature's starting energy.

flavor: A night's gown.
name: Shadow Cloak

powers.name: Protection
powers.text: Each of your Core Creatures in play is not affected by non-Core Spells and Powers until the end of your next turn. You may not use Shadow Cloak on your next turn.

effects.name: Descendance
effects.text: After Shadow Dryte defeats a Creature while attacking, add four energy to Shadow Dryte.

flavor: It feeds on the pain of others. This makes it the perfect weapon for Agram's minions.
name: Shadow Dryte

effects.name: Feed
effects.text: After a Furok is discarded from play, you may play one copy of Shadow Fird from your discard pile, ignoring all costs.

flavor: Flocks of these foul beasts now follow Sperri wherever she roams.
name: Shadow Fird

effects.name: Taste
effects.text: When you play Shadow Hyren, choose a Creature. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature. Whenever Shadow Hyren attacks a Creature of the same region as the chosen Creature, add two energy to Shadow Hyren before energy is removed.

effects.name: Feed
effects.text: If your Magi is a Shadow Magi, when Shadow Hyren defeats an opposing Creature in an attack, add two energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"Everyone has a shadow. Does yours like you?"
-- Harror, Nightstalker
name: Shadow Hyren

flavor:
"This spell looks interesting..."
-- Evu, Naroom Loremaster
name: Shadow Rain
text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Transfer all of the energy on your Magi to the chosen Creature. At the end of your Attack Step, transfer all energy from the chosen Creature your Magi, and draw one card. Naroom Magi may play Shadow Rain.

flavor:
"You put your whole soul in, pull your whole soul out, you put your whole
soul in, and then you shake it all about..."
-- Korremar
name: Shadow Ritual
text: Until the end of the turn, all Powers on your Core cards cost two less energy to use, to a minimum of zero. Only Shadow Magi can play Shadow Ritual.

effects.name: Dark Strength
effects.text: When you play Shadow Vinoc, add one energy to it for each Relic in play.

flavor:
"It's an improvement over its forest cousin. Soil is such an unreliable
thing to draw strength from."
-- Togoth
name: Shadow Vinoc

flavor:
"Once Koll and Whall got into a dream-twisting contest. You don't want to
know what they ended up with."
-- Jagt
name: Shaper's Apprentice

powers.name: Dream Twist
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature to play any Kybar's Teeth or Orothe Creature from your discard pile ignoring all costs. Discard this Creature from play at the end of your next Energize Step.

flavor:
"Once Koll and Whall got into a dream-twisting contest. You don't want to
know what they ended up with."
-- Jagt
name: Shaper's Apprentice

powers.name: Dream Twist
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature to play any Kybar's Teeth or Orothe Creature from your discard pile ignoring all costs. Discard this Creature from play at the end of your next Energize Step.

flavor:
"If it doesn't move, it can't be that dangerous..."
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Confident Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Shard of the Great Fossil

powers.name: Shield
powers.text: Choose one of your Creatures with the effect "Invulnerability". The chosen Creature loses no energy in attacks until the end of the turn.

flavor: In Nar, the wind breaks you.
name: Shattering Wind
text: Until the end of the turn, whenever one of your Creatures attacks, discard one energy from the defending Magi before energy is removed. If the opposing Magi is frozen, discard one additional energy.

flavor: 'Room temperature' is a matter of perspective.
name: Shattershards
text: Choose a Magi in play. Discard one of the Magi's Relics. Remove energy from one of that Magi's Creatures equal to the Relic's cost, plus two.

flavor:
"Thankfully, it's not moving. That'll give us plenty of time to run!"
-- Wence, Naroom Adventurer
name: Sheath
text: Choose any one Weave Creature in play. Add eight enery to the chosen Creature. While that Creature remains in play, it may not attack or use Powers or Effects. When the chosen Creature is discarded from play, discard two cards of your choice from your hand.

flavor: There's safety in numbers... and behind big thick pieces of armor.
name: Shell
text: Until the end of your next turn, your Orothe Creatures in play are not affected by opposing Spells and Powers. If an opponent's Power, Spell, or Effect discards one or more cards from your hand, you may discard Shell from your hand instead. If you do, discard all of that opponent's Relics in play. All ongoing Powers and Effects of those Relics are cancelled.

effects.name: Creature Bond
effects.text: If there is no energy on Shimmer at the end of your turn, discard one energy from each opposing Creature in play.

flavor: They feel my pain.
name: Shimmer

effects.text: As you play Shimmering Orshaa, reduce its cost by four. Shimmering Orshaa is not considered to be in play when checking to see if your Magi is defeated, and it cannot attack Magi directly.

flavor: Koll and Whall would both pay handsomely for this creature's ring.
name: Shimmering Orshaa

powers.name: Illusion Twist
powers.text: Choose one of your other illusions in play. Discard the chosen illusion. Play a d'Resh Creature from your hand, ignoring all costs. The played Creature cannot attack this turn.

effects.name: Loyalty
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures is discarded from play by an opposing Spell, instead return that Creature to its owner's hand.

effects.name: Eternal Service
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures is discarded from play while attacking, add half of that Creature's starting energy, rounded down, to Shivara.

flavor:
"What blows around, comes around."
-- Shivara, Mistress of the Winds
name: Shivara
text: Shivara can only play Arderial and Universal cards.

effects.name: Storm Seeker
effects.text: After one of your Arderial Spells or Powers removes energy from one or more opposing Creatures, choose a Creature you control. Add one energy to it.

flavor:
"Alright, Jalex, it's go time. Show me what you've got."
-- Ora, Defender of the Sky
name: Shock Ring

flavor: When the vashps race, everyone stays away.
name: Shock Vashp

powers.name: Shock
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard an Arderial Creature from your hand to discard two energy from the chosen Creature. If you discard a Vashp, discard an additional energy from the chosen Creature. Opposing cards do not affect Shock when it is used and may not alter the amount of energy discarded by Shock.

flavor:
"Dang! It was right here a second ago..."
-- Hrada
name: Shockwave
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor:
"Wind, in my hands, can crack an Ormagon's carapace or
reduce a Carillion to splinters."
-- Stradus, Arderial Magi
name: Shockwave
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor:
"Falling stars are blessings from the sky."
"Really? I thought they were rocks from outer space, heated
by atmospheric friction."
name: Shooting Star
text: Choose any one Arderial Creature in play. Add two energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"I will call him 'Mini-you'!"
-- Adis
name: Shrink
text: Choose a Creature. Discard half of the chosen Creature's energy, rounded down.

flavor:
"You're not worthy to bear such a noble burden, Hrada.
Take it off at once!"
-- Morag
name: Shroud of the Master

powers.name: Absolute Authority
powers.text: Discard a Core card from your hand. Add one energy to your Magi and one energy to each of your Core Creatures. If your Magi is Agram, add one extra energy to each of your Core Creatures.

effects.name: Mindless Abandon
effects.text: If you have no cards in your hand at the beginning of your Draw Step, add two energy to Shryque.

effects.name: Dream Vengeance
effects.text: If you have no cards in your hand at the beginning of your turn, add five energy to Shryque.

flavor:
"Birds like wide empty spaces.
Dream birds like wide empty minds."
-- Harror
name: Shryque
text: Arderial Magi may play Shryque.

effects.name: Illusion
effects.text: As you play Sikra, reduce its cost by three. Sikra is illusionary; illusionary Creatures do not count as being in play when checking to see if your Magi is defeated. Illusionary Creatures cannot attack Magi directly.

effects.name: Insubstantial
effects.text: Sikra loses no energy from opposing Spells and Powers.

flavor:
"They float on a thunderquake like foam on the sea."
-- d'Jarvish
name: Sikra

effects.name: Illusion
effects.text: As you play Sikra, reduce its cost by three. Sikra is illusionary; illusionary Creatures do not count as being in play when checking to see if your Magi is defeated. Illusionary Creatures cannot attack Magi directly.

effects.name: Insubstantial
effects.text: Sikra loses no energy from opposing Spells and Powers.

flavor:
"They float on a thunderquake like foam on the sea."
-- d'Jarvish
name: Sikra

effects.name: Swallow Whole
effects.text: Once per turn, instead of attacking, whenever one of your other Creatures attacks a Creature with less energy than Silth Giant, you may discard the defending Creature from play before energy is removed. Your attacking Creature is still considered to have attacked this turn.

flavor: It came out of nowhere -- I just hope it went back there.
name: Silth Giant
text: Cald Shadow Magi may play Silth Giant.

flavor: He who controls the flame, controls the universe.
name: Sinder

powers.name: Refresh
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Add two energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Omen of Fire
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures attacks, add two energy to that Creature before energy is removed.

effects.name: Burnout
effects.text: Discard Sinder's Mantle from play if any of your Creatures is discarded from play.

flavor:
Burst like magma from the peak,
Raise the strong and crush the weak.
name: Sinder's Mantle
text: Cald Shadow Magi may play Sinder's Mantle.

effects.name: Backlash
effects.text: Once per turn, when Sinder, Apprentice is attacked, remove energy in the attack as through he were a Creature.

flavor:
"Sinder, go help the others. Warrada is mine."
-- Rayje
name: Sinder, Apprentice
text: Universal Spells cost Sinder, Apprentice one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

flavor: Sometimes the price of knowledge is too high.
name: Singed Pride
text: Choose an opposing Magi and attach Singed Pride to it. After that Magi's owner draws a card outside his or her Draw step, you may discard Singed Pride from play to remove three energy from that Magi. You may not discard more than one Singed Pride per card drawn.

effects.name: Research
effects.text: Relics cost you one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Knowledge
effects.text: As you use a Power on a Naroom Relic, choose a Creature you control and add one energy to it.

flavor: The more I learn, the more I need to know.
name: Sive

effects.name: Inspire
effects.text: Each of your Creatures removes one additional energy in attacks.

effects.name: Persistence
effects.text: When one of your illusions is discarded from play, you may discard one energy from Skullek to place the card in your hand.

flavor:
"He may be small, but look what happened to the last creature to
underestimate him."
-- Drajan
name: Skullek

flavor:
"It bosses a whole mob."
-- Baa, Grand High Summoner
name: Slarnath

powers.name: Demand
powers.text: If you have four or more Bograth Creatures in play, draw a card.

flavor: It changes dreams to delusions, and vice versa.
name: Slime Stone

powers.name: Shriveled Dreams
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Until the beginning of your next turn, the chosen Creature has a starting energy of one instead of its normal starting energy.

powers.name: Grand Nightmares
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Until the beginning of your next turn, the chosen Creature has a starting energy of ten instead of its normal starting energy.

flavor: It changes dreams to delusions, and vice versa.
name: Slime Stone

powers.name: Shriveled Dreams
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Until the beginning of your next turn, the chosen Creature has a starting energy of one instead of its normal starting energy.

powers.name: Grand Nightmares
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Until the beginning of your next turn, the chosen Creature has a starting energy of ten instead of its normal starting energy.

flavor:
"Who cares where these things came from? All that
matters is that they seem to want to help."
-- Yaki, Core Stalker
name: Slinking Greal

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing Core Creature and remove one energy from it. That Creature's controller chooses a Creature he or she controls and removes two energy from it.

text:
Slinking Greal's text cannot be altered.
Non-Core Magi may play Slinking Greal.

effects.name: Creeping Growth
effects.text: After Sludge Hyren attacks, add one energy to it for each Bograth Creature you control.

flavor: "It leaches the strength from its companions to act as their battering ram."
name: Sludge Hyren

flavor:
"You really need to give those things up. They'll ruin your lungs."
-- Ahdar, Scout
name: Smoke Xyx

powers.name: Suffocate
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen Creature removes no energy from attacking Creatures while it is defending.

text: Cald Shadow Magi may play Silth Giant.

flavor: The new tricks that Yaki had learned in his solitude took Hrada by surprise. Dream creatures appeared from the surrounding underbrush, leeching the energy from Hrada's dark furoks.
name: Snag Arboll

powers.name: Trip
powers.text: Choose an opponent. Remove one energy from that opponent's Magi for each Creature he or she controls.

text: Naroom Shadow Magi may play Snag Arboll.

flavor: It seemed to the Shadow Magi as if the clinging barbs of the snag hyren were suddenly everywhere.
name: Snag Hyren

powers.name: Stumble
powers.text: Until the beginning of your next turn, opposing Creatures remove two less energy in attacks.

flavor:
Swoosh! "Hey! What're you doin' hanging up there?!"
-- All High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Deductive Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Snare
text: Play Snare at the beginning of an opponent's Attack step. Choose one of that player's Creatures. The chosen Creature cannot attack this turn. If your Magi is not Paradwyn, discard a card from your hand.

flavor:
"You keep saying 'sneak attack. You mean there's another kind?"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Stealthy Emperor of Great
   and Might Bograth
name: Sneak Attack
text: Until the beginning of your next turn, whenever a Creature attacks or is attacked, you may choose to have either or both Creatures remove energy equal to their starting energy instead of their current energy. Energy removed in attacks cannot be reduced or prevented.

flavor:
"You keep saying 'sneak attack. You mean there's another kind?"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Stealthy Emperor of Great
   and Might Bograth
name: Sneak Attack
text: Until the beginning of your next turn, whenever a Creature attacks or is attacked, you may choose to have either or both Creatures remove energy equal to their starting energy instead of their current energy. Energy removed in attacks cannot be reduced or prevented.

flavor:
"Yes, brother, they do seem to be taking a liking to you."
-- Warrada
name: Sneaky Weebo

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing Naroom Creature. Remove one energy from it and add four energy to another Creature you control.

text:
Sneaky Weebo's text cannot be altered.
Core Magi may play Sneaky Weebo.

effects.name: Dream Draft
effects.text: When an opponent draws a card outside their Draw step, you may play Snow Barl Pup, paying all costs. If your Magi is Nar, ignore all costs when you use this Effect. You can only play one Snow Barl Pup this way per turn.

flavor:
"Alas, poor pup, for I knew him well."
"Oh, quit being so dramatic."
-- Blu and Borse
name: Snow Barl Pup

effects.name: Cold and Colder
effects.text: Whenever a frozen Creature is attacked, add one energy to Snow Hyren before energy is removed.

flavor: Watch where the Hyren go... Don't get eaten by the snow!
name: Snow Hyren

powers.name: Energy Transfer
powers.text: Choose a Creature in play. Add X energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor: A rolling snowball gathers many enemies.
name: Snowball
text: Play when an opposing card discards one of your Relics or Spells from play, or discards one of your Creatures that has energy. Choose an opposing cards of the same type (Creature, Relic, or Spell). Discard the chosen card.

flavor:
"Solar flares are heralds proclaiming our victory!"
"Really? I thought they were stellar plasma prominences, triggered by
fusion reactions."
name: Solar Flare
text: Add four energy to each of your Arderial Creatures that attacked and defeated an opposing Creature this turn.

effects.name: Suppress
effects.text: Effects and Powers on other Magi may not be used.

flavor:
"This is your last chance. Free us or... wait... Hey! NO!"
-- O'Qua, Summoner
name: Sorreah

flavor:
"Sorreah often dreams he's someone else. What's disturbing
is when the other people dream they're Sorreah."
-- Shimmer, Arderial Adept
name: Sorreah's Dream
text: Choose any one Power on a card that does not name the card it is printed on. X is the energy cost of the chosen Power. Sorreah's Dream copies the Power and all of its actions. All cards that affect the chosen Power also affect Sorreah's Dream.

effects.name: Dream Block
effects.text: Players may not use Powers on Creatures.

flavor:
"His time among the Kybarites has given him a greater appreciation of brute
strength."
-- Adis
name: Sorreah, Warrior

effects.name: Vile Memories
effects.text: Sorrowing Ogar can play all Core cards ignoring regional penalties and restrictions. Core cards that Sorrowing Ogar plays are considered Underneath instead of Core.

effects.name: Regret
effects.text: All Core cards cost opposing Magi one additional energy to play. Sorrowing Ogar may not be played in a deck with any Core Magi.

flavor: "I-- I thought it was all a dream! What have I done?"
name: Sorrowing Ogar

flavor:
"Flame isn't the easiest element to control. If you're not
careful, it'll turn on you."
-- Barak, Warlord
name: Spark
text: Choose an opposing Creature and remove three energy from it. That Creature's controller may choose a Creature or Magi controlled by any player and remove one energy from it.

effects.name: Burnout
effects.text: Whenever Spark Chogo attacks, it removes two additional energy from the opposing Creature.

flavor:
"It's better to burn out than to fade away."
-- Valkan, Pyromancer and Former Bridge-Builder
name: Spark Chogo

powers.name: Fade Away
powers.text: Discard Spark Chogo from play. Choose a Creature. Discard three energy from the chosen Creature. Opposing cards do not alter the amount of energy discarded by Fade Away.

effects.name: Work
effects.text: Speag cannot attack.

effects.name: Watch
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures is attacked, add two energy to Speag before energy is removed.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Speag is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move up to one energy between Speag and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"After seeing these, just walking in the Weave gives me the creeps."
-- Wence, Naroom Adventurer
name: Speag

effects.name: Weave Strength
effects.text: After energy is moved to Spreag Sprouts on an opponent's turn, add one energy to Spreag Sprouts.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: As this Creature attacks or is attacked, you may move one energy between it and one of your other Weave Creatures.

flavor: At a gesture from Iyori, the spreag sprouts swarmed as the core hyren dove in for an attack. Weaving energy between themselves, the sprouts began to grow in size.
name: Speag Sprouts

flavor:
"Sure, it'll keep you safe now," said Tryn, "but what about later?"
"If we can't be safe now," replied Wence, "there won't be a 'later.'"
name: Spectral Shield
text: Until the beginning of your next turn, whenever an opponent's card forces you to discard a card from your hand, draw one card afterwards. At the beginning of your next turn, draw one card.

flavor:
"Open your mind too far, and everything falls out."
-- Eidon, Retired Keeper
name: Spell Pulse
text: Choose either Spells or Relics. Discard all cards of the chosen card type from play.

effects.name: Infuse
effects.text: Whenever Sperri plays a Furok, add two additional energy to the Furok.

flavor: Happiness is a furry friend and a flock of blue birds.
name: Sperri

powers.name: Preserve
powers.text: Return any one Furok from your discard pile to your hand.

effects.name: Scavenge
effects.text: Each time a Creature you control is discarded from play, add one energy to Sphor.

flavor: It never goes hungry during a war.
name: Sphor

flavor:
"They're always after my lucky Sphor Charm!"
-- Quilla
name: Sphor Charm

powers.name: Resourceful
powers.text: Choose a Creature and discard an Orothe Relic from your hand. Remove energy from the Creature equal to the cost of the Relic.

flavor: It's not hard to rub it the wrong way.
name: Spined Hyren

powers.name: Mental Assault
powers.text: Choose a player, and one of that player's Creatures. Look at the chosen player's hand. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature for each Spell in that player's hand.

flavor: The more you know, the lower you go.
name: Spirit Drain
text: Choose any one player. Discard energy from the chosen player's Magi equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

flavor: The more you know, the lower you go.
name: Spirit Drain
text: Choose any one player. Discard energy from the chosen player's Magi equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

flavor: "Wind!"
name: Spirit of Arderial
text: You may play this card only when your Arderial Magi is defeated on an opponent's turn. Discard a card from your hand. Each player shuffles their hand into their deck and draws four cards. You can only play one Spirit Spell per Magi defeated.

flavor: Tag-team mud wrasslin'!
name: Spirit of Bograth
text: You may play this card only when your Bograth Magi is defeated on an opponent's turn. Discard a card from your hand. When you reveal your next Magi, add energy to it equal to one opposing Magi's Energize rate. You can only play one Spirit Spell per Magi defeated.

flavor: "Fire!"
name: Spirit of Cald
text: You may play this card only when your Cald Magi is defeated on an opponent's turn. Discard a card from your hand. Until the beginning of your next turn, whenever that opponent plays a Creature, discard one energy from each of that opponent's other Creatures in play. You can only play one Spirit Spell per Magi defeated.

flavor: We're not as cold-hearted as we seem.
name: Spirit of Nar
text: You may play this card only when your Nar Magi is defeated on an opponent's turn. Discard a card from your hand. The current player cannot play any cards from their hand until the end of your next turn. You can only play one Spirit Spell per Magi defeated.

flavor: "Heart!"
name: Spirit of Naroom
text: You may play this card only when your Naroom Magi is defeated on an opponent's turn. Discard a card from your hand. When you reveal your next Magi, it permanently gains "Effect -- Eternal Vigor: Whenever one of your Naroom Creatures is discarded from play by an opposing card, add one energy to your Magi." You can only play one Spirit Spell per Magi defeated.

flavor: "Earth!"
name: Spirit of Ombor
text: You may play this card only when your Underneath Magi is defeated on an opponent's turn. Discard a card from your hand. When you reveal your next Magi, it gains "Effect -- Resilience: At the beginning of your turn, if you have fewer Creatures in play than any opponent, add two enery to your Magi." You can only play one Spirit Spell per Magi defeated.

flavor: "Water!"
name: Spirit of Orothe
text: You may play this card only when your Orothe Magi is defeated on an opponent's turn. Discard a card from your hand. When you reveal your next Magi, replace his or her starting cards line with "STARTING: Orothean Goggles, Hubdra's Cube, One Orothe Creature". You can only play one Spirit Spell per Magi defeated.

flavor:
"My turn to step up and take a swing!"
-- Yricho
name: Spirit of Paradwyn
text: You may play this card only when your Paradwyn Magi is defeated on an opponent's turn. Discard a card from your hand. On your next turn, you may play Paradwyn Creatures during your first Powers/Relics/Spells step. The cost of each Paradwyn Creature you play this way is increased by two and cannot be reduced. You can only play one Spirit Spell per Magi defeated.

flavor:
"I will never leave, but neither will you, Agram, and that is good enough
for me."
-- Une
name: Spirit of Rayje
text: You may play this card as an opposing card discards all of the energy from your Magi. Add three energy to your Magi. This card can prevent your Magi from being defeated. You can only play Spirit of Rayje three times per game.

flavor: "Outta my way, punk!"
name: Spirit of the Core
text: You may play this card only when your Core Magi is defeated on an opponent's turn. Discard a card from your hand. When you reveal your next Magi, choose an opposing Creature. Gain control of the chosen Creature, and restore it to its starting energy. The chosen Creature becomes Core instead of its original region(s), and cannot attack this turn. You can only play one Spirit Spell per Magi defeated.

flavor:
"I had to choose between healing the wounded Quor and dreaming a lesser
Creature to defend it."
-- Gar, Cald Healer
name: Spirit of the Flame
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard X Cald Creatures from your hand. Add X energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor: "By your powers combined..."
name: Spirit of the Teeth
text: You may play this card only when your Kybar's Teeth Magi is defeated on an opponent's turn. Discard a card from your hand. When you reveal your next Magi, it gains "Effect -- Tough Stuff: Whenever this Magi loses energy from an opposing card, it loses two less energy." You can only play one Spirit Spell per Magi defeated.

flavor: "I am Captain Moon!"
name: Spirit of the Weave
text: You may play this card only when your Weave Magi is defeated on an opponent's turn. Discard a card from your hand to prevent the current player's Creatures from attacking that player's next turn. You can only play one Spirit Spell per Magi defeated.

flavor:
"It'sss a dreammm with a sssurprisssse endinggg... like mmminnnne..."
-- Ogar
name: Spore Vashp

powers.name: True Form
powers.text: Discard Spore Vashp from play. Choose any two different Underneath Creatures in your discard pile. Your opponent chooses one of the two chosen Creatures. Play that Creature with half of its starting energy (rounded up) without paying any costs. That Creature may not attack this turn.

effects.name: Congregrate
effects.text: As you play Spray Narth, if you have at least one other Arderial and at least one other Orothe Creature in play, ignore Spray Narth's cost.

flavor: Children of the narthsong, they play in the surf before they return to their home in the sky.
name: Spray Narth

powers.name: Healing Storm
powers.text: Choose any one Creature or Magi and one of your Pharans in play. Move the chosen Pharan's energy to the chosen Creature or Magi. Move Spray Narth's energy to the chosen Creature or Magi. Add three energy to the chosen Creature or Magi.

effects.name: Congregrate
effects.text: As you play Spray Narth, if you have at least one other Arderial and at least one other Orothe Creature in play, ignore Spray Narth's cost.

flavor: Children of the narthsong, they play in the surf before they return to their home in the sky.
name: Spray Narth

powers.name: Healing Storm
powers.text: Choose any one Creature or Magi and one of your Pharans in play. Move the chosen Pharan's energy to the chosen Creature or Magi. Move Spray Narth's energy to the chosen Creature or Magi. Add three energy to the chosen Creature or Magi.

flavor:
"It's always harvest time in the Weave, but they never seem to know just
what they are picking."
-- Wence's Travelog
name: Sprout
text: Choose an opposing Magi. Add one energy to your Magi for each of the chosen Magi's Creatures in play.

effects.name: Sing the Scarletsong
effects.text: Your Paradwyn Creatures remove one extra energy in attacks.

effects.name: Perfect Pitch
effects.text: Your Scarletsong cards cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"It's fun to watch her pounce."
-- Mijji
name: Sqwik

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Whenever you play a Hyren, add one additional energy to it.

flavor:
"The Hyren rule the land. But I rule the Hyren."
-- Staff inscription
name: Staff of Hyren

effects.name: Finder
effects.text: When you play Staff of Keepers, choose any one region other than your Magi's region. You ignore regional penalties for Creatures of the chosen region. If your Magi is a Keeper, also add one energy to each Creature you play from the chosen region.

flavor:
"I'm welcomed pretty much wherever I go. As long as I don't bring a bunch
of critters with me."
-- Eidon, Keeper
name: Staff of Keepers

effects.name: Korrit Charge
effects.text: Whenever a Korrit you control Pack Hunts with another Creature, add one energy to that Korrit before energy is removed.

flavor:
"The spotted pink mushrooms answer to the one that holds me."
-- Staff inscription
name: Staff of Korrits

effects.name: imbue
effects.text: All of your Creatures in play gain "Power -- Strengthen: (1) Choose any one Creature in play. Add one energy to the chosen Creature."

flavor: The set of Vine relics was split up untold years ago, and neither Naroom nor Paradwyn has ever wanted to part with their relic since.
name: Staff of Vines

effects.name: Agility
effects.text: Stagadan can attack any opposing Magi directly, as if that Magi had no Creatures in play.

flavor: Catch it if you can.
name: Stagadan

flavor:
"CHAAAAAAARGE!!!"
-- Poad, Innkeeper
name: Stagadan Charger

powers.name: Siphon
powers.text: Choose an opposing Magi and one of your other Creatures. Move X energy from the chosen Magi to the chosen Creature. Use this Power only before your Attack step.

flavor:
Balancing on branches tall,
Looking down upon them all,
Choose a target, then you fall.
It's much more fun to pounce!
-- The Scarlet Song
name: Stalk
text: Choose any one opposing Creature in play. Until the end of your next turn, the chosen Creature is stalked; whenever a stalked Creature is attacked, discard one energy from the stalked Creature before energy is removed.

flavor:
Stalker's boots upon my feet
Dance me to the jungle beat.
Soon I'll leap, my hunt complete,
It's much more fun to pounce!
-- The Scarlet Song
name: Stalker's Boots

powers.name: Stalk
powers.text: Until the end of your next turn, whenever one of your Creatures is attacking, the defending Creature is stalked; whenever a stalked Creature is attacked, discard one energy from the stalked Creature before energy is removed.

flavor:
"Ow. Quit it."
-- Targ'n
name: Stand and Take It
text: Choose one of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures. Attach Stand and Take It to the chosen Creature. The next time the chosen Creature is attacked, discard Stand and Take It. The chosen Creature loses no energy in the attack.

flavor: Summoning the strength of starlight requires a knowledge of its origin.
name: Starlight's Genesis
text: Discard a card from your hand a draw a card. If you played a copy of Sunbeam's End this turn, you may remove three energy from your Magi to draw two extra cards.

effects.name: Buddies
effects.text: All of your Core cards cost one less if you have played a Bograth card this turn, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Pals
effects.text: All of your Bograth cards cost one less if you have played a Core card this turn, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"With forward-focuses vision for a new paradigm of embracing and
celebrating a diversity of methods towards a common goal of global
domination..."
-- preamble
name: Statement of Core Values
text: Only Bograth Magi or Core Magi can play Statement of Core Values.

effects.name: Buddies
effects.text: All of your Core cards cost one less if you have played a Bograth card this turn, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Pals
effects.text: All of your Bograth cards cost one less if you have played a Core card this turn, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"With forward-focuses vision for a new paradigm of embracing and
celebrating a diversity of methods towards a common goal of global
domination..."
-- preamble
name: Statement of Core Values
text: Only Bograth Magi or Core Magi can play Statement of Core Values.

flavor:
"I knoww the wayyy passssst..."
-- Ogar
name: Stealth
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Whenever the chosen Creature attacks this turn, it removes energy immediately, before Creatures normally remove energy. Weave Magi may play Stealth.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Stone Quor loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"A stone quor's kiss."
-- Kybarite phrase meaning "dangerous."
name: Stone Quor

powers.name: Squeeze
powers.text: Choose any one opposing Creature. Move hald of the chosen Creature's energy (rounded up) to your Magi.

text: Kybar's Teeth Shadow Magi may play Stone Quor.

flavor:
"What goes up must come down, but how do they get up in the first place?"
-- Wence, Naroom Adventurer
name: Stone Storm
text: Choose any two Creatures in play. Discard X energy from each of the chosen Creatures.

flavor: When the clouds cleared, the Colossus had crumpled to the ground, unable to support its own weight.
name: Storm Cloud
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard all but one energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"How bad can a rain of fish be?"
"Depends on the kind and number of fish."
name: Storm of Fishes
text: Orothe Shadow Magi may play Storm of Fishes.

effects.name: Thunder Charge
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures attacks, add one energy to that Creature before energy is removed. If that Creature is a hyren, add one additional energy.

flavor:
"My shield is the wind and my arrows the hail.
My sword is the lightning -- with these I prevail."
-- Arderial battlehymn
name: Storm Ring

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: If your Magi has no energy at the end of your turn, all of your Arderial Creatures in play gain one energy. If your Magi is Shimmer, all of your Arderial Creatures in play gain an additional energy.
All opposing Spells, Powers, and Effects that reveal your hand to other players have no effect. If Storm Shield is discarded from your hand by an opposing card, you may play it instead.

flavor: Vashps and alabans, xyxes and narths, all of the Arderial creatures circle around the bearer like a cyclone.
name: Storm Shield

flavor: A wing and a predator.
name: Storm Wings

powers.name: All-Out
powers.text: Whenever one of your Creatures attacks this turn, it removes twice as much energy as it would normally. At the end of your Attack step, discard Storm Wings and each of your Creatures that attacked this turn.

effects.name: Backlash
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures is attacked, you may discard one energy from the attacking Creature before energy is removed.

flavor: "It doesn't matter now. Just let them come."
name: Stradus

effects.name: Defense
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures is attacked, add one energy to that Creature before energy is removed.

flavor: My eyes are everywhere. Hey, you almost sat on one!
name: Strag

effects.name: Offense
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures attacks an opposing Creature, add one energy to it before energy is removed and add one energy to it after energy is removed.

flavor:
"The best defense leaves your opponent very sore."
-- Strag, Underwatcher
name: Strag's Claws

effects.name: Purity
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if all Spells in your discard pile are Underneath, discard all of your non-Underneath cards from play and choose any one Creature in play. Until the end of your next turn, the chosen Creature is considered burrowed; it cannot attack and loses no more than two energy per turn from attacks and opposing Spells and Powers.

flavor:
"Go! I'll cover you!"
-- Strag
name: Strag's Ring

effects.name: Pack Defense
effects.text: Whenever one of your other Creatures is attacked, Striped Korrit may defend with that Creature. Striped Korrit loses no energy in the attack, but removes energy from the attacker as normal.

flavor:
"Trouble? No problem; I've got the korrit for it."
-- Ulk, Underwarden
name: Striped Korrit

effects.name: Pack Defense
effects.text: Whenever one of your other Creatures is attacked, Striped Korrit may defend with that Creature. Striped Korrit loses no energy in the attack, but removes energy from the attacker as normal.

flavor:
"Trouble? No problem; I've got the korrit for it."
-- Ulk, Underwarden
name: Striped Korrit

effects.name: Determination
effects.text: As Stubborn Chogus attacks the largest opposing Creature, add two energy to Stubborn Chogus.

flavor: The ferocity with which the Chogus covered Groll's escape amazed him. "I must report T'lok's betrayal to Targ'n before it's too late", thought the battered Keeper.
name: Stubborn Chogus

effects.name: Carouse
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if Stumbling Junjertrug has an even amount of energy, add two energy to it. Otherwise, discard three energy from it.

effects.name: Suntan
effects.text: Your Creatures lose one less energy from Cald Spells and Powers.

flavor:
"ChaaarrrOOOMF!"
-- Iyori
name: Stumbling Junjertrug

flavor:
"Ask any Orathan who's been stranded on a beach by the tide. Water feels
good."
-- O'Qua, Summoner
name: Submerge
text: Choose any one Orothe Creature in play. Add three energy to the chosen Creature.

flavor: This is the end of you, and you.
name: Sulfurous Spirit
text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Choose any one Creature in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Creature. Cald Shadow Magi may play Sulfurous Spirit.

effects.name: Glare
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures removes energy from an opposing Magi in an attack, roll a die. Remove that much additional energy from the Magi.

flavor:
"The future's so dim, I gotta wear sun glasses!"
-- Ythra
name: Sun Glasses

flavor: As the last rays of the sun fell upon the Rayalon, it rose from the ground, growing in stature. The Chaos Jile took a step back in fear.
name: Sunbeam's End
text: Choose a Creature and add one energy to it. If you played a copy of Starlight's Genesis this turn, you may remove two energy from your Magi to add two extra energy to that Creature.

flavor:
"I feel like a fried egg."
"That's funny, 'cause you look like a--"
"Shush."
-- Chur and Harror
name: Sunburn
text: Choose a Creature. Attach Sunburn to the chosen Creature. Whenever that Creature loses energy, it loses two additional energy. If that Creature is discarded and your Magi is d'Resh, you may discard an energy from your Magi to return Sunburn to your hand at the end of the turn.

effects.name: Reflect
effects.text: As an opposing Spell or Power removes energy from one of your Creatures, you may discad Sunglare Celphet from play to choose a Creature or Magi. Discard an equal amount of energy from the chosen card.

flavor: Colder than Warrada's kiss.
name: Sunglare Celphet

effects.name: Comb the Beach
effects.text: Whenever one of your Relics is discarded from play by an opposing card, add two energy to Surf Diel.

flavor:
"We can't let them into the Vault! Oh, Blu, What'll we do?"
"You got us inna this mess, lass. Time you get us out!"
-- Bria and Blu
name: Surf Diel

powers.name: Reckon
powers.text: Discard Surf Diel from play. Choose a Cald Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature. Use this Power only before the Attack Step.

effects.name: Nightmare Gate
effects.text: All of your other Core and Bograth cards cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"Do you smell something?"
-- Wence, Naroom Adventurer
name: Swamp Hyren
text: Core Magi may play Swamp Hyren.

effects.name: Nightmare Gate
effects.text: All of your other Core and Bograth cards cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"An elegant creature for a more civilized age. For countless generations
the Swamp Hyren were the guardians of peace and justice in the great
Bograth empire."
-- Olabra, The Really Greatest Elder Ever
name: Swamp Hyren
text: Core Magi can play Swamp Hyren.

flavor:
"Good, bad, I'm the guy with the moga."
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Practical Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Swamp Moga

powers.name: Roar
powers.text: Until the end of your turn, each of your Creatures removes two additional energy when attacking.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Swamp Weebo loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor:
"So that's what happens when you tick one of those off!"
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Swamp Weebo

powers.name: Devitalize
powers.text: Discard Swamp Weebo from play. Choose X Creatures in play. Discard X energy from each chosen Creature. X is the number of your Bograth Creatures in play.

effects.name: Morph
effects.text: As another Spell, Power, or Effect references a specific Creature type or region, if Swirling Orshaa is in play you may have it be considered that specific Creature type or region until the end of the turn.
As you play Swirling Orshaa, reduce its cost by three. Swirling Orshaa is not considered to be in play when checking to see if your Magi is defeated, and it cannot attack Magi directly.

flavor:
"Be careful, or I'll give you a swirlie."
-- Nahara, Sandkeeper
name: Swirling Orshaa

effects.name: Relic Affinity
effects.text: When you use a Power on one of your Relics, you may have Sylorum pay the energy cost instead of your Magi. If you do, reduce the cost of the Power by one, to a minimum of zero.

flavor:
"Wouldn't be so bad if it'd just stop making that 'DWEEEEEE' noise."
-- Ebylon
name: Sylorum

flavor:
"If there were some way to make use of the energy it drains
away, then it would be powerful indeed."
-- Nimbulo, Arderial Sage
name: Syphon Stone

powers.name: Syphon
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard Syphon from play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Okay, you can be fancy and steal their energy. I'm just 
going to burn them down the traditional way."
-- Grega, Cald Pyromancer
name: Syphon Vortex
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard X energy from the chosen Creature. Add X energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"Sometimes you don't have to choose between knowledge and power right
away... you can get an option."
-- Fossik, Underkeeper
name: Syre

powers.name: Undream Tap
powers.text: Choose any one of your burrowed Creatures in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature to draw one card.

flavor: zzzzzMMMMMzzzzzzzzzzzMMMzMMMzzzzzzzzMMMzzzzzBOOM!
name: Szalak

powers.name: Supercharge
powers.text:
Roll a die:
1, 2 = Add five energy to Szalak.
3, 4 = Discard Szalak from play.
5, 6 = Add three energy to Szalak and three energy to your Magi.

effects.name: Legacy
effects.text: When Szhar is discarded from play, draw two cards.

flavor:
"Our dreams keep returning, much the same way that the dunes keep marching
across the sands."
-- Risha
name: Szhar
text: When you reveal a d'Resh Magi, if you have one or more recurring cards in your discard pile, you may discard one energy from your Magi to choose one recurring card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

flavor:
"He's a little abrasive but once you get to know him,
he's a pretty nice guy."
-- Ohk, Explorer
name: T'Dek

powers.name: Vitalize
powers.text: Choose a Creature with less than its starting energy and restore it to its printed starting energy.

text: T'Dek may only play Naroom and Universal cards.

effects.name: Dream Loops
effects.text: Once per turn, immediately after an opposing Creature uses a Power, T'kanzam may use an exact copy of that Power, paying all costs. You make all choices for the Power.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play T'kanzam, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Of course it follows its nose. It has no choice."
-- Iain
name: T'kanzam

flavor: "Catch."
name: T'lok

powers.name: Big Ol' Rock
powers.text: Choose any one Magi with no Creatures in play. Discard ten energy from the chosen Magi.

effects.name: Betrayed Secrets
effects.text: Effects may not reduce the amount of energy removed from opposing Creatures in attacks.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Your Core Creatures remove one extra energy when attacking.

flavor: "Of course I'll show you how to use Kybar's Fang."
name: T'lok, Traitor

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Taglat, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"It's more than a dream thief; it's an idea thief."
-- Ookami, Jungle Drummer
name: Taglat

powers.name: Dream Cross
powers.text: Choose any one Power or Effect on an opposing card in play. Until the beginning of your next turn, the chosen Power or Effect is considered to be printed on Taglat. Taglat cannot copy a Power or Effect that it already has. All copied Powers that reference the card that they are printed on now reference Taglat.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Taglat, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"It's more than a dream thief; it's an idea thief."
-- Ookami, Jungle Drummer
name: Taglat

powers.name: Dream Cross
powers.text: Choose any one Power or Effect on an opposing card in play. Until the beginning of your next turn, the chosen Power or Effect is considered to be printed on Taglat. Taglat cannot copy a Power or Effect that it already has. All copied Powers that reference the card that they are printed on now reference Taglat.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever one of your Effects moves energy from one of your Creatures to another, you may choose to move the energy between one of the Creatures and Taisa instead.

flavor:
"I'm not certain what was worse; the Shadow Magi, or the Cald fire team
that chased them. Thankfully, Gia got rid of them both."
name: Taisa

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever one of your Effects moves energy from one of your Creatures to another, you may choose to move the energy between one of the Creatures and Taisa instead.

flavor:
"I'm not certain what was worse; the Shadow Magi, or the Cald fire team
that chased them. Thankfully, Gia got rid of them both."
name: Taisa

flavor: "Don't bother, T'lok, I'm prepared for your tricks."
name: Tal'ik

powers.name: Standing Tall
powers.text: Choose one of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures. Until the beginning of your next turn, the chosen Creature may not be discarded from play or returned to your hand while it has energy. Opposing players may not gain control of that Creature.

flavor:
"I'm the gardener. These are my plants. And you, brother, are the
fertilizer. Dig it."
-- Yaki, Naroom Tracker
name: Tap Roots
text: Choose any two Creatures in play. Remove up to two energy from one of the chosen Creatures. Add up to two energy to the other chosen Creature.

effects.name: Cling
effects.text: When Tar Hyren is defeated in an attack, attach it to the Creature that defeated it. That Creature cannot attack and both that Creature and that Creature's Magi lose one energy at the beginning of each turn. When attached, Tar Hyren is not affected by any cards.

flavor:
"That's what I love about the Tar Hyren, sticktoitiveness."
-- Zet
name: Tar Hyren
text: Only Bograth or Core Magi can play Tar Hyren.

effects.name: Cling
effects.text: When Tar Hyren is defeated in an attack, attach it to the Creature that defeated it. That Creature cannot attack and both that Creature and that Creature's Magi lose one energy at the beginning of each turn. When attached, Tar Hyren is not affected by any cards.

flavor:
"That's what I love about the Tar Hyren, sticktoitiveness."
-- Zet
name: Tar Hyren
text: Only Bograth or Core Magi can play Tar Hyren.

effects.name: Enhanced Invulnerability
effects.text: All of your Creatures in play with Invulnerability lose one less energy in attacks.

flavor: Getting into an argument with Targ'n is like yelling at a brick wall.
name: Targ'n

effects.name: Lightning Storm
effects.text: When Tempest Hyren attacks, you may play one Arderial Spell from your hand. All energy costs for the chosen Spell are paid for by Tempest Hyren instead of your Magi. Reduce the energy cost of the Spell by two, to a minimum of one.

flavor: Taming the tempest hyren is the final test for young Shield-Magi.
name: Tempest Hyren

effects.name: Spotlight
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if Terkoz was the only Creature you played this turn, add one energy to each of your Creatures.

flavor:
"When it calls, we all answer."
-- Arawan
name: Terkoz

flavor:
"If we are too afraid to fight back, then we have already lost."
-- Jaela, Arderial Regis
name: Terrorize
text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. The next time the chosen Creature attacks, it loses no energy in the attack. Underneath Magi may play Terrorize.

effects.name: Invigorate
effects.text: Increase Thast's Energize by one for each of your frozen Nar Creatures.

flavor: "You don't know the meaning of the word 'cold', bub."
name: Thast

powers.name: Ice Grinder
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard energy from the chosen Creature equal to Thast's Energize.

flavor:
"One day our child shall set me free, Une, and the world shall
awaken to its worst nightmare."
-- Agram
name: The Dark Twins
text: The Dark Twins count as two Magi for deck construction.  The Dark Twins may go first every game and, if they go first, they may draw up to seven starting cards. If The Dark Twins are defeated and your next Magi is Naroom, that Magi becomes a Naroom Shadow Magi. All rules for Shadow Magi apply to the new Magi.

flavor:
"Hey! I thought you were supposed to be peaceful or something!"
-- Valkan, Pyromancer
name: The Hunt
text: All of your Weave Creatures that can attack may attack twice this turn.

effects.name: Pyromancy
effects.text: All Powers on your Cald and Orothe Creatures that discard energy from opposing Creatures discard two additional energy. Your Spells, Powers, and Effects can not discard energy from opposing Magi.

flavor:
"Bria stole the scroll?!? Well, I'll make sure I have The Last Words!"
-- Valkan, Pyromancer and former bridge-builder
name: The Last Words

effects.name: Pyromancy
effects.text: All Powers on your Cald and Orothe Creatures that discard energy from opposing Creatures discard two additional energy. Your Spells, Powers, and Effects can not discard energy from opposing Magi.

flavor:
"Bria stole the scroll?!? Well, I'll make sure I have The Last Words!"
-- Valkan, Pyromancer and former bridge-builder
name: The Last Words

effects.name: Surprise!
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if you have no Creatures in play, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a Kybar's Teeth Creature, you may play it, reducing its cost by four, to a minimum of zero. The Creature cannot attack this turn. Otherwise, discard the revealed card.

flavor:
"TREMBLE in my presence, weakling!"
"You brought presents? For me?"
-- Hrada and Jagt
name: The Prankster

effects.name: Leech
effects.text: At the beginning of your Play Creatures step, you may discard two energy from The Real Qwade. If you do, until the end of your turn, whenever you play a Creature, choose another Creature. Move on energy from the chosen Creature to the Creature you just played.

flavor: I trust no one. Not even myself.
name: The Real Qwade
text: The Real Qwade can be in a Magi stack with "Qwade". When you reveal The Real Qwade, defeat him if your previous defeated Magi was not "Qwade".

flavor:
"It's bright and pretty and burns things. I never grow tired of it."
-- Grega, Cald Pyromancer
name: Thermal Blast
text: Roll one die. Choose any one Creature or Magi in play. Remove energy equal to the die roll from the chosen Creature or Magi.

flavor: Also known as "summer".
name: Thin Ice
text: Add one energy to each of your frozen Creatures. Remove one energy from each opposing frozen Creature.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Thoughtful Baldar loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"QUIET! Can't you see that he's thinking?"
-- Ullig
name: Thoughtful Baldar

powers.name: Ponder
powers.text: Reveal one random card from your hand to all players. Reduce the cost of all copies of that card by two, to a minimum of one, until the end of your turn.

effects.name: Little Lucky
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, choose one of your Creatures. Add one energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Lotta Lucky
effects.text: When an opposing Spell or Power affects your Magi, you may discard Three Leaf Clover from play. If you do, your cards are unaffected by the Spell or Power, and you draw a card.

flavor:
"I can only ever find the boring old four-leaf kind."
-- Kiersta
name: Three-Leaf Clover

effects.name: Little Lucky
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, choose one of your Creatures. Add one energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Lotta Lucky
effects.text: When an opposing Spell or Power affects your Magi, you may discard Three Leaf Clover from play. If you do, your cards are unaffected by the Spell or Power, and you draw a card.

flavor:
"Don't eat the clover; it's only garnish."
-- Poad, Innkeeper
name: Three-Leaf Clover

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Thresh is in an attack, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Thresh and one of your other Weave Creatures.

flavor: They swarm to trouble-points within the Weave.
name: Thresh

powers.name: Rethresh
powers.text: Whenever a Weave card is discarded from play on an opponent's turn, add one energy to Thresh.

effects.name: Infuse
effects.text: When you play a d'Resh Creature, you may discard Thrybe from play. If you do, place a d'Resh Spell from your hand under that Creature. Treat that Spell as if it were a Power printed on the Creature. The cost of the Power equals the cost of the Spell, and the name of the Power is the name of the Spell.

flavor:
"Have you ever actually seen one of these things around? No? Me,
neither..."
-- Harresh
name: Thrybe

flavor:
"Send me the hyren bringing rain,
Cleansing wounds and easing pain.
But if with lightning storms they play,
Keep them very far away."
name: Thunder Hyren

powers.name: Shockstorm
powers.text: Discard two energy from each Non-Arderial Creature in play.

powers.name: Replenish
powers.text: Discard Thunder Hyren from play. Add two energy to each of your hyren in play.

flavor: When the echoes fades, the Vashps and its victim were nowhere to be seen.
name: Thunder Vashp

powers.name: Thunderclap
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play with three or less energy. Discard Thunder Vashp from play. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor:
"Are you rrrrready to rrrrrumble?"
-- Gogor, Celebrated Hero of the Underneath
name: Thunderquake
text: Choose any number of Creatures in play. Discard a total of X energy in any combination from the chosen Creatures. X cannot be more than 10.

flavor:
"Oh no it wasn't! It was shaking worse under MY feet!"
-- Zet, to Korg
name: Thunderquake
text: Choose any number of Creatures in play. Discard a total of X energy in any combination from the chosen Creatures. X cannot be more than 10.

flavor:
"I wish I knew what they were doing down there."
-- Orlon, Friend of Wellisks
name: Tidal Karak

powers.name: Sunken Treasure
powers.text: Play a non-Universal Relic from any opponent's discard pile, ignoring regional restrictions and penalties. When Tidal Karak leaves play, discard all Relics played by this Power.

text: Orothe Shadow Magi can play Tidal Karak.

flavor:
"Oh, better that her shattered hulk
Should sink beneath the wave;
Her thunder shook the mighty deep,
And there should be her grave."
-- Oliver Wendell Holmes, "Old ironsides"
name: Tidal Wave
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play. For an additional four energy you may choose and discard a second Creature from play.

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Core Spells and Powers do not affect Tillant.

effects.name: Cleansing Strike
effects.text: Whenever Tillant attacks a Core Creature, add five energy to Tillant before energy is removed.

flavor: A seed to coax life from decay.
name: Tillant

flavor: "Baloo Root? Does anyone want a chunk of fault-ridden Baloo Root skin? I'm only going to... throw it away!"
name: Tiller

powers.name: Exchange
powers.text: Discard any one Creature card from your hand. Draw two cards.

powers.name: Scrounge
powers.text: Discard any one Relic card from your hand. Draw two cards.

flavor:
"It has served and protected Naroom for generations.
Whatever its price, I pay it gladly."
-- Orwin, Naroom Elder
name: Timber Hyren

powers.name: Tribute
powers.text: Take up to five energy from your Magi and place it on Timber Hyren.

effects.name: Painful Bark
effects.text: When you play Tithragar, remove two energy from each Core Creature and Core Magi in play.

effects.name: Painful Bite
effects.text: Whenever Tithragar attacks, if that Creature's Magi is a Naroom Shadow Magi, discard the defending Creature from play before energy is removed.

flavor:
"A tithragar once bit my sister."
-- Hrada
name: Tithragar

effects.name: Brittle
effects.text: As Toasted Yajo is attacked, you may shuffle it into its owner's deck and draw a card.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: As this Creature attacks or is attacked, you may move one energy between it and one of your other Weave Creatures.

flavor:
"Do you smell something burning?"
-- Quirle
name: Toasted Yajo
text: Cald Spells and Powers cannot choose Toasted Yajo.

effects.name: Darkest Magics
effects.text: After Togoth energizes on his first turn, play one Shadow Geyser from your hand, ignoring all costs and requirements of playing the Geyser. If Togoth is your first Magi, you cannot choose to go first.

flavor: "It's not a Shadow Geyser! It's a Core-rupted Inter-Regional Darkness Projector and Transport Access Gate!"
name: Togoth
subtype: Practitioner of Core Magics -- The General

effects.text: Tomes of the Great Library cannot be discarded from play by opposing cards that specifically discard Relics from play. Discard Tomes of the Great Library from play if your Magi is not a Naroom Magi or Naroom Shadow Magi.

flavor:
"Oh, thank you, dear brother; it's just what I've always wanted!"
-- Warrada, The Shadow
name: Tomes of the Great Library

powers.name: Research
powers.text: Search your deck or any opposing discard pile for any one Spell. Play the chosen Spell, ignoring regional restrictions. If that Spell came from your deck, discard it. If it came from an opposing discard pile, shuffle it into its owner's deck.

effects.text: Tomes of the Great Library cannot be discarded from play by opposing cards that specifically discard Relics from play. Discard Tomes of the Great Library from play if your Magi is not a Naroom Magi or Naroom Shadow Magi.

flavor:
"Oh, thank you, dear brother; it's just what I've always wanted!"
-- Warrada, The Shadow
name: Tomes of the Great Library

powers.name: Research
powers.text: Search your deck or any opposing discard pile for any one Spell. Play the chosen Spell, ignoring regional restrictions. If that Spell came from your deck, discard it. If it came from an opposing discard pile, shuffle it into its owner's deck.

effects.text: Whenever an opposing Power, Spell or Effect forces you to discard one or more cards from your hand, you may discard one energy from your Magi. If you do, the Spell, Power, or Effect does nothing.

effects.name: Lore
effects.text: Once during your Draw Step, after you draw, you may discard one card from your hand. If you do, draw one card.

flavor: You never know what tomorrow holds.
name: Tomorrow's Jewel
text: If an opposing card causes you to discard Tomorrow's Jewel from your hand or from play, you my play it instead.

flavor: "Can't sleep... must play... gotta shower..."
name: Tony At A Con

powers.name: Caffeine!
powers.text: Take an additional turn after this one. All Magi in your Magi stack gain "Effect - Sleep Dep: At the end of your turn, if you just took two turns in a row, defeat your Magi. Sleep Dep cannot be prevented or canceled."

effects.name: Animite Affinity
effects.text: Non-Universal Creatures Tony plays cost one less energy, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"I've never seen anything like this... you're not from around here, are
you?"
-- Eidon, Keeper
name: Tony Jones

powers.name: Favors
powers.text: Put any one Relic from your hand into play.

flavor: The cragnoc began to collapse under the barrage of Core creatures. Hrada's laugh of triumph turned to a groan of despair as he realized that all of his Dream Creatures were in the shadow of the falling beast.
name: Topple
text: Choose one of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures and any number of opposing Creatures. Remove energy equal to your Creature's energy, in any combination, from the chosen opposing Creatures. Discard your Creature from play.

effects.name: Community
effects.text: Whenever one of your cards adds energy to all of your Creatures, add an additional energy to Torpar.

effects.name: Protection
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Spell or Power removes energy from any of your other Creatures, remove the energy from Torpar instead.

flavor:
"It's a mobile home, Korg. Not a luxury resort!"
-- Olabra, The Really Greatest Elder Ever
name: Torpar

effects.name: Community
effects.text: Whenever one of your cards adds energy to all of your Creatures, add an additional energy to Torpar.

effects.name: Protection
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Spell or Power removes energy from any of your other Creatures, remove the energy from Torpar instead.

flavor:
"Hey, I'm a reasonable guy. But I've just experienced some very
unreasonable things."
-- Pok
name: Torpar

flavor:
"I could ride these all day!"
-- Shivara, Mistress of the Winds
name: Tradewinds
text: Discard one card from your hand to draw three cards.

effects.name: Weakness
effects.text: If Tragan is attacked, discard two energy from Tragan before energy is removed.

effects.name: Boost
effects.text: When Tragan is played, add three energy to it.

flavor: The darkness is intimidating until someone holds out a light.
name: Tragan
text: Orothe Magi may play Tragan.

flavor:
Enviouis of Targ'n's position as Elder, T'lok betrayed the secret
entrances to Yark Eyre to the Dark Twins. Enamoured with Warrada,
T'lok also taught her how to control Kybar's Fang.
name: Traitor's Reach
text: Choose a Creature and a Magi controlled by the same player. If the chosen Creature does not share a region with the chosen Magi, discard that Creature from play and remove two energy from that Magi.

flavor:
"We know the calm as well as the storm."
-- Jaela, Arderial Regis
name: Tranquility
text: Until the beginning of your next turn, all Spells, Powers and Effects that would discard energy may not be played. Draw one additional card during your Draw Step this turn.

effects.name: Lifetap
effects.text: Whenever a Spell or Power adds energy to one or more Creatures in play, add one energy to Trask.

flavor:
It's like an alligator
with scales and teeth and claws,
It's like a Coral Hyren,
but not afraid of Cawhs.
name: Trask
text: Orothe Magi may play Trask.

effects.name: Bolster
effects.text: At the end of your turn, add one energy to each of your Creatures with less than its starting energy.

effects.name: Grudge
effects.text: When you reveal Traveling Healer, if an opposing Magi is Orothe or Weave, add five energy to Traveling Healer.

flavor:
"He doesn't know what he's got coming. Well, I'm coming, and I'll show
HIM!"
name: Traveling Healer

effects.name: Bolster
effects.text: At the end of your turn, add one energy to each of your Creatures with less than its starting energy.

effects.name: Grudge
effects.text: When you reveal Traveling Healer, if an opposing Magi is Orothe or Weave, add five energy to Traveling Healer.

flavor:
"We're safe on a cliff on the side of Mt. Kybar."
"Ah. This is obviously some strange usage of the word 'safe' that I hadn't
previously been aware of."
-- Targ'n and Gar
name: Traveling Healer

flavor:
"Gotta get me one of these!"
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Tree Hinko

powers.name: Invigorate
powers.text: The next time your Magi energizes, he or she energizes for two additional energy.

effects.name: Watchful
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Spell, Power, or Effect discards energy from one or more of your Creatures in play, you may discard Treepsh from play. If you do, the Spell, Power, or Effect does nothing.

flavor: They're very common along the border between the two regions, hence they always get caught in the middle.
name: Treepsh

powers.name: Supply
powers.text: Discard Treepsh from play. Draw a card. If you have more Creatures in play than any one opponent of your choice, draw an additional card.

effects.name: Watchful
effects.text: Whenever an opposing Spell, Power, or Effect discards energy from one or more of your Creatures in play, you may discard Treepsh from play. If you do, the Spell, Power, or Effect does nothing.

flavor: They're very common along the border between the two regions, hence they always get caught in the middle.
name: Treepsh

powers.name: Supply
powers.text: Discard Treepsh from play. Draw a card. If you have more Creatures in play than any one opponent of your choice, draw an additional card.

flavor:
"Do ye hear anythin'? Any little pitter-patter?"
"Nope. Everything's quiet."
"Good."
-- Blu and Orlon
name: Tremor Stones

powers.name: Boom Boom Boom
powers.text: Discard all Relics in play. All ongoing Powers and Effects of those Relics are canceled. You may not use Boom Boom Boom the turn you play Tremor Stones.

effects.name: Stumble
effects.text: Once per turn, as an opposing Creature attacks your Magi, move half of the Creature's energy, rounded up, to its Magi and return the Creature to its owner's hand.

flavor:
"Ooops! Did I cause that?"
-- Laranel
name: Tripvine

effects.name: Inspire
effects.text: Draw two additional cards during your Draw step. Reduce your Magi's Energize by two.

effects.name: Frightened
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, any Core Magi may discard three energy to discard Trogovo.

flavor:
"Great mind think a ... think a ... errrr..."
-- Myka
name: Trogovo

effects.name: Maximum Warp
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures uses the effect 'Dreamwarp', you may Dreamwarp for an additional energy.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Tropical Hyren, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor: Perpetual commotion machine.
name: Tropical Hyren

effects.name: Scout
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if Tropical Jumbor did not attack this turn, add two energy to it.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Tropical Jumbor is in an attack, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Tropical Jumbor and any one of your other Paradwyn or Weave Creatures.

flavor: It pounces as gracefully as a slab of granite.
name: Tropical Jumbor

effects.name: Scout
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if Tropical Jumbor did not attack this turn, add two energy to it.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Tropical Jumbor is in an attack, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Tropical Jumbor and any one of your other Paradwyn or Weave Creatures.

flavor:
"Jumbor speed is directly proportionate to the time before its next meal."
-- Iyori
name: Tropical Jumbor

effects.name: Confer
effects.text: During your Draw step, if you played a Creature with the Effect 'Dreamwarp' this turn, draw an additional card.

flavor:
"Wow! There's a whole plith-ora of 'em! Ow! What was that for?"
-- a slightly bruised Marella
name: Tropical Plith

flavor:
"Urgh, it's raining jiles and furoks out there!"
"Really? Lemme see!"
-- Zet and Korg
name: Tropical Rain
text: Choose any one Creature in play with the Effect "Dreamwarp". Add three energy to the chosen Creature. You can play Tropical Rain on an opponent's turn, immediately after one of your Creatures is attacked, but before energy is removed.

effects.name: Hunt
effects.text: Whenever Tropical Vinoc attacks a stalked Creature, draw one card before energy is removed.

flavor:
"Beware the vines of Boria!"
-- Bograth maxim
name: Tropical Vinoc

powers.name: Stalk
powers.text: Discard a card from your hand. Choose any one opposing Creature in play. Until the end of your next turn, the chosen Creature is stalked; whenever a stalked Creature is attacked, discard one energy from the stalked Creature before energy is removed. You can use this Power any number of times during your turn.

powers.name: Cataclysm
powers.text: Discard ALL cards in play. Each Magi is defeated and go to his or her owner's Magi pile.

flavor:
"Nobody touch it!" yelled Olabra, as the new dream creature hissed and
scooted away.
name: Trulb

powers.name: Dream Hatch
powers.text: Discard Trulb from play. Look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of your Bograth Creatures in play. Choose any one Bograth Creature from those cards and play it with one energy, ignoring all costs. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck.

flavor:
"...and it's pretty too."
--Grahnna, Revered Important Person
name: Trulb Bracelet

powers.name: Sweet Sorrow
powers.text: Discard one of your Trulbs from play. Draw a number of cards equal to the Trulb's printed starting energy, plus one.

flavor:
"Heeeere comes annnnnother one!"
-- Arawan, Emissary
name: Trulb Horde
text: If you have at least three Bograth Creatures in play, play any one Bograth Creature from your hand with one energy instead of its starting energy, ignoring all costs.

flavor: In the swamps of Bograth, even the most meaningless creature serves a greater purpose.
name: Trulbble!
text: Discard up to four Trulbs you control from play. Draw two cards for each Trulb you discarded.

effects.name: Avenger
effects.text: If Trygar is defeated, at the end of the current turn you may play any Creature from your hand. Play three energy on the Creature instead of its normal starting energy. Until the beginning of your next turn, the Creature played is unaffected by your opponents' cards.

flavor: And to Korremar, who helped me write this will, I leave... not a boot to the head, but a rabid bisiwog, to be placed in his trousers...
name: Trygar

effects.name: Legacy
effects.text: When your Magi is defeated, choose an opponent and two of that player's non-Magi cards in play. The chosen player chooses and discards one of the chosen cards.

flavor: "And I leave all of my animite to the people of Vash Naroom, so they can afford to move somewhere decent!"
name: Trygar's Will
text: Korremar can play Trygar's Will.

flavor:
"It never hurts to be her friend."
-- Poad, Naroom Innkeeper
name: Tryn

powers.name: Refresh
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Add two energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.text: Your cards cannot add energy to Tryn Flame-Saver.

flavor:
"You know," said Barak, "the fire really brings out the green in your
eyes." Tryn turned her head and blushed.
name: Tryn Flame-Saver

powers.name: Energy Substitution
powers.text: The next time this turn that one of your Cald Spells or Powers discards energy from exactly one of your Creatures in play, it instead adds energy.

powers.name: Energy Substitution
powers.text: The next time this turn that one of your Naroom Spells or Powers adds energy to exactly one opposing Creature, it instead discards energy.

effects.text: Your cards cannot add energy to Tryn Flame-Saver.

flavor:
"You know," said Barak, "the fire really brings out the green in your
eyes." Tryn turned her head and blushed.
name: Tryn Flame-Saver

powers.name: Energy Substitution
powers.text: The next time this turn that one of your Cald Spells or Powers discards energy from exactly one of your Creatures in play, it instead adds energy.

powers.name: Energy Substitution
powers.text: The next time this turn that one of your Naroom Spells or Powers adds energy to exactly one opposing Creature, it instead discards energy.

flavor:
"Weave has ways to make you tuk."
-- Zaya, Weave Elder
name: Tuk Berries

powers.name: Nourish
powers.text: Use this Power only before your Attack Step. Choose any one Weave Creature in play. Add two energy to the chosen Creature. That Creature cannot attack this turn.

flavor: "I am no giant."
name: Tuku

powers.name: Restrain
powers.text: Until the end of your next turn, Magi cannot play any non-Universal Relics or Spells.

flavor: Focused freezing power in an easy to use package.
name: Tundra Hyren

powers.name: Freeze
powers.text: Choose an opposing Magi. That Magi's Creatures are Frozen until the beginning of your next turn. Powers of Frozen cards cost one extra energy to use.

flavor:
"When you least expect it, expect it!"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Ever-Vigilant Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Tunnel
text: Choose one of your burrowed Creatures. Until the end of the turn, the chosen Creature can attack Magi directly. When the chosen Creature attacks a Magi this turn, add half of the energy removed from the defending Magi (rounded down) to your Magi.

effects.name: Burrow
effects.text: Your other Underneath Creatures are burrowed; they cannot attack and each lose no more than two energy per turn from attacks and your opponent's Spells and Powers.

flavor:
"Its kingdom is under this world."
-- Orwin, Naroom Elder
name: Tunnel Hyren

effects.name: Shield
effects.text: Whenever Tunnel Parmalag attacks, it loses no more than one energy. Your other cards cannot prevent Tunnel Parmalag from being specifically discarded from play and cannot prevent Tunnel Parmalag from losing energy in attacks.

flavor:
"It has as many weak spots as a two-ton boulder."
-- Radget
name: Tunnel Parmalag

effects.name: Shield
effects.text: Whenever Tunnel Parmalag attacks, it loses no more than one energy. Your other cards cannot prevent Tunnel Parmalag from being specifically discarded from play and cannot prevent Tunnel Parmalag from losing energy in attacks.

flavor:
"It has as many weak spots as a two-ton boulder."
-- Radget
name: Tunnel Parmalag

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: At the end of each of your turns, add one energy to each burrowed Creature in play.

flavor:
"Even without magic, they provide great traction
to anchor your feet while digging."
-- Gruk, Underfarmer
name: Tunneler's Boots

flavor: "Agram will show you the true nature of power. He is your master now."
name: Turn
text: Choose any one Creature in play with less than its starting energy. X is the chosen Creature's starting energy. The chosen Creature becomes Core and you gain control of it. Restore the chosen Creature to its starting energy.

effects.name: Surprise
effects.text: If you draw Tweave during your Draw Step, you may reveal it to your opponent and immediately play it with three energy, without paying any costs.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Tweave attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Tweave and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Okay, I think we're safe. Just don't touch anything."
-- Zet, to Korg
name: Tweave
text: Weave Shadow Magi may play Tweave.

effects.name: Regrow
effects.text: If Twee is put into your discard pile from play, move the first Creature card under Twee to your hand.

flavor: One, two, Twee, more.
name: Twee

effects.name: Dream Inhibitor
effects.text: Powers on opposing Core Creatures cost two extra energy.

flavor: After being released from their prison in d'Resh, Lanyx and Chur used their powers of corruption to taint the beauty of the desert.
name: Twilight Mowat

powers.name: Dark Sands
powers.text: Choose an opposing Creature. That Creature is Core until the beginning of your next turn.

text: Only Core and d'Resh Magi may play Twilight Mowat.

effects.name: Dream Inhibitor
effects.text: Powers on opposing Core Creatures cost two extra energy.

name: Twilight Mowat

powers.name: Dark Sands
powers.text: Choose an opposing Creature. That Creature is Core until the beginning of your next turn.

text: Only Core and d'Resh Magi may play Twilight Mowat.

flavor: Togoth snapped his fingers. The approaching ormagon let out a bellow of pain, then vanished in a flash of light.
name: Twisted Dreams
text: Choose a Power on an opposing Creature. Remove energy from that Creature equal to the cost of the chosen Power (X equals zero).

effects.name: Timber
effects.text: Whenever one of your Naroom Creatures with less energy than Twunk is attacked, remove two energy from the attacking Creature before energy is removed.

flavor:
Roasted Twunk - 5 animite
-- From the menu at Gar's Fried Eebit Shack
name: Twunk

flavor: The wind and the sea rise. Everything else goes down.
name: Typhoon
