text: Roll one die. Discard enery equal to the die roll from each non-Orothe Creature in play.

flavor:
"Sharp and swift -- just like me!"
-- Gherish
name: Uban

powers.name: Dream Slice
powers.text: Choose a Creature. Discard a card from your hand to discard three energy from the chosen Creature.

text: When you reveal a d'Resh Magi, if you have one or more recurring cards in your discard pile, you may discard one energy from your Magi to choose one recurring card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

effects.name: Borrow
effects.text: Whenever Ugger attacks, you may move any amount of energy from one of your other Creatures to Ugger before energy is removed.

flavor: It sees its enemies as dirt and its friends as shovels.
name: Ugger
text: Underneath Magi may play Ugger.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: At the start of your turn add one energy to each of your Korrits in play.

flavor: Is this the first time mushrooms have had YOU for lunch?
name: Ulk

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Korrits you control may not be chosen by opposing Powers.

effects.name: Fungal Bloom
effects.text: After you play a Korrit, add one energy to it.

flavor: "CUTE!? Is that ALL you think of me?! Watch this!"
name: Ulk, Prodigy

effects.name: Fearless
effects.text: Whenever your last Creature in play is discarded, add four energy to Ullig.

flavor: A coward fears a fight. A hero fights his fear.
name: Ullig

effects.name: Purity
effects.text: At the end of your turn, if all Spells in your discard pile are Kybar's Teeth, discard each of your non-Kybar's Teeth cards from play and choose an opposing Magi. Until the beginning of your next turn, each of that Magi's Creatures cost one additional energy to play.

flavor:
Stand atop the Fang, and thus above your enemies.
-- Ring's inscription
name: Ullig's Ring

effects.name: Fire Away!
effects.text:
Once per turn, when one of your Creatures is attacked and before
energy is removed, you may roll one die:
1-2: Discard three enery from the defending Creature.
3-4: Discard one energy from the attacking Creature.
5-6: Discard three energy from the attacking Creature.
     Always use this result if your Magi is Ullig.

flavor:
"You know, there's really no such thing as 'friendly fire'."
-- Tony Jones
name: Ullig's Slingshot

effects.name: Crystal Affinity
effects.text: Crystal cards cost you one less energy to play, to a minimum of one.

effects.name: Resist
effects.text: Your Crystal Creatures lose one less energy when attacked.

flavor: "Crystal is so sparkly, I just can't get enough of it!"
name: Ulmi

effects.name: Mud Clod
effects.text: When Umbu is discarded from play, choose a Relic in play. Attach Umbu to the chosen Relic; as long as Umbu is attached, it cannot be discarded by having zero energy and is unaffected by cards that affect Creatures. None of the chosen Relic's Powers or Effects can be used. At the beginning of each of your turns, discard one energy from that Relic's Magi. When the Relic is discarded, discard Umbu.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Umbu loses no energy from opposing Effects.

flavor:
"Dangit! It's all gunked up again!"
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Hygienic Emperor of Great
   and Mighty Bograth
name: Umbu

flavor: I'm sure.
name: Ummm...NO!
text: Play "Ummm...NO!" only when an opponent plays a Spell that specifically discards one of your Creatures in play. Your Creature is not discarded from play. You may play "Ummm...NO!" during your opponents' turns.

effects.name: Force of Will
effects.text: Whenever an opponent's Power, Spell, or Effects forces you to discard a card from your hand, draw two cards for each card you were forced to discard. If an opponent's Spell, Power, or Effect causes Underlord's Shield to be discarded from your hand, instead put Underlord's Shield into play.

flavor:
"Everybody's out to get me but I feel all right...
Everybody's thinking 'bout me!"
name: Underlord's Shield

flavor:
"Two! Two shadow geysers! Bwah hah--"
"Yeah, I heard you the first time."
-- Korg and Zet
name: Underneath Shadow Geyser
text: The energy cost for this Geyser is zero if played by an Underneath Shadow Magi. In order to play this Geyser, you must discard six Core cards from your hand. Place this Geyser on the table. All non-Core Magi with an Underneath card in play draw one less card during their Draw Step. Draw one additional card during your Draw Step. You may not play another Underneath Shadow Geyser while this one is in play. If your Magi leaves play, you may keep all but one of your Shadow Geysers in play. Agram does not discard any Shadow Geysers from play when he leaves play.

flavor:
"Controlling the current is the easy part of the spell. The hard part is
forcing the critter into the water in the first place."
-- Orlon, Friend of Wellisks
name: Undertow
text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play. The chosen Creature's owner then shuffles that Creature back into his or her deck.

effects.name: Balance
effects.text: At the end of your turn, each player shuffles all but ten cards from their hand into their deck. If a player has ten cards or less, that player shuffles no cards into his or her deck.

flavor:
Greed is unbecoming a Magi.
-- Ancient Proverb
name: Une's Scale

flavor:
"You know, it's at times like this that I really wish I'd listened to what
my mother told me."
"Why? What did she tell you?"
"I don't know. I didn't listen."
-- Kazm and Ulk
name: Unmake
text: Choose a Creature with X energy. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Discard one energy from each Creature in play of the same type as the discarded Creature.

flavor:
"Underneath. Loathe it or level it."
-- Morag, Executioner
name: Unmake
text: Choose a Creature with X energy. Discard the chosen Creature from play. Discard one energy from each Creature in play of the same type as the discarded Creature.

flavor:
"Where'd he go?"
-- Zet, to Korg
name: Updraft
text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Return the chosen Creature to your hand. Place its energy on your Magi.

effects.name: Tainted Dreams
effects.text: Your Magi may play Core Spells, ignoring regional penalties and restrictions.

flavor:
"I had the strangest dream last night..."
-- Ogar
name: Urhail
text: Underneath Shadow Magi may play Urhail, ignoring regional penalties and restrictions.

effects.name: Burrow
effects.text: As long as you have a burrowed Creature in play, Urigant is burrowed; it cannot attack and loses no more than two energy per turn from attacks and opposing Spells and Powers.

effects.name: Dig Up
effects.text: All other burrowed Creatures in play lose energy as normal in attacks.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Urigant loses two less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"One must set a burrower to catch a burrower."
-- Koll, Shaper
name: Urigant

effects.name: Burrow
effects.text: As long as you have a burrowed Creature in play, Urigant is burrowed; it cannot attack and loses no more than two energy per turn from attacks and opposing Spells and Powers.

effects.name: Dig Up
effects.text: All other burrowed Creatures in play lose energy as normal in attacks.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Urigant loses two less energy in attacks.

flavor:
"One must set a burrower to catch a burrower."
-- Koll, Shaper
name: Urigant

effects.name: Blunt
effects.text: Creatures may not use the Effect "Weave".

flavor:
"Ushi's method of motivation usually involves a rather large hammer."
-- Kolte
name: Ushi

powers.name: Motivate
powers.text: Until the end of your turn, each of your Creatures with the Effect "Weave" gains two energy as it attacks.

effects.name: Gambit
effects.text: The first time each turn that Ust is attacked, you may discard two cards from your hand to discard the attacking Creature before energy is removed.
Each of your non-Nar, non-Universal cards costs one additional energy to play.

flavor: "Two can play that game."
name: Ust

effects.name: Wait
effects.text: Uwamar cannot attack.

effects.name: Watch
effects.text: Whenever you play any other Weave Creature, add two energy to Uwamar.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Uwamar is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Uwamar and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: Insatiably curious, they're usually the first to look, first to find, and first to run away.
name: Uwamar

effects.name: Juju
effects.text: Each turn, the first opposing Spell, Power, or attack that discards energy from your Magi discards no energy.

effects.name: Karma
effects.text: Whenever an opposing card causes you to discard any number of cards from your hand, you may search your deck for any one Weave Creature and play it with its starting energy, without paying any costs.

flavor:
"How can a bunch of grass look so uninviting?"
-- Valkan, Pyromancer
name: Uwamar Beads

flavor: Putting up the shield will hurt your Vaal a little. Attacking without the shield could hurt your Vaal a lot.
name: Vaal

powers.name: Shield
powers.text: Vaal is prevented from losing any energy from attacks until the end of your turn.

effects.name: Pyromancy
effects.text: Whenever Valkan plays a Spell that discards energy from any number of Creatures, discard two additional energy from each of those Creatures.

flavor: "Aaagh! Fire!! FIRE!!!!! There's FIRE everywhere! Noo! Oh, the humanity! The sorrow!! It's spreading!! We'll all be burnt to a cinder! Our flesh will be seared to the very bone! HOT HOT HOT!!"
name: Valkan

flavor:
"I held on to 'em as long as I could, lad. Breaks
me heart. I canna take much more o' this!"
-- Blu, Vault Guardian
name: Vaporize
text: Choose any one Magi in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Magi for each Relic he or she has in play. Discard all of that Magi's Relics from play.

effects.name: Surge
effects.text: As you play Vard, if your Magi is Bograth and any opponent has more Creatures in play than you (not counting this card), ignore Vard's cost.

effects.name: Shifty
effects.text: Vard loses no enery from opposing Effects.

flavor: Ever hungry, vards are drawn to concentrations of dream energy.
name: Vard

flavor: Liriel looked at the destruction all around. "Tomorrow..." she said, "will be another day."
name: Vard Stampede
text: Choose any one Magi in play. If you have at least four Bograth Creatures in play, discard all of the chosen Magi's Relics and Spells from play.

effects.name: Animite Infusion
effects.text: You can use all Powers on your Relics in play one additional time each turn. At the end of your turn, discard any Relic that used a Power more than once this turn.

effects.name: Archive
effects.text: Once per turn, when one of your Relics discards itself from play, you may remove one energy from your Magi to discard one of your other Relics from play instead.

Vault of Knowledge Key cannot be discarded from play by opposing cards that specifically discard Relics from play. Your cards cannot discard cards from opposing players hands. Discard Vault of Knowledge Key from play if your Magi is not an Orothe Magi.

flavor:
"Be careful when you open the flamin' door!" *kbish!* "Arrr, now look at
what ye done, lassie!"
-- Blu, to Bria
name: Vault of Knowledge Key

effects.name: Flock
effects.text: When you play Vellup, you may search through your deck for another Vellup. Show it to your opponents and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: They never travel alone.
name: Vellup

flavor: "Nar's eleven months of winter, and one month of thin ice."
name: Velouria

powers.name: Adore
powers.text: Choose one of your Creatures. The chosen Creature can attack Magi directly this turn. When that Creature does, add energy to Velouria equal to the amount removed from the opposing Magi in the attack.

flavor:
"The wind is thirsty. Watch yourselves, boys."
-- Orlon, Friend of Wellisks
name: Vemment

powers.name: Evaporate
powers.text: Choose any one non-Arderial Creature in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature. If the chosen Creature is Orothe, discard two additional energy.

text: Arderial Shadow Magi may play Vemment.

flavor: More power to you!
name: Ven

powers.name: Vitalize
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Restore the chosen Creature to its starting energy. This Power may add or discard energy.

effects.name: Counter-Strike
effects.text: Whenever one of your d'Resh Creatures is attacked, before energy is removed, choose one of the attacking player's other Creatures. Remove two energy from the chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Violence ripples through the sands lik currents in the ocean; like a
current, it always returns."
-- Nahara, Sandkeeper
name: Venger
text: When you reveal a d'Resh Magi, if you have one or more recurring cards in your discard pile, you may discard one energy from your Magi to choose one recurring card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

flavor:
"The only thing worse than its bite is its breath!"
-- Strag, Adventurer
name: Venomous Korrit

powers.name: Skulk
powers.text: Choose an opposing Underneath Creature and remove one energy from it. That Creature gains "Effect - Weaken: As this Creature is attacked, remove two energy from it." until the end of your next turn.

text:
Venomous Korrit's text cannot be altered.
Core Magi may play Venomous Korrit.

flavor:
"If you don't think that leaves make good shields,
you've never dueled a Naroomi."
-- Tuku
name: Verdant Shield
text: Attach Verdant Shield to your Magi. While Verdant Shield is attached, Naroom Creatures lose one less energy in attacks. Discard Verdant Shield from play at the beginning of your turn.

flavor: I get dizzy just thinking about it.
name: Vertigo
text: Choose any one Magi in play. During that Magi's next turn, he or she must spend one additional energy to play each card.

flavor:
"Dinner time!"
-- Poad, Naroom Innkeeper
name: Vim and Vigor
text: Naroom Shadow Magi may play Vim and Vigor.

flavor: With a powerful lash, the vine bhatar ripped energy from the gorath, leaving it dazed and breathless.
name: Vine Bhatar

powers.name: Whiplash
powers.text: Choose a Stalked Creature. Move one energy from the Creature to Vine Bhatar.

effects.name: Dream Tap
effects.text: Whenever one of your other Creatures uses the Effect 'Dreamwarp', add one energy to Vine Hyren.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Vine Hyren, increase or decrease its starting energy by up to one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor:
"Korg's forces are too strong; we need to pull back. This'll buy us some
time."
-- Boria, Elder
name: Vine Hyren

flavor: The Core Magi's eyes widened in fear as the thing grew from sprout to trellis in seconds.
name: Vinoc

powers.name: Generate
powers.text: Discard any number of cards from your hand. For each card discarded, add one energy to Vinoc.

effects.name: Deluge
effects.text: At the end of your turn, add four energy to the Creature in play with the most energy. If two or more Creatures are tied for the most energy, an opponent of your choice chooses which Creature gets the energy.

flavor: It's out of control!
name: Voda

effects.name: Interrupt
effects.text: Once per turn, whenever an opposing Spell or Power chooses only one of your other Creatures in play, you may choose any one of your other Creatures in play instead, if that Creature can be chosen for the Spell or Power.

effects.name: Invulnerability
effects.text: Vogo loses one less energy in attacks.

flavor: Circling vogos are a sure sign that the cliff hyren have found an intruder.
name: Vogo

effects.name: Diplomacy
effects.text: If you have an Arderial Creature in play, all of your Orothe Creatures cost one less energy, to a minimum of one. If you have an Orothe Creature in play, all of your Arderial Creatures cost one less energy, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"Saladarits burn our oceans. You must be our voice, and bring the storms
to Cald."
-- Mobis, to Orthea
name: Voice of the Storm

effects.name: Diplomacy
effects.text: If you have an Arderial Creature in play, all of your Orothe Creatures cost one less energy, to a minimum of one. If you have an Orothe Creature in play, all of your Arderial Creatures cost one less energy, to a minimum of one.

flavor:
"Saladarits burn our oceans. You must be our voice, and bring the storms
to Cald."
-- Mobis, to Orthea
name: Voice of the Storm

flavor:
"How do you plan to weather the storm of wars?"
-- Orthea, to Jaela
name: Voice of the Storms
text: Add two energy to each Creature in play with more than one region.

effects.name: Demand
effects.text: Each opposing non-Nar Relic costs one additional energy to play.

flavor: The void annoyed.
name: Void Stone

powers.name: Supply
powers.text: Discard one of your Relics from play. Draw a card.

flavor:
"The battle was over, and I told it to 'cool down', but it just looked at
me funny."
-- Grega
name: Volcano Hyren

powers.name: Conflagration
powers.text: The next Cald Spell you play this turn that removes energy from a single Creature removes an additional energy from that Creature and one energy from each of that player's other Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Don't hurt my precious..."
-- Jaela, Regis
name: Volt Shield
text: Choose a Creature in play and attach Volt Shield to it. If that Creature would be affected by an opposing non-Arderial Spell, you may discard Volt Shield from play. If you do, the Creature is unaffected by that Spell.

effects.text: Vopok cannot attack. During your Energize Step, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, Vopok can attack this turn.

effects.name: Great Wall
effects.text: When you play Vopok, if your Magi is Kybar's Teeth, add six energy to Vopok.

flavor:
"Stay. Good boy."
-- Chur, Traitor
name: Vopok

flavor:
"Note to self: do not ask Vorga about her scar."
-- Tony Jones' journal
name: Vorga

powers.name: Shatter
powers.text: Choose any one Creature with three or less energy, or any one Relic in play. Discard the chosen Creature or Relic from play.

flavor: In order to tell its stories, the wind uses the leaves as its tongues.
name: Vortex of Knowledge
text: Each player draws two cards.

effects.name: Really Really Big
effects.text: When you play Vrak, add six energy to it.
If Vrak is your only Nar Creature in play, discard it.

flavor:
"He's right on top of us! Do you suppose her is using the same wind we
are?"
-- Stradus
name: Vrak

effects.name: Succor
effects.text: At the end of your Energize Steps, move two energy from your Magi to Vrill.

flavor:
We all must unite when the night falls
That we might survive till the day.
name: Vrill

powers.name: Nightfall
powers.text: All of your Core Creatures in play gain energy equal to their starting energy.

flavor:
"The ground stopped shaking already, but it still feels
like my brain's jiggling around in my skull... don't laugh at me!"
-- Zet, to Korg
name: Vulbor

powers.name: Mind Shock
powers.text: Choose any one player. The chosen player must discard two cards of his or her choice from his or her hand.

effects.name: Random Change
effects.text: Whenever Vuryip attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, draw a card.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Vuryip attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Vuryip and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: If a tree falls in a forest and no one's around to hear it, a vuryip will probably knock another one down.
name: Vuryip
text: Weave Shadow Magi may play Vuryip.

effects.name: Fetch
effects.text: As Wandering Balamant attacks, choose one of your other Creatures. Add two energy to that Creature.

effects.name: Wander
effects.text: Non-Naroom Magi may play Wandering Balamant without regional penalty.

flavor: A Wandering Balamant makes friends no matter where it goes but it always remembers where it came from.
name: Wandering Balamant

flavor:
Lasada gaped. "Where did THAT come from?"
"Don't ask," whispered the Warlum, and with a swish it vanished.
name: Warlum

powers.name: Materialize
powers.text: Choose any one player. Discard Warlum from play. Search the chosen player's deck for any one Relic and put it into play under your Magi's control. Shuffle the chosen player's deck.

text: Arderial and Orothe Shadow Magi may play Warlum.

effects.name: Dark Blooming
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if Warrada has no creatures in play, add five energy to Warrada.

flavor: The Shadow sees all.
name: Warrada

effects.name: Phenomenal Cosmic Power
effects.text: At the beginning of each of your turns, choose either to draw an additional card at the end of the turn, or to have all of your Core cards cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one, until the end of the turn.

flavor: Itty bitty gemstone.
name: Warrada's Ring

flavor:
"ecks ecks ECKS!"
-- Warrior Olum Battle Cry
name: Warrior Olum

powers.name: Challenge
powers.text: Choose an opponent and any of that player's Creatures. Discard two enery from the chosen Creature unless the chosen player discards three energy from their Magi.

flavor:
"These boots were made for stompin'."
-- Harror, Nightstalker
name: Warrior's Boots

powers.name: Warpath
powers.text: Discard Warrior's Boots from play. Immediately play a Creature from your hand. You must still pay all costs for the Creature.

flavor:
"You can tell a true fighter by the way he walks."
-- Barak, Cald Warlord
name: Warrior's Boots

powers.name: Warpath
powers.text: Discard Warrior's Boots from play. Immediately play a Creature from your hand. You still must transfer the Creature's starting energy from your Magi to the Creature as normal.

effects.name: Rush
effects.text: If your Magi is a Naroom or Naroom Shadow Magi, you may play Wasperine at the beginning of your Attack Step, paying all costs.

flavor:
Green. White and orange. Red. Lots of red. Then black.
-- Description of a Wasperine attack
name: Wasperine
text: Naroom Shadow Magi may play Wasperine.

effects.name: Blur
effects.text: If your Magi is Nar or Naroom, you may play Wasperine Stalker at the beginning of your Attack step. If you do, Wasperine Stalker can and must attack Magi directly this turn. When you play Wasperne Stalker, add two energy to it if your Magi is Woot!.

flavor: They always put a little run in their stalkings.
name: Wasperine Stalker
text: Naroom Shadow Magi can play Wasperine Stalker.

effects.name: Blur
effects.text: If your Magi is Nar or Naroom, you may play Wasperine Stalker at the beginning of your Attack step. If you do, Wasperine Stalker can and must attack Magi directly this turn. When you play Wasperne Stalker, add two energy to it if your Magi is Woot!.

flavor:
"Surrender!"
"You wish to surrender to me? Very well, I accept."
-- Togoth and Yaki
name: Wasperine Stalker
text: Naroom Shadow Magi can play Wasperine Stalker.

effects.name: Invigorate
effects.text: Your Magi's energize rate is increased by one.

flavor:
"The power is ancient, but the water doesn't taste that way."
-- Poad, Naroom Innkeeper
name: Water of Life

effects.name: Weave's Gift
effects.text: After Weave Arboll is defeated in an attack, add one energy to each of your Creatures with the effect "Weave".

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: As this Creature attacks or is attacked, you may move one energy between it and one of your other Weave Creatures.

flavor:
"Ooh-it's all wrinkly! Yuck!"
-- Tryn, Daughter of Runes
name: Weave Arboll

effects.name: Shelter
effects.text: Your Creatures lose one less energy from opposing Spells, Powers, and Effects that discard energy. Your Magi loses no energy from opposing Spells, Powers, and Effects.

effects.name: Sproing!
effects.text: Whenever your Magi is attacked, discard Weave Hut from play.

flavor:
"I'll fling! And I'll flame! And I'll burn your hut down!"
-- Valkan, Pyromancer
name: Weave Hut

effects.name: Wild Growth
effects.text: Once per turn, when an Effect adds energy to Weave Hyren, you may add one energy to each of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Rub its belly! Rub its belly!"
-- Korg, to Zet
name: Weave Hyren

effects.name: Wild Growth
effects.text: Once per turn, when an Effect adds energy to Weave Hyren, you may choose to add one energy to each of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: A major pain in the grass.
name: Weave Hyren

effects.name: Easy Come
effects.text: Once per turn, when a Creature is played, draw a card.

effects.name: Easy Go
effects.text: At the end of each turn, if no Creatures were played that turn, discard two of your non-Magi cards from your hand or from play.

flavor:
"It's more comfortable than it looks."
"It would have to be."
-- Gia and Eidon
name: Weave Mat

flavor:
"There is no power, no magic, no force in the whole of
the Moonlands that can defeat me while I carry my hammer."
-- Ushi
name: Weave Maul

powers.name: Crush
powers.text: Remove one energy from each Creature without the Effect "Weave".

flavor: When Weave Magi change their minds, they really change their minds.
name: Weave Mind
text: Defeat your current Magi. You may keep your current Relics and Creatures in play. Reveal your next Magi with his or her starting energy. You may get the new Magi's starting cards as normal. Non-Weave Magi may not play this Spell.

flavor: Instant magic. Just add water.
name: Weave Powder

powers.name: Sculpt
powers.text: Discard Weave Powder from play. Search your deck for any one Weave Relic, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. You may not sure Sculpt the turn you play Weave Powder.

flavor:
"That's-a one-a spicy weave-a seed!"
-- Poad, Innkeeper
name: Weave Seed
text: Play Weave Seed only before your Attack step. Choose a Weave Creature. Add seven energy to the chosen Creature. That Creature can attack an additional time this turn and must attack if able.

flavor: There's no running away when the tidal wave comes from the sky.
name: Weave Winds
text: Until the start of your next turn, if any player has a Creature in play, he or she may not play non-Weave Creatures.

effects.name: Tied to the Weave
effects.text: If each Creature you control has the Effect "Weave", increase your Magi's energize by one.

effects.name: Memento
effects.text: If Weave-woven Anklet is discarded from play by an opposing Spell or Power, choose one Weave Spell in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

flavor:
"It's SO pretty! But... I think it gave me this weird rash!"
-- Marella, Savant
name: Weave-woven Anklet

effects.name: Grounded
effects.text: Whenever Weebat is attacked, add one energy to Weebat before energy is removed. If the attacking Creature is Naroom, add three additional energy to Weebat before energy is removed.

flavor: Agile as a bird in flight, solid as a rock at rest.
name: Weebat

flavor:
Weeblit (TM) One-Use Magical Mushroom Cooker
Manufactured by The Weeblit Co.
Moonlands patent pending.
name: Weeblit

powers.name: Season
powers.text: Choose any one Weebo and any one other Creature in play. Discard Weeblit and the chosen Weebo from play. Add five energy to the other chosen Creature.

flavor:
"Don't eat wild foest mushrooms... unless they're wild
orange forest mushrooms with feet."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Weebo

powers.name: Vitalize
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play with less than its starting energy. Restore the chosen Creature to its starting energy.

effects.name: Withdraw
effects.text: If Weed Hyren is discarded from play outside of an attack, place it in your hand instead of the discard pile.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Weed Hyren, increase or decrease its starting energy by up o one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Weed Hyren attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Weed Hyren and any one of your other Paradwyn or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"You! Get out of my garden! Ooohh, it's too late already."
-- Kesia, Musician
name: Weed Hyren

effects.name: Withdraw
effects.text: If Weed Hyren is discarded from play outside of an attack, place it in your hand instead of the discard pile.

effects.name: Dreamwarp
effects.text: As you play Weed Hyren, increase or decrease its starting energy by up o one, to a minimum starting energy of one, until the end of the turn.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Weed Hyren attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Weed Hyren and any one of your other Paradwyn or Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"You! Get out of my garden! Ooohh, it's too late already."
-- Kesia, Musician
name: Weed Hyren

effects.name: Impede
effects.text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may discard one energy from Weethan to force that player to choose and discard any one card from their hand. Impede cannot be used more than once each turn and only one Weethan can use Impede each turn. Orothe Shadow Magi may play Weethan.

flavor: Hey! Stop that!
name: Weethan

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Weggit attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Weggit and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor: It dreams a lot of relic lore, and it'll share its knowledge for the chance to dream some more.
name: Weggit

powers.name: Whispering Winds
powers.text: Discard Weggit from play. Draw one card for each Relic you have in play.

effects.name: Dream Barrier
effects.text: Immediately after a Creature is played, you may discard Wellisk from play. If you do so, also discard the Creature played and all energy used to play the Creature.

flavor:
"A wake-up call for the special kind of sleep that makes dream creatures."
-- O'Qua, Summoner
name: Wellisk

effects.name: Erratic Shield
effects.text:
If Wellisk Pup is attacked, roll one die before energy is removed.
1, 2, 3, or 4 = Add three energy to Wellisk Pup.
5 or 6 = Discard Wellisk Pup from play.

flavor:
"It can draw energy out of its surroundings to defend itself. But
sometimes it draws too much and explodes."
-- O'Qua, Summoner
name: Wellisk Pup

flavor: "Kid, I've been from one side of the Moonlands to the other. I've seen a lot of strange stuff..."
name: Wence

powers.name: Wayfarer's Lore
powers.text: Draw one card. If you draw a Creature card in this way, you may show it to your opponent and draw one additional card during your Draw Step this turn.

flavor: "Minani. Why'd it have to be Minani?"
name: Wence the Wanderer

powers.name: Wence is Here
powers.text: Look at the top card of your deck. If it is a Naroom Spell or a Creature with the Effect "Weave", reveal it to all players and place it into your hand. Otherwise, discard it or return it to the top of your deck.

flavor:
"If you're a Weave Magi, then I'm Nagsis."
-- Gia, to Wence
name: Wence the Wanderer

powers.name: Wence is Here
powers.text: Look at the top card of your deck. If it is a Naroom Spell or a Creature with the Effect "Weave", reveal it to all players and place it into your hand. Otherwise, discard it or return it to the top of your deck.

effects.name: Wence Was Here
effects.text: During your Energize step, if you have a Naroom Creature and a different Weave Creature in play, add two energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"There I was, knee-deep in bungaloos..."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Wence's Travelog

effects.name: Wence Was Here
effects.text: During your Energize step, if you have a Naroom Creature and a different Weave Creature in play, add two energy to your Magi.

flavor:
"I'm not even supposed to be here today!"
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Wence's Travelog

effects.name: Landslide
effects.text: If Wessig is discarded from play, discard all non-Kybar's Teeth Creatures and Relics from play.

flavor:
"I think her innocence helps protect her."
-- Targ'n, Kybar's Teeth Elder
name: Wessig

flavor: "Have you ever had a dream with an ending you never dreamed possible? I can put one in your little head tonight."
name: Whall

powers.name: Dream Twist
powers.text: Choose any one of your Creatures in play. Discard the chosen Creature. Play a Creature from your hand without paying its energy cost. Put energy onto the played Creature equal to its starting energy. That Creature may not attack this turn.

flavor: "Hmm... I wonder what this would do to a Bagala?"
name: Whilp

powers.name: Plague
powers.text: Choose a Creature type. All Creatures of the chosen type lose two energy.

flavor:
"Sure, you can't see anything, but you're not missing anything, either."
-- Halstad
name: Whiteout
text: Until the end of your next turn, all Creatures in play are frozen. Powers on frozen cards cost one additional energy to use.

effects.name: Transform
effects.text: When you reveal Wiep, if your previous Magi was Baa, place any one Bograth card from your discard pile into your hand.

flavor: "Can I borrow your sleeve?"
name: Wiep

powers.name: Power Drain
powers.text: Choose any Power on an opposing Creature. Move energy equal to the cost of the chosen Power from that Creature to Wiep.

flavor:
"For such an erratic spell, it's awfully picky."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Wildfire
text: Choose any one non-Cald region. Discard two energy from each Creature in play of the chosen region.

flavor:
"Out here you are at the mercy of the tides."
-- Mobis, to Zet
name: Will of Orothe
text: Choose any one opponent. During his or her next turn, the chosen opponent's Creatures may not use Powers.

effects.name: Invigorate
effects.text: Increase your Arderial or d'Resh Magi's Energize by two. A Magi can only be affected by one Invigorate at a time.

flavor:
"Anyway, the wind blows..."
-- Shivara, Mistress of the Winds
name: Wind Hyren

effects.name: Invigorate
effects.text: Increase your Arderial or d'Resh Magi's Energize by two. A Magi can only be affected by one Invigorate at a time.

flavor:
"We have hyren sign, the likes of which no one has ever seen."
-- Drajan, Elder
name: Wind Hyren

effects.name: Sweet Rot
effects.text: If Wither Twee is defeated in an attack, add one energy to each Bograth Creature and draw a card.

flavor: Wither Twees surround the borders of Bograth. Each foes that passes only strengthens the denizens of that foul region.
name: Wither Twee

effects.name: Savagery
effects.text: Energy removed in attacks by your Wasperines cannot be prevented by opposing cards.

effects.name: Weebos Are For Wimps
effects.text: Powers on your Creatures cannot add energy to other Creatures.

flavor:
"Out of weebos? In that case, what DO you have?"
"Just this box of one dozen rabid wasperines!"
"Okay, I'll take that..."
name: Woot!

flavor: A snow-ball fighter.
name: Worgle

powers.name: Share
powers.text: Discard Worgle from play. Choose a number of Creatures equal to the number of your frozen Creatures in play. Discard two energy from each of the chosen Creatures.

effects.name: Strengthen
effects.text: Whenever any other Creature is played, add one energy to Wudge.

flavor: Its strength is in its enemies' numbers.
name: Wudge

effects.name: Tap Strength
effects.text: Whenever one or more opposing Magi gain energy outside of their Energize step, add two energy to Wyle.

flavor:
"I'm a real wyle child!"
-- Kalius
name: Wyle

powers.name: Energy Transfer
powers.text: Choose a Creature in play. Add X energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Piercing Scream
effects.text: As an opposing Creature uses a Power, you may discard three energy from Xala to negate the Power. All costs for the Power must still be paid.
As you play Xala, reduce its cost by four. Xala is not considered to be in play when checking to see if your Magi is defeated, and it cannot attack Magi directly.

flavor: Denial flows like a river.
name: Xala

effects.name: Windchill
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if your smallest Creature in play is larger than the largest opposing Creature in play, add for energy to your Magi.

flavor: Legendary heralds of the winter storms, xamfs bring welcome challenges for all Kybarites.
name: Xamf

flavor:
"I'm very protective of my little sister. Mess with her and
you mess with me."
name: Xandia

powers.name: Burning Desire
powers.text: Discard a Cald Creature from your hand. Choose an opposing Creature and remove energy from it equal to the starting energy of the Creature you discarded. This energy loss may not be modified.

flavor:
"Four lightning bolts today. The clouds must really be out
to get me."
-- Wence, Adventurer
name: Xyx

powers.name: Shock
powers.text: Choose any Magi in play. Discard four energy from the chosen Magi.

flavor:
"But of course it isn't getting shocked, it's a thundercloud."
-- Zet, to Korg
name: Xyx Elder

powers.name: Shockstorm
powers.text: Roll one die. Discard that much energy from each non-Xyx Creature in play.

flavor:
To Arderians, the clouds are the seed bed and the lightning is the
harvest.
name: Xyx Minor

powers.name: Gathering Clouds
powers.text: Choose any one Xyx in play. Add four enery to the chosen Xyx.

effects.name: Timid
effects.text: Yajo cannot attack.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Yajo is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Yajo and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"Mmmm... crunchy!"
-- Korg
name: Yajo

powers.name: Vitalize
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play that attacked this turn. Add three energy to the chosen Creature.

effects.name: Double Strike
effects.text: Each of your Creatures may attack twice each turn.

flavor: This is my Hyren. He doesn't like you.
name: Yaki

flavor:
"I call this move 'the aritex technique'. Properly done, there's no
defense."
-- Yaki, Tracker
name: Yaki's Gauntlets

powers.name: Double Strike
powers.text: Discard a card from your hand. Until the end of your turn, all of your Naroom Creatures may attack an additional time.

effects.name: Absorb Darkness
effects.text: All of your Spells and Powers that affect Core cards you control may instead affect your Naroom cards.

effects.name: Overwhelm
effects.text: Whenever one of your Creatures attacks, you may add two energy to it before energy is removed, or four energy if it is attacking a Core card. If you do, discard your Creature at the end of your Attack step.

flavor: "Yes, I use the powers of the Core. It's not like they gave me a choice."
name: Yaki, Core Stalker
text: Yaki can only play Core, Naroom, and Universal cards, but ignores regional penalties and restrictions. Yaki cannot be in a Magi stack with Core Magi.

effects.name: Diving Attack
effects.text: Whenever Yark attacks a Creature with more than its starting energy, reduce that Creature to its starting energy before energy is removed.

flavor:
"A harsh critter for a harsh place."
-- Wence, Naroom adventurer
name: Yark

effects.name: Deplete
effects.text: Once per turn, when one of your Kybar's Teeth Creatures is attacked by a non-Kybar's Teeth Creature that has more than its starting energy, before energy is removed, you may reduce the attacking Creature to its starting energy.

flavor: They may be gloves, but they don't just warm your hands.
name: Yark Gloves

effects.text: While Yaromant is in play, all Creatures in play are frozen; Powers on frozen cards cost one additional energy to use.

effects.name: Scavenge
effects.text: When a frozen card is discarded, add one energy to Yaromant.

flavor: The timely arrival of the Magi from Nar greatly helped the Naroom resistance.
name: Yaromant

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Core Spells and Powers do not affect Yarothis.

flavor: A wind to blow foulness away.
name: Yarothis

powers.name: Scouring Gale
powers.text: Choose any one Core Creature in play. Discard the chosen Creature from play.

flavor: The bigger the better.
name: Yaw

powers.name: Ice Pack
powers.text: Return Yaw to your hand. Choose a frozen Creature. Restore the chosen Creature to its starting energy.

effects.name: Seeds of Deceit
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, choose a Spell or Relic in an opposing discard pile and shuffle it into its owner's deck. Increase Yayek's energize by that card's energy cost until the end of your turn (X equals zero).

flavor: With Nagsis missing, Yayek has made his way to Hrada's side.
name: Yayek

effects.name: Rolling Stones
effects.text: At the beginning of your turn, if your largest Creature in play is smaller than the smallest opposing Creature in play, all opposing Creatures in play lose one energy.

flavor:
"How can such a clumsy creature survive in such
an unforgiving environment?"
-- Wence, Naroom Adventurer
name: Yebed

effects.name: Empower Dream
effects.text: All of your hyren in play gain ENERGIZE: 1.

effects.name: Hyren Affinity
effects.text: You ignore regional penalties and restrictions when playing hyren.

flavor:
"You know, there are other creatures."
"None that matter."
-- Kesia and Yerthe
name: Yerthe

effects.name: Turn
effects.text: When you reveal Yog, you may choose any one Creature in play. If you do, gain control of the chosen Creature and permanently reduce Yog's energize by two. That Creature becomes Bograth instead of its original region.

flavor:
"She'd have better luck if she didn't keep eating the worms."
-- Obgren, Mistkeeper
name: Yog

flavor:
"When you have a big hammer, everything looks like your thumb. Err, a
nail."
-- Yog, Toady in Waiting
name: Yog's Maul

powers.name: Thump Thump Wham!
powers.text: Discard one of your Bograth Creatures from play. Choose any one opposing Creature in play. Discard energy from the chosen Creature equal to the number of your Bograth Creatures in play.

effects.name: Resistance
effects.text: Core Spells and Powers do not affect Yollum.

flavor: A blaze to consume what is tainted.
name: Yollum

powers.name: Incinerate
powers.text: Choose any one Core Creature or Magi in play. Discard six energy from the chosen Creature or Magi.

effects.name: Athletic
effects.text: Once per turn, immediately after an opposing player uses a Power on one of his or her cards in play, you can use a Power on one of your cards in play.

flavor:
"Don't try to sneak anything past Yricho."
-- Bazha, Lifekeeper
name: Yricho

effects.name: Safe
effects.text: As an opposing card specifically discards one of your Creatures from play, roll a die. If the die roll is less than the energy on your Magi, remove two energy from your Magi and the opposing card does not discard your Creature from play.

flavor: "Run home!" yelled Yricho, brandishing his staff.
name: Yricho's Staff

effects.name: Clarity
effects.text: Once per turn, if you draw a d'Resh Spell, reveal the card to all opponents and draw a card.

effects.name: Prodigy
effects.text: Your d'Resh Spells cost one less energy to play, to a minimum of one. Energy discarded by your d'Resh Spells cannot be reduced.

flavor: "So what if they know it's coming? They still can't avoid it."
name: Ythra

flavor:
"Familiarity breeds contentedness."
-- Ythra
name: Ythra's Mantle

powers.name: Prepare
powers.text: Search your deck for one of your starting cards and place it into your hand.

effects.name: Work All Night
effects.text: Zajan does not energize as normal during the energize step. Zajan energizes during the draw step.

effects.name: Sleep All Day
effects.text: Zajan draws two cards during the energize step. Zajan does not draw cards as normal during the draw step.

flavor:
"He goes around whistling this inane little tune all the time. It drives
me crazy."
-- Tryn, Daughter of Runes
name: Zajan

effects.name: Charm
effects.text: Each turn, the first opposing card that removes energy from Zannah or one of your Creatures removes no energy.

flavor:
"Wow, she's purty!"
-- Korg
name: Zannah

effects.name: Warning
effects.text: Whenever one of your other Weave Creatures is attacked, add one energy to that Creature before energy is removed.

effects.name: Weave
effects.text: Whenever Zassyfer attacks or is attacked, before energy is removed, you may move one energy between Zassyfer and any one of your other Weave Creatures in play.

flavor:
"It was terrible! Hundreds of 'em, zassyfers everywhere! They ate all my
flutter yups!"
-- Ora, Shieldmaiden
name: Zassyfer

effects.name: Payback
effects.text: Whenever an opponent's card causes you to discard cards from your hand, you may choose to have that opponent discard an equal number of cards at random from his or her hand.

flavor: For a pacifist, she's awfully unforgiving.
name: Zaya

powers.name: Pressure
powers.text: Choose any one player. If the chosen player has more cards in his or her hand than you do, draw a card.

flavor:
"I see him..."
-- Zaya, Weave Elder
name: Zaya's Bow

powers.name: Long Shot
powers.text: Choose any one Creature in play. Discard one energy from the chosen Creature. That Creature must attack on its controller's next turn, if able. If your Magi is Zaya, all other Creatures controlled by that player must also attack on his or her next turn, if able.

effects.name: Good Riddance
effects.text: If Korg is in any player's defeated Magi pile, add three energy to Zet's starting energy.

flavor: "Korg, this is the perfect chance for us to get in there and cause some disarray."
name: Zet

powers.name: Treachery
powers.text: Zet gains control of any one Creature in play. X is the amount of energy on that Creature. If the Creature is a non-Core Creature, it loses one energy. The Creature may not attack this turn.

flavor:
"To sleep, perchance to dream up something THAT WILL EAT THESE THINGS!"
-- Emlob, Obsessive Detailer
name: Zungg

powers.name: Gnaw
powers.text: Choose any one opposing Creature in play. Move one energy from the chosen Creature to Zungg.

text: Only Bograth or Core Magi can play Zungg.

flavor:
"To sleep, perchance to dream up something THAT WILL EAT THESE THINGS!"
-- Emlob, Obsessive Detailer
name: Zungg

powers.name: Gnaw
powers.text: Choose any one opposing Creature in play. Move one energy from the chosen Creature to Zungg.

text: Only Bograth or Core Magi can play Zungg.

flavor:
"They eat too much, and don't leave enough for me."
-- All-High King Korg, Magnificent, Illustrious, Ever-Hungering Emperor of
   Great and Mighty Bograth
name: Zungg Swarm
text: Choose any one Magi in play. If you have at least seven Bograth Creatures and seven Core Creatures in play, discard energy equal to the number of your Bograth Creatures in play from all of the chosen Magi's Creatures.

effects.text: While Zyavu is in play, all Creatures in play are frozen; Powers on frozen cards cost one additional energy to use.

effects.name: Lingering Chill
effects.text: When Zyavu is discarded from play, all Creatures remain frozen until the end of the turn.

flavor: "I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice dreams."
name: Zyavu
